review:
Kopanito All-Stars Soccer es un juego triple B (bonito , barato y bueno) y también divertido para jugar con amigos , pero le faltan cosas como sonidos del estadio y música en el partido que hace que se pueda hacer monótona la partida .
sacando esas cosas en un juegaso super divertido y super recomendable , yo le doy un 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198839146796', 'num_games_owned': 24, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1702909124}
review: anos e anos atrás joguei a demo desse jogo no click jogos, passava dias jogando isso mesmo sendo uma demo, tendo só um torneio, mas era o suficiente pra me divertir pra caramba, ate hj lembro da primeira vez q ganhei um campeonato lá, foi incrivel pra mim kk, falei pra mim mesmo que quando ter um pc melhor e dinheiro sobrando eu iria compra, anos e anos se passaram, com dinheiro sobrando decidi comprar ja que era promoção, e sinceramente é muito melhor, muito mais conteudo, modo online, mais times.. é um jogo bem divertido que me lembra kunio kun do nes que tinha porradaria e poderes no meio do futebola, com amigos a diversão é ainda melhor, tem como jogar com literalmente 5 PESSOAS JUNTAS!!!! cada uma escolhe qual time jogar, o que realmente é muito bom e divertido, é um caos, mas é do caos que eu gosto!!! o fato de dar carrinho nos amigos é muito bom kkkkkkkkkkk

author: {'steamid': '76561197998543056', 'num_games_owned': 2354, 'num_reviews': 642, 'playtime_forever': 795, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 795, 'last_played': 1532702603}
review:
[b] > Be me
> Discover Kopanito All-Stars Soccer
> "It's like Super Mario Strikers met Sensible Soccer and decided to kick it up a notch!"
> Intrigued.gif
> Game boasts skill-based gameplay
> No hand-holding, just pure football mastery
> Luck? Nah, it's all about your precision and reflexes
> Realize I'm the stat sheet - move over, Messi
> Super-moves are legit
> Earn them by schooling opponents
> Magnetic ball, teleportation, windmakers – it's like playing football in a Looney Tunes episode
> Freeze opponents? Yes, please!
> Try it with friends
> Up to 5 controllers, because friends are better than AI
> Create epic tournaments like a football overlord
> "You are the Boss here!" – power trip intensifies
> Online multiplayer
> Duel, Doubles, Chaos, Complete – options galore
> Create Party mode for customized mayhem
> Local friends can join online games – game-changer
> AI won’t let you rest
> Four difficulty levels – Child's play to "pull your hair out"
> Practice mode for basic moves – perfect for scrublords like me
> Many competitions and teams
> 17 tournaments worldwide – I'm the international football sensation
> 100+ national teams, even the exotic ones – Bhutan, here I come
> 7 stadiums – because variety is the spice of football life
> Goal replays and GIF generator
> Turn my epic goals into GIFs – share with the world
> "Hey Twitter, watch me school these virtual fools!"
> Brings back memories
> Inspired by classics – Nintendo World Cup, Sensible Soccer, and Kick Off
> Nostalgia hits like a curveball from Beckham
> Remembers Shaolin Soccer
> Cue Shaolin Soccer soundtrack
> Players kicking balls with kung fu moves
> "Kopanito All-Stars Soccer: Where Soccer Meets Shaolin Chaos!"
> Imagine bicycle kicks with flying kicks
> Opponents left stunned as I channel my inner Shaolin monk
> Game on point, memories flooding back
> Kopanito All-Stars Soccer, you've kicked nostalgia right in the feels ⚽️🎮 [/b]

[i] [b]Stan Bush - (You've Got) The Touch [/b]

You kicked that ball!
You ruled the pitch!
Yeah!

After all is said and done, you've never walked, you've never run
You're a scorer!
Got the moves, you own the field. Break the rules, make opponents yield!
You're nobody's fool!
You're at your best, when the crowd gets loud!
You've been put to the test, and you make us all proud!

You got the goal, you got the power!
When the match gets wild, you'll be right in the eye of the storm!
You got the skill, you got the motion!
You know that when things get too tough, you got the Goal!

You never bend, you never break! You seem to know just what it takes
You're a dribbler!
It's in the kicks, it's in the will! It's in the mighty shots that thrill
When you're aiming for the net!
And you never miss, when your aim is true!
Gonna score till the end, and you're taking it all!

You got the goal, you got the power!
When the field's on fire, you'll be right in the eye of the storm!
You got the heart, you got the motion!
You know that when things get too tough, you got the Goal!

You scoring goals with style!
You know you got the goal!

You're at your best, when the match gets rough!
You've been put to the test, and it's never enough!
You got the goal!
You got the power!
Yeah!

You got the goal!
You got the power!

Goal!
[/i]

[b] Title: "Persian Soccer Chronicles: A Royal Review"

[The scene opens in a grand, time-bending palace. The Prince from the Sands of Time game, Dastan from the Sands of Time film, and the Prince from the 2008 reboot are gathered with their respective leading ladies - Farah, Tamina, and Elika. They are all gathered around a mystical gaming console with Kopanito All-Stars Soccer loaded.]

Prince (Sands of Time Game):
So, they say this Kopanito game is a blend of fast-paced madness and soccer. Intriguing, isn't it, Farah? 😏

Farah:
Indeed. But can it compare to our epic time-traveling adventures, my prince? ⏳✨

Prince (Sands of Time Film):
Well, it's not every day you get to play soccer with a dagger that can rewind time. Imagine if this game had that feature! 🕰️⚽

Tamina:
Time-bending soccer? Now that's a concept! ⏰⚽

Prince (2008 Reboot):
Hold on a sec. Did someone say "time"? Elika, do you think this game can undo the destruction of my kingdom? 🏰❓

Elika:
Prince, it's a soccer game, not a magical restoration device. 🤷‍♀️⚽

[They all grab controllers, and the game begins. Chaos ensues on the virtual pitch as they play.]

Dastan:
By the sands! This game is faster than a sandstorm! 💨⚽

Tamina:
And these super-moves! Imagine having these during our adventures, Dastan. 🌪️💥

Farah:
Careful, Prince (Sands of Time Game). You might accidentally activate a sand portal in the game. 🏰🔄

Prince (Sands of Time Game):
Laughs Imagine trying to rewind a goal. "Sorry, folks, let's take that kick again." ⚽🔄😄

[Elika and the Prince from the 2008 Reboot score a goal using a windmaker super-move.]

Prince (2008 Reboot):
I must say, this windmaker move is impressive. If only I had it when Ahriman attacked. 💨⚽

Elika:
I doubt a windmaker would stop the corruption, my prince. 🤔❌

[Dastan and Tamina showcase their skills, with Dastan scoring a goal using a teleportation super-move.]

Dastan:
Imagine using this in the fight against Nizam! Teleport, strike, goal! 🌀⚽🥅

Tamina:
That would have made our battles much more entertaining. 😅🤸‍♀️

[The Prince (Sands of Time Film) and Farah pull off a dazzling combo move to score a goal.]

Prince (Sands of Time Film):
Now that's how you score a cinematic goal, Tamina! 🎬⚽

Tamina:
Just like our acrobatic escapes, my prince. 🤸‍♀️🏰

[Elika and the Prince from the 2008 Reboot use a freeze super-move to halt opponents in their tracks.]

Elika:
Freezing time in the game, Prince? That's a bit redundant, isn't it? ⏸️❄️⚽

Prince (2008 Reboot):
You can never have too much time manipulation. ⏳🔄⚽

[The game ends with laughter and banter.]

Prince (Sands of Time Game):
Well, that was a royal match. I must say, this Kopanito All-Stars Soccer has the speed of a sand dagger strike. ⚔️💨⚽

Prince (Sands of Time Film):
And the chaos of a sandstorm! Not bad at all. 🌪️⚽

Prince (2008 Reboot):
I suppose soccer is a decent distraction from saving kingdoms and undoing world-ending curses. 👑⚽

Farah:
It's a fun diversion, but nothing beats our timeless adventures, my prince. ⌛✨🏰

[They all laugh, enjoying the camaraderie and the chaos of Kopanito All-Stars Soccer.] [/b]

[i] In the world of soccer, wild and free,
There's a game that brings hilarity.
Kopanito All-Stars, oh what a sight,
Where soccer meets pure dynamite!

With heads for feet and limbs that bend,
Players chase the ball 'round every bend.
Goalkeepers leap like acrobats,
Trying to block those crazy shots!

No offside rules, no fouls to heed,
Just pure chaos at lightning speed.
With power-ups and tricks galore,
This game will leave you begging for more!

So gather your friends, it's time to play,
Kopanito All-Stars, come what may.
Laugh until your sides are sore,
In this soccer game like never before! [/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561199184930490', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1689598174}
review:
[h1] Fantastic Football Fun: Kopanito Delivers the Ultimate Virtual Soccer Experience[/h1]

Graphics: ★★★★☆
The game's graphics are vibrant and visually appealing. The player models and animations are well-designed and smooth, with colorful and dynamic stadiums that enhance the overall gameplay experience.

Gameplay: ★★★★☆
Kopanito All Star Soccer offers fast-paced and addictive gameplay. The controls are simple and intuitive, allowing for easy and seamless navigation on the field. The game mechanics are well-thought-out, making each match exciting and unpredictable. The ability to perform skill moves and execute powerful shots adds depth and strategy to the gameplay.

Sound: ★★★☆☆
The sound effects in Kopanito All Star Soccer are satisfactory, with realistic crowd noises and impactful audio cues for goals and fouls. However, the game lacks variety in its soundtrack, which could have enhanced the overall sound experience.

Features: ★★★★☆
The game offers a range of game modes, including single-player tournaments, multiplayer matches, and a challenging career mode. The multiplayer option provides an engaging and competitive experience for players to showcase their skills against friends or online opponents. Additionally, the career mode adds depth and longevity to the game, allowing players to progress and improve their team over time.

Replay Value: ★★★★☆
With its addictive gameplay and various game modes, Kopanito All Star Soccer offers significant replay value. The multiplayer component ensures endless hours of competitive fun, while the career mode provides a satisfying long-term goal for players to achieve. The unpredictable nature of the matches and the need for strategic decision-making make it highly replayable.

Overall: ★★★★☆
Kopanito All Star Soccer is a visually appealing and addictive soccer game that offers a satisfying gameplay experience. With its intuitive controls, exciting game mechanics, and various game modes, it provides a well-rounded package that caters to both casual and competitive players. Although the sound could have been improved, the game's replay value and overall fun factor make it a worthwhile choice for soccer enthusiasts.

review:
Ну это самое😁 Лучший футбол в который я инрал, главное правило игра без правил, на одном экране по пьяне с друганом погонять мячик просто божественно. Можно назвать первым файтингом в виде футбола. 

Советую ли я купить эту игру, ну слушай, если ты не купишь еë, в старости будешь желеть что не попробовал!!!

Особенно острые ощющения когда на большом экране тв играете. Друг бери друга, не пожалейте денег которые копили на куринный дошик, скидывайтесь и покупайте. Потом спасибо скажешь👍🤝

author: {'steamid': '76561198123840352', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1697306002}
review:
Kopanito, a delightful indie gem, is a shining example of how simplicity can lead to incredibly entertaining gameplay. This zany and fast-paced soccer game delivers endless laughs and addictive fun, making it a must-play for fans of both sports games and casual gaming experiences.

One of the standout features of Kopanito is its hilariously funny gameplay. The game takes a lighthearted approach to soccer, embracing over-the-top moves, outrageous power-ups, and comically exaggerated player animations. From performing gravity-defying bicycle kicks to launching absurdly powerful shots, every match is filled with laugh-out-loud moments that will keep you entertained from start to finish. The sheer joy of witnessing your players execute ridiculous moves and witnessing the unexpected outcomes adds a level of unpredictability that keeps the game fresh and exciting.

The simplicity of Kopanito is another aspect that makes it so accessible and enjoyable. The controls are intuitive and easy to grasp, allowing players of all skill levels to jump right in and start having a blast. The straightforward gameplay mechanics ensure that matches are fast-paced and action-packed, with no unnecessary complications or steep learning curves. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a casual player looking for some quick fun, Kopanito strikes the perfect balance between simplicity and engaging gameplay.

Moreover, the game's charming pixel art style adds to its appeal. The vibrant and colorful visuals bring the soccer pitches to life, creating a lively and energetic atmosphere. The character designs are quirky and endearing, adding to the game's overall charm. The attention to detail in the animations and environments further enhances the immersion, making each match feel like a lively and animated playground.

Kopanito also offers a variety of game modes to keep players engaged. Whether you're enjoying the fast-paced excitement of a quick match or diving into the challenging tournament mode, there's always something new and exciting to try. The multiplayer option, both local and online, adds a competitive edge, allowing you to go head-to-head with friends or players from around the world.

In conclusion, Kopanito is an absolute gem of a game that effortlessly combines hilarity and simplicity into an addictive and enjoyable experience. The funny gameplay, intuitive controls, and charming visuals create an atmosphere of pure fun and entertainment. Whether you're a soccer fan or simply looking for a game to put a smile on your face, Kopanito delivers in spades. Get ready to dive into the zany world of Kopanito and experience soccer like never before. It's an absolute joy from start to finish!

author: {'steamid': '76561198136342182', 'num_games_owned': 1110, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1679188469}
review: O jogo tem uma arte muito bonita, sua jogabilidade é simples e um pouco limitada. Como não curto jogos realistas de futebol, este entreteu bem. Ele tem uma penca de times para desbloquear vencendo campeonatos, destaque para o time dos vampiros, hilário. Seu diferencial está em alguns poucos power ups e no controle da curva da bola. Bom para passar o tempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561199005084400', 'num_games_owned': 81, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 2403, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1704140708}
review:
The player switching is so braindead, I feel like they never even got it to work at all but didnt play the game enough to notice that a core feature was entirely dysfunctional. There are a lot of other glaring problems with the controls (especially the terrible, terrible defaults) and I feel like the developers barely played this.
"Four different difficulty levels. The easiest one is a child's play, while the last one... you'll pull your hair out trying to beat the game."
oh really? how come the legend ai keeps shooting at nothing and missing the goal by a mile? sometimes it even shoots at the sidelines... And on the goal kicks, it passes the ball through the intended recipient, right to me. Pretty sure those aren't on purpose. This game is not finished and never will be.

also why did they make the noses green ... it makes the otherwise fine art style just weird and ugly

review: Pese a la cantidad de malas criticas que puede tener este juego en mis casi 16 horas tanto jugando en solitario, como con amigos de forma local puedo decir que es un juego ampliamente divertido y que vas a tener muchas risas aseguradas asi como muy probablemente muchos momentos tilt pero ¿que juego de futbol no tiene eso?... los controles son faciles de aprender, su apartado grafico caricaturesco lo hace interesante. author: {'steamid': '76561198435580552', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1690766808}
review: For me the game was busted. For some reason on the team select screen I get a HUGE FPS drop and it is impossible (not exaggerating) to pick a team. 20 minutes, at 50% resolution, fullscreen off, just to get to the S's to select Spain. Requested a refund. Too bad because the game is quite fun but the whole point was to beat my Spanish wife with the US team and I can't do that without being able to pick teams! Random select worked by just avoiding team select altogether...

author: {'steamid': '76561197983843516', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1675102587}
review:
I can play Vatican there, what else do you want?

Horrible framerate while choosing teams is probably the biggest issue. I also don't like unrealistic results between ai games (seems like Kopanito simulates those matches on 6 minutes settings, without taking into consideration 2 or 4 minutes games), lack of place to spend earned coins and maybe better progression system.

Team editor would be nice thing to have (strange that there's exotic nation like Monaco, but no Azerbaijan or Mongolia) and with that maybe option to add attributes for players to make stronger nation in theory stronger than the worst one (big guys are only locked behind progression/difficulty wall, but there's no player stats here).

author: {'steamid': '76561199183025870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 906, 'last_played': 1709225469}
review:
Consejos para hacer milanesas clásicas
¿Cual es la mejor carne para milanesas?
Los cortes que se suelen usar son cinco o seis que varían en precio y características: La Cuadrada  y por el mismo precio, con buena proporción de carne y grasa, la Bola de lomo son las más populares. Un poquito más cara está la Nalga y el que nunca falla salvo al bolsillo es el Peceto.

La nalga se caracteriza por cortes grandes de una sola pieza. En cambio, el peceto, por ejemplo, ofrece cortes más pequeños y redondos. Lo que sí es bastante más magro. Suele ser una carne tierna y sin nervios.

La bola de lomo, si bien es muy jugosa, como está compuesta por dos músculos, sucede que si se la corta muy fina a veces se desarma un poco. La cuadrada en cambio da un bife de una sola pieza pero mas suele ser una carne mucho más fibrosa.

Para ablandar la carne para milanesa: Si te toca una carne muy dura, podés darle unos golpes para que se ablande un poco.

review:
Casi el 100%, solo puedo decir: Kopanito no tiene nada que envidiarle a FIFA.
Tiene trofeos, selecciones, multi (creo que perfectamente puede ser 5 vs 5 en linea),
tablas de puntuación online, logros, cromos, etc.

Muy divertido, muy agradable, es desafiante con sus 4 dificultades. 
Un must buy si te gusta el genero. No decepciona, para nada.
Gracias Davuti por el juegazo ♥

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 521, 'last_played': 1671841744}
review:
"Kopanito All-Stars Soccer" ist ein Arcade Fußball-Spiel.

Das Spiel ist alles andere als eine Simulation. Jede Mannschaft hat nur fünf Feldspieler und einen Torwart, Strafen gibt es nicht und so können wir problemlos Gegner mit einer Blutgrätsche im Strafraum niedermähen. Hin und wieder erhalten wir auch einsetzbare Power-Ups wie zum Beispiel einen riesigen Ventilator, der den Ball eine kurze Zeit lang vom eigenen Strafraum fernhält. 

Wir spielen als National-Mannschaft (mit der Ausnahme von Spezial-Mannschaften wie Weihnachtsmännern), dürfen aber zunächst nur als ein kleines Land starten. Und so wird die erste Partie im Pokal der winzigen Länder dann zum Beispiel zwischen den Cook-Inseln und dem Vatikan ausgetragen. Im Laufe der Zeit schalten wir neue Nationen und neue Pokal-Meisterschaften frei. 

Die KI ist allerdings zwar ganz okay, aber auch nicht die hellste. Partien gegen echte Gegner bieten naturgemäß einen höheren Unterhaltungswert. 

Mechanisch ist das Game relativ simpel. Es gibt nur wenige zu bedienende Tasten und die funktionieren auch relativ intuitiv. Sind wir vor dem gegnerischen Tor können wir durch Tastendruck, der die Zeit kurzzeitig verlangsamt, die Flugkurve für unseren Torschuß beeinflussen. 

Das Spiel ist auf Spaß ausgelegt, das wird allein schon durch die comichafte Grafik deutlich. Die Sounds sind erwartungsgemäß simpel, aber passend. Das Spiel hat keinerlei taktische Tiefe. Es geht nur darum, in kurzen Partien unkomplizierten Spaß zu haben. Und genau das erreicht das Spiel auch recht souverän. 

Als kleinen Kritikpunkt kann man noch anbringen, daß die Steuerung manchmal etwas träge wirkt und man nur in die Nähe des Torwarts kommen muß, um den Ball gleich an ihn zu verlieren. Das sind aber nur Kleinigkeiten. Ansonsten ist das Spiel sehr unterhaltsam und genau richtig für den unkomplizierten Kick zwischendurch.  

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
6/10 Atmosphäre
-/10 Story
7/10 Grafik
6/10 Sound
7/10 Spielmechanik
7/10 Balancing
7/10 Spielspass

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Fun-Kick.

[h1][b]7/10 Gesamtwertung

author: {'steamid': '76561198207649600', 'num_games_owned': 1989, 'num_reviews': 369, 'playtime_forever': 1475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 985, 'last_played': 1667115164}
review:
Довольно увлекательная аркадная игра в футбол со своими плюсами и минусами. 

Из плюсов:
- занятный и увлекательный геймлей, который очень разнится по уровням сложности. Если на самом легком уровне сложности можно спокойно бегать с мячом и делать дриблинг, то на уровне сложности "легенда" весь процесс передвижения это пасы и подкаты и, чтобы на нем побеждать, придётся приложить очень много усилий.
- достойное звуковое сопровождение. Его здесь хоть и не так много, но сделано в целом качественно.
- возможность создать gif-анимацию гола и сохранить на компьютер. Иногда случаются действительно эпические моменты и радует возможность без лишних заморочек их оставить на память.
- в целом неплохая картинка. Звёзд  неба не хватает, но и глаза не режет.
- забавные супер-действия.

Из минусов:
- большое количество чемпионатов, отличающихся только дизайном поля и количеством матчей, проходить которые со временем наскучивает. Чтобы открыть уровень сложности "легенда", придётся пройти почти все чемпионаты на уровне сложности "профессионал". Это конечно заставит отточить навыки, но на мой взгляд можно было бы так не затягивать игру, тем более, что все матчи однотипны.
- страны друг от друга ничем не отличаются, кроме внешнего вида, то есть все футболисты и команды идентичны между собой по силе.
- создаваемая gif-анимация чуть больше по весу, чем допустимая в steam, поэтому приходится её ужимать, чтобы здесь выложить.

В целом играть интересно. Уровни сложности позволяют либо раслабленно погонять мяч в своё удовольствие, либо в поте лица выбивать победу. С друзьями играть, наверняка, будет ещё веселее, поэтому если любите погонять в футбол, то эта игра даст вам много положительных эмоций.

author: {'steamid': '76561198292379808', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 802, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1673460798}
review:
刚买《unspottable》的时候就感觉，那个游戏特别适合由最多4人改成最多8人。因为对于制作方来说没有什么成本，但是对于玩家来说，那种游戏人越多越好玩。后来没想到，2022年7月8日，那个游戏真的更新成了最多本地8个人。
期待咱们这个游戏也能更新成本地十人，不然每次玩的时候，只有五个人能玩，另外四五个人只能看着，太难受了。这种游戏就是人越多越欢乐。
I expect the game can cover up to 10 players very much!

author: {'steamid': '76561198027129521', 'num_games_owned': 821, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 397, 'last_played': 1660770641}
review:
Karikatura / parodie na fotbálek. Ale s perfektní hratelností, super odreagování. Zapomeňte na rozhodčího, pravidla a pomalu i nějaký pokusy o kombinace (zvlášť ve vyšších obtížnostech). Ručně malovaná grafika je super.

Na vyšší obtížnost (PRO+) musíte switchnout pohled na hru. Kombinací to nevyhrajete, rozhodně nechcete být u míče jako první. Protože pokud jste, okamžitě vás protivník sejme skluzem. Radši nechat sebrat míč soupeře a pak sejmout jeho :)

Během hry můžete používat powerups - energie na ně se nabíjí podle toho, jak velké máte držení míče.

+ možno považovat za hru, u které se na pár minut dokážete odreagovat
+ grafika
+ kupa achievementů
+ hodně turnajů, odemykání týmů za vyhrané turnaje
+ totální masakr, skluzy rulezz
+ míň fotbalu, více nefér hry - skluzy, powerups
+ super týmy - vedle klasických států i hodně neznámé státy. Nebo třeba santa sobi, případně vampíři (za ty hraju rád :))
+ za pár korun docela dost zábavy
+ lokální multiplayer až pro 10 hráčů (5 za každý tým)
+ rankings
+ bonusové úkoly per zápas - za splnění dostáváte ranking body

- online multiplayer - téměř nikdo to nehraje
- variabilita gólů nic moc, naučíte se jeden styl a ten pravděpodobně pojedete (sniper mód). Nicméně o to větší radost, když dáte nějakou parádičku (nůžky, hlavičku...)
- počítač se snaží vyhrávat tím, že dostává lepší power up bonusy (na PRO+ má v každé hře SuperShot, to se hráči povede jednou za 5-10 her)

author: {'steamid': '76561198060423911', 'num_games_owned': 1131, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 3097, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3059, 'last_played': 1690150382}
review:
Пам'ятаю, в дитинстві із двоюрідним братом файно рубалися в "Kunio-kun no Nekketsu Soccer League" на NES. Такий собі "футбол без правил", де чимало (по стандартам тієї консолі) команд-збірних, керуванням одним гравцем та купа веселощів.
Проте набагато пізніше, вже через емулятори, скільки не намагалися, так і не змогли хоча б наблизитися до того фану, що був раніше... на тому і забили.
Проте, якось в Steam я натрапив на "Kopanito: All-Stars Soccer", і одного погляду на постер було достатньо, щоб зрозуміти: "Це ВОНО!".

Отож, ця гра - аркадний футбол, командами 5 на 5 польових, із відсутністю покарань за грубу гру, без штрафних, пенальті та офсайдів... А ще тут просто купа-купезна національних збірних команд, від Аруби до Бразилії, плюс декілька фентезійних збірних (Санта Клаусів, вампірів,...). Звісно присутня і Україна.

Та це ще не все. Крім того, що тут відбір м'яча підкатом, із супутнім посиланням суперника в нокдаун, це - норма, так ще є і особливі ефекти:
[list]
[*]супер удар - м'яч без зупину летить через все поле, поки не вріжеться в будь що, і при цьому, гравець який активував цей ефект може керувати напрямком руху м'яча;
[*] телепорт - телепортує гравця (із м'ячем, або без) на середню відстань в заданому напрямку;
[*]магніт - в будь якій ситуації притягує м'яч до футболіста, яким в цей момент керує гравець;
[*]вентилятор - тимчасово опускає величезний вентилятор, за воротами команди гравця, і коли він набирає повні оберти то видуває все що рухається в його напрямку (м'яч в перше чергу);
[*]замороження - тимчасово заморожує все в радіусі, що поступово збільшується, від футболіста під керуванням;
[*]дрон тесла - запускає дрон над м'ячем, і той хто ним володіє має можливість виконати до п'яти ударів блискавкою, по випадковим гравцям суперника в певному радіусі, але якщо суперник заволодіває м'ячем, то і керування дроном теж переходить до нього.
[/list]
 "Kopanito: All-Stars Soccer" це все-таки міні футбол, тож тут діє правило чистого часу (відлік часу зупиняється коли м'яч не в грі). Із справжніх правил тут є аути, кутові і звісно голи. Також воротарі мають свої привілеї: крім очевидної можливості брати м'яча до рук, його неможливо послати в нокдаун підкатом, чи заморозити, але в той же час не можна самостійно взяти його під керування, також немає можливости водити ним м'яча.
Іще із особливостей: в момент нанесення прицільного удару, час уповільнюється, і дається можливість вибрати напрямок та силу удару і закрутити його. Гравці не мають власних характеристик, і є абсолютно однаковими в керуванні, тож перемога, скажімо,  Естонії над Німеччиною, тут - звичайна справа.
Також присутні декілька арен (футбольних полів) на яких немає аутів та кутових, це такі собі манежі, на кшталт хокейної арени, де поле закінчується бортом (стіною), від якої м'яч відскакує і повертається в поле.

 Гра  надає чотири рівні складності, і зазначу що різниця між ними дуже помітна і повністю відповідає своїй назві (новачок, середній, професійний, легендарний).
Також тут присутньо немало трофеїв: чемпіонатів (таблиці) та кубків (на виліт). Причому саме перемогою в таких змаганнях відкриваються спочатку заблоковані команди (їх більшість).
Із гордістю доповідаю, що я із двоюрідним братом виборов усі трофеї на рівні складності Професіонал, в результаті чого нами було відкрито ВСІ команди.

 Із мінусів: не дуже вдало реалізовано відбір м'яча без підкату; призупинки гри для повернення гравців на свої позиції під час стандартів; візуальне "диркання" гравця через постійну зміну напрямку руху; рідкісне але необґрунтоване піргальмовування... та все це дрібниці.
Єдиний справжній недолік - мертвий онлайн.

Повертаючись до збірної України, в ній є навіть один справжній гравець - Андрій Шевченко. Проте ми з братом [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2803672083]придумали[/url] із ким пов'язати кожного із гравців: Євген Коноплянка, Євген Селезньов, Дмитро Чигринський, Сергій Назаренко, та звісно Олександр Шовковський (правда, часів "Сашко, де ти гуляв?!!").

"Kopanito: All-Stars Soccer" - гра, яку я сміливо рекомендую, особливо в якості офлайн паті-гри, для компанії любителів футболу. Тут є можливість одночасного керування із клавіатури і чотирьох геймпадів, тобто можна розібрати одразу ВСІХ гравців однієї команди і грати, так би мовити, повністю живою силою.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080493208', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 647, 'last_played': 1489863952}
review:
I'm always ready for some fun and quirky arcade sports, and soccer is such a beloved sport for me personally that I was eager to give Kopanito All-Stars Soccer a try. In terms of what it does well, I have to praise it for the responsiveness of its controls. Everything is tight and quick and you feel like success or failure hinges on your execution. I also love international soccer, so having so many international teams and tournaments to choose from was particularly exciting for me. The FIFA World Cup is probably my favorite singular sporting event in the entirety of the wide world of sports, and I just love the nature and concept of competitive multi-national soccer tournaments. There were also some fun power ups - things like a giant fan that you can use to blow back a shot from your opponent and a freeze ability that puts any opponents in your vicinity in a block of ice for a period of time, among others. 

On the other side of the coin, I was disappointed that there was no unique flavor to any of the squads. The only differences were cosmetic in terms of their flag and uniforms, along with their appearance on the pitch. Playing one team is the same as playing any other, and that was a very big negative for me. It would have been nice to have unique rosters/players/attributes so that there would have been some personality and flavor to the various opponents. It would have also been nice to have special moves associated with unique players, giving even more added flavor to everything, rather than the meter that opens up a power-up for whoever you want to use it. Everything feels pretty bare-bones because of these omissions. Additionally, despite things being mechanically responsive, the actual nuts and bolts were too simplistic for my liking. Everything boils down to an endless succession of slide tackles, looking to open up a bit of space to unleash a shot. Just because you are an arcade sports title does not mean that you have to lack depth - just look at Super Mega Baseball, for example. Kopanito really lacked the finesse I was looking for, but it also was lacking in the pick-up-and-play-fun department in comparison to many of its genre siblings. Finally, online seemed to be non-existent. With seemingly no community, you're left playing the A.I. I really wanted to love this game because, in concept, it's right up my alley. Unfortunately the flaws detract too heavily for an emphatic recommendation. It's certainly not bad, but it misses the mark in too many areas to warrant significant attention. It's one of many ordinary 3/5's for me.

review:
Se você procura algo como FIFA ou PES, não tem nenhuma relação e é um formato de game totalmente diferente.
Eu diria que é uma excelente pedida para quem gosta de jogos mais simples, ou até mesmo quer ter experiências diferentes do que temos hoje de jogos de futebol alternativo. É bem recomendado jogar com amigos, mas o single player pode ser bem divertido, mesmo chegando um ponto que ficam todos "robotizados"

author: {'steamid': '76561199016000024', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 1267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1138, 'last_played': 1654556805}
review:
El fútbol​ (del inglés británico football, traducido como balompié)3​ es un deporte de equipo jugado entre dos conjuntos de once jugadores cada uno mientras que algunos árbitros que se ocupan de que las normas se cumplan correctamente. Es ampliamente considerado el deporte más popular del mundo, pues lo practican unas 270 millones de personas.4​ También se le conoce como futbol asociación o fútbol asociación, nombre derivado de The Football Association, primera federación oficial del mundo en este deporte y que utilizó ese nombre para distinguirlo de otros deportes que incluyen la palabra "futbol" o "fútbol".5​ En algunos países de habla inglesa también se le conoce como soccer, abreviatura de association, puesto que el nombre de football en esos países se asocia mayoritariamente a otros deportes con esa denominación (principalmente en Estados Unidos, donde el nombre football aplica para el fútbol americano, un deporte totalmente distinto).

El terreno de juego es rectangular de césped natural o artificial, con una portería o arco a cada lado del campo. Se juega mediante una pelota que se debe desplazar a través del campo con cualquier parte del cuerpo que no sean los brazos o las manos, y mayoritariamente con los pies (de ahí su nombre). El objetivo es introducirla dentro de la portería o arco contrario, acción que se denomina marcar un gol. El equipo que logre más goles al cabo del partido, de una duración de 90 minutos, es el que resulta ganador del encuentro.

El juego moderno fue reinventado en Inglaterra tras la formación de la Football Association, cuyas reglas de 1863 son la base del deporte en la actualidad. El organismo rector del fútbol es la Federación Internacional de Fútbol Asociación, más conocida por su acrónimo FIFA. La competición internacional de fútbol más prestigiosa es la Copa Mundial de Fútbol, organizada cada cuatro años por dicho organismo. Este evento es el más famoso y el que cuenta con mayor cantidad de espectadores del mundo, doblando la audiencia de los Juegos Olímpicos.6​

review:
Machen wirklich viel Spass mit Emanuel! Doll du!

Wollten zuerst NBA 2K20 spielen. Funktionierte absolut gar nicht online. Dann suchten wir eine günstige Alternative und stiessen auf Kopanito. Wirklich grossartiges Spiel, welches auf Anhieb funktionierte. Das Spiel ist rundenbasiert und macht richtig Spass, vor allem mit Freunden!

Kauf es und spiel es, jetzt!

review: Kopanito arkadaşlarınızla eğlenceli futbol maçları oynayabileceğiniz atari tadında mini FİFA veya PES oyunu. Oyun oldukça zevkli ancak online oynamak istediğinizde sunucularda rakip bulmuyor. Buna rağmen nostalji yaşatıyor. Futbol oyunlarına benim gibi düşkünseniz kütüphanenizde bulunmasında yarar var. Keyifli oyunlar..

author: {'steamid': '76561198329196754', 'num_games_owned': 661, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1626928198}
review:
Great soccer game! I've never been a big fan of soccer, but oh boy, this game really gives me a lot of fun!
Very accessible for non-soccer fans. Very recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073802975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 533, 'last_played': 1627012678}
review: Cuando tus amigos tienen unos pesos extras y te regalan algo como esto (porque no les alcanzó para el juego que el resto del grupo esta jugando seguido), lo mejor es ponerle buena cara... ooh! Es muy divertido para pasar el rato, no es un juego para competir. Después de una hora de juego no lo vas a querer ver ni en una propaganda de YouTube... Recomendado para jugar dos o tres partidos y a lo que sigue.

review: Bir çıtır çerez oyun daha. Ayriyetten de başarılı bir çalışma. Yetersiz sistemler için gerçekten bir başyapıt. Dost düşman demeden herkesin hayatına kayabilme potansiyelini avuçlarınızın içinde bulundurduğunuz bu oyun PES'in yerini bir nebze de olsa da doldurabiliyor. Can sıkıntısında girilip oynanabilecek türden.

author: {'steamid': '76561199029414065', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 723, 'last_played': 1703944964}

author: {'steamid': '76561198256098710', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1662321573}
review:
Hermoso juego de fuchibol, 1000 veces mas divertido que el Fifa y el Pes, vale lo mismo que un alfajor y te da horas infinitas.
Jugarle a la maquina en maxima dificultad es como tratar de ganarle una carrera a usain bolt cuando no tenes piernas. Lo jugas con tus amigos para cagarte de risa. Es bastante facil de entender los controles pero dificil de perfeccionarlo. Aca no existe selecciones mejores que otras por eso preparate para jugar con angola o Lesoto. Si sos el cagon que elegia el barca-real madrid en el fifa no te recomiendo esta joyita

review:
Esta simpatico. Muy repetitivo y da igual el equipo que vayas a coger porque son todos iguales. Peca quizas de ser muy simple pero a su vez es adictivo para un buen rato y varios torneos rapido. El online está totalmente muerto, pero quizas con amigos si te echarias unas risas seguro. 
Ojala sacasen una nueva entrega donde haya tacticas en el campo para colocar tus jugadores a tu antojo mas cositas para que no sea tan monotono.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000276114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1683068149}

author: {'steamid': '76561198067581857', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 989, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 836, 'last_played': 1704088656}
review:
This game is super fun to play, from casual to hardcore. It's a football game within the Mario Kart verse. Everything is bonkers and the usual rules (fouls, offside, and even throw ins and corners, depending on the stadium) doesn't exist. Steal the ball with a giant magnet (that for some reason attracts the ball (?)), have a giant fan be your goalkeeeper for a couple of seconds, or even freeze (literally) the opposition players (and your team mates!!!).

It's a ton of fun, easy to learn game. Specially fun to play co-op/versus. Highly recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561199155033441', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 945, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1669465838}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020315130', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1615, 'last_played': 1688581479}
review:
I wan the Euro Championship, beating Spain, Germany and Italy with Elves. Yes!!! :-D

The only slightly unrealistic event was that I also beated The Red Devils . But oké, Elves áre other worldly ;-)

I use this game for gaming on the tv with some old xbox 360 controllers. This gives me and my son a great time. Especially fun are all the super moves and the tackling without restrictions on both allies and foo's alike =D

author: {'steamid': '76561198097800107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 384, 'last_played': 1621863400}
review:
This is a small cute game that strips digital football mechanics down to a primitive arcade level. Yet, don't take it as something necessarily bad: Kopanito is really fun to play, especially when you START to dig the controls and have the general pattern of the game's AI. The bad thing is that the game gets too old very quickly AFTER you master the technical side. You either destroy every thing alive on lower difficulties or drip with blood and sweat on the higher ones. Maybe I'm not the best player (which is possibly the case), but after 5 hours in the game I rip and tear any team on amateur and quite suffer on the professional difficulty. The bad thing is that I just don't want to continue the learning curve, because winning on harder difficulties simply requires doing the same things but quicker. The game totally lacks the strategic aspect, it's all about the tiki-taka, constant ball movement and quick reaction (actually, the things you really expect from an arcade). It's not a bad game per se, just becomes old very quickly.

I'll sum it up
PROS:
- The game's mechanics are really fun. Don't expect you'll beat a lot of teams right from the start, there's a learning curve here that can be mastered in 1-2 hours.
- The graphics are pretty much okay, the visual style is comic and funny.
- I like the arcade-ish bonuses and abilities that you can activate during the match: launch a flaming ball that sweeps away anyone on its way, freeze or shock your opponents, teleport with the ball. Anything goes!
- No referees, free kicks, offsides or cards. Do the two-leg sliding tackle on a player off the ball and watch 'em suffer!

CONS:
- Becomes too difficult (at least for me) on higher levels. No appeal in improving your skills, because you actually do the same thing but faster.
- Some of the bonus effects in the game are bad, I think there is more room for imprement here.
- Goalies are pretty much stupid and absolutely dominate in one-on-ones. Basically, the only way to score is a long shot after a web of passes.
- The game could use some personalisation like player names, goal statistics etc. I know it's an arcade game, but all teams are absolutely equal and there is no difference between the Cook Islands and Argentina, for example. 
- Tactics, anyone?! At least I want to send my lads all forward when I'm losing one goal on 88:15!!

review:
A fun wee football game in short bursts but i mean short bursts, play it for much longer and it becomes very grindy and there's a lot of achievements that you would have to grind for a long, long time to get.

I wish there was a little bit more to it as every game feels the same but play against a friend and it comes into it's own.

So saying all that and  it's still recommended especially at sale prices

author: {'steamid': '76561198059825119', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 2270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2270, 'last_played': 1612548198}
review:
I will recommend this game because of its positive sides: 
- It's very fun to play ( but only for a while! ),
- It's a good arcade football game with humoristic elements, 
- The graphics and sound are ok,
- It has some original elements like the super moves. 

However, this game could have been much better IMO, if it didn't have some obvious flaws like: 
- First of all, this game doesn't even try to be a football simulation, and doesn't try to emulate the real life football situations. This will probably frustrate those who played only PES and FIFA so far, so they are not used to football arcade games. I will give you a few examples of what I'm talking about. In this game, there are only a few ways of scoring a goal ( by making a power shot - which means holding the shoot button and releasing it just in the right time, by a header from a corner, and by a volley from an air pass ). The shoot button per se is useless if not in the aforementioned modalities. That means it's impossible to score a goal by a quick shot, or if you are too close to the goal, which is contrary to real life of course. 
Furthermore, something that really bugged me about this game is that you can sprint only withouth the ball, and not with the ball!! What does this mean? This means that while playing against the computer, the AI players will ALWAYS BE FASTER then you. While having the ball, you will not be able to construct some good passing actions, because you will always be in a hurry to shoot the ball, before the AI players quickly steal the ball from you. So keep in mind that the matches will always be chaotic and super fast.
And more, this game doesn't have any foul system, so it is encouraged to always slide tackle at the opponents, which doesn't leave any consequences for you. So basically, this is Kung Fu Fighting Football. 

- There are too many commands. For example, why making a button for "header-shot"? In all other football games, the "shoot" button is at the same time the "header-shot" button. Why making a button for slide tackle? In all games like PES and FIFA, the air pass button is at the same time the tackle button. Also in this game the "select player" button is an extra button, why not make it the "pass" button when you don't have the ball?. So, at the beginning, you will need time to master the commands, and by all means it's better to customize the commands in a way that best suits you. 

- As I said already, Kopanito is fun to play, but only for a relatively short period of time. And then it gets dull and repetitive. Unfortunately this is a matter of fact. The game lacks something to hold you for longer time. This game has 4 difficulties and each difficulty has like 16 tournaments, but all the tournaments feel exactly the same! The colors of the pitch change and that's it. Also - ALL TEAMS ARE THE SAME IN REGARDS OF STRENGHT AND QUALITY! That means it will be exactly the same to play against America Samoa Islands and playing against Brazil! So, when you start playing, you will do a few friendly matches to learn the commands, and then you will start with the first cup on beginner. You will win it. Great, but then you will realize you will have to repeat the same thing 15 times on beginner, then on amateur, then on professional and then on legendary difficulty. Of course, you don't have to ( the achievement hunters will feel compelled to though ), but I think I gave you the idea of the copy-paste feeling that the tournaments emanate in this game. 
So, this game lacks variety, something like a career mode with extra elements like newspaper articles or fans comments that keep track of your results and achievements. 

- This game has an online mode but it doesn't work well. There is no one at the servers, so you will be able to play online only when you arrange with your steam friends. Also, you cannot play the tournaments with your steam friends online, only friendly matches ( why??).  

In conclusion, this is an ok arcade game that will entertain you for a while, but it could be much better with some improvements!

author: {'steamid': '76561198316800721', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 1152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1152, 'last_played': 1610904370}
review:
Kopanito é um jogo divertido de futebol, ficando muito barato na 'sale'. Tudo muito rápido, violência pura, não existe faltas, pode dar carrinho a rodo, com bola e sem bola. Existem quatro dificuldades; Beginner, Amateur, Professional e Legend (precisa ser desbloqueado), de primeira play, a primeira dificuldade já parece ser difícil, ainda mais jogando pelo teclado. Com o tempo e várias partidas, aprende a mecânica do jogo, começa a fazer gol de longe, com o goleiro ou com curvas.

O multijogador está vazio, não existe jogadores nas salas, ao menos que chame amigos para criar uma partida. Mas existe várias ligas e copas em single, são elas: Oceania Cup, Pacific League, Microstates Cup, Asia Cup, Pan Arab League, North American Cup, Central American and Caribbean League, African Cup, Commonwealth, South American League, Pan American League, European Cup, Mediterranean League, World Cup, Continental League, World League e Indoor Cup.

Apesar de variados torneios, a repetição é a mesma, mudando apenas a cor do gramado, sempre jogando uma para desbloquear outra, nas 4 dificuldades, que o torna enjoativo. Além de que vários times 'grandes', também estão bloqueados, precisando cumprir o objetivo estabelecido. Durante a partida, podemos usais itens especiais, como imã que atrai a bola, drone que pode eletrocutar adversários, um leve teletransporte no campo e um chute especial ala Super Onze.

Podemos acessar a ''sala de prêmios", que estão todas as medalhas e troféus que ganhamos nas competições, ela estampa os melhores conforme a vitória nas dificuldades elevadas. Existe um ranking geral de jogadores, com suas estatísticas e pontuação. O jogo possui mais de 200 conquistas, de variados objetivos, para os apaixonados em quantidade. Jogo tem cartas, necessárias 6 para fabricar uma insignia do jogo, podem ser compradas no mercado por ~20 centavos cada.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995890090', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1638704601}
review: Played this in couch co-op and had many laughs.  Reminds me of games I played in the 90s but with a modern feel.  The game mechanics are a lot of fun, including ridiculous curl shots, the lack of a referee (slide tackles get out of hand), and super powers (e.g. placing an enormous fan behind your goal).  Recommend!

author: {'steamid': '76561198079329135', 'num_games_owned': 237, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1631472310}
review:
[quote][b] Хотя я и не являюсь большим фанатом футбола, эта игра мне понравилась. В основном я знаком с играми подобного типа только благодаря телефону и рассчитывал что тут будет как минимум так же, но нет, тут гораздо послабее. Но по скидке в 90% рекомендовать могу. [/b][/quote]


[h1] ㋡👍 Из положительного:[/h1]

  [b]✚[/b] Геймплей. (Простой, интересный, а местами даже увлекательный и азартный.)

  [b]✚[/b] Динамика. (Играть приятно, и во время матча не появляется мысли "а пойти че нибудь поделать". У футболистов есть особые навыки, к примеру притянуть мяч магнитом или телепортироваться.)

  [b]✚[/b] Большой выбор команд и режимов игры. (Ну хоть какое-то разнообразие)

  [b]✚[/b] Мультиплеер/онлайн. (Онлайн 1 на 1 рабочий, а вот остальные... Ну в любом случае с друзьями поиграть можно)
[hr][/hr]

[h1] ☹👎 Из недостатков отмечу: [/h1]

  [b]━[/b] Онлайн. (игру 1 на 1 еще находит, а вот остальные варианты мне так и не удалось опробовать.) 

  [b]━[/b] Вратарь. (Ну для начала, им нельзя управлять, но даже так, предположить что это фишка игры, он иногда тупит и весьма сильно.)

  [b]━[/b] По сравнению с другими, схожими играми, слишком просто. (Даже на телефонах есть более интереснее проекты, в которых и рисовка лучше, и разнообразия действий, полей и так далее.)

  [b]━[/b] Не HD. (Возможно данная проблема только у меня, но разрешение игры не четкое, мыльное. В настройках вроде все выставил как надо, но эффекта это никакого не дало)
[hr][/hr]

[h1] ✎ P.S. [/h1]  Дополнительный[b] " ✚ / ━ " [/b]ВЫ можете указать в комментариях.



[quote][hr][/hr]
[b]P.P.S.[/b] Надеюсь кому-то был полезен этот отзыв и если вам понравилось то вы можете:
[b][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/38751148-Click-Look/]► Подписаться на мою страничку куратора ◄[/url][/b]

Это будет меня мотивировать и вдохновлять на новые обзоры. Благодарю за внимание!
[hr][/hr][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198376707039', 'num_games_owned': 475, 'num_reviews': 196, 'playtime_forever': 406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1606162562}
review:
Перші дві-три години в цій грі, я отримував тільки задоволення. Та і як не отримувати задоволення від простого в освоєнні, аркадного футболу, де можна безнакарно збивати всіх у підкаті, мій внутрішній Гаттузо був просто в захваті. А ще, розробники додали в гру різні здібності, заморозка суперників, телепотрація, магніт, що притягує м’яч, вентилятор, який з’являється поза воротами і не дає забити гол супернику і ще кілька не менш цікавих. Все це загорнуто в приємно-кумедну картинку і дарує веселощі, на початковій і середній складності, а далі починаються труднощі.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2278819088
Спочатку, стає не цікаво грати на мінімальному і середньому рівні складності, бо противники просто не можуть нічого зробити. А на високому, вже я нічого не міг вдіяти, тому що гравці з команди опонента просто блокували всі мої удари по воротам, або забирали м’яч в момент прицілювання. Тут і виявилося, що ігрових механік, мені просто не достатньо для довготривалої гри, бо вони занадто обмежені. Всі здібності, про які я писав вище, видаються випадково, тож якусь тактику придумати не можливо, бо поки видана одна здібність, іншу отримати не можливо. Прискорення гравця, працює тільки коли він без м’яча, тож втекти на швидкості від опонента не вийде. Всі команди рівні по силі, тобто неважливо ким ви граєте і проти кого, а грати тут можна тільки збірними, складність матчу, буде залежити від вибраного рівня тієї ж складності. От і виходить, що після ейфорії перших кількох годин, гра просто видихається і особисто мені, вже не сильно і хочеться повертатися в Kopanito All-Stars Soccer.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2296892678
Якщо розробники зроблять продовження, то їм доведеться потрудитися, щоб зробити гру більш різноманітною і, можливо, більш тактичною. Наприклад, щоб здібність не видавалася випадково, а щоб гравець сам міг обирати, що він хоче використати, щоб було прискорення бігу з м’ячем, щоб можна було придумувати як весело і красиво обігрувати суперників.  А раптом комусь, після перегляду трейлерів гри захочеться її спробувати, як це і було зі мною, то дочекайтеся розпродажу, бо за повну ціну я її не можу рекомендувати. Тільки в такому випадку, витрачених грошей не буде шкода, якщо Kopanito All-Stars Soccer швидко набридне як мені.

author: {'steamid': '76561198397561487', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1708144596}
review:
Excelente juego Offline!

Kopanito no es un multijugador online masivo, ya que no tiene servidores dedicados, pero con una buena conexión podría permitirte buenas horas de diversión con algún amigo hospedando la partida.

Su modo offline es su carta fuerte,varios torneos y copas, la posibilidad de jugar con cualquier país del mundo, torneos y países desbloqueables, un gran juego para aquellos que buscan logros y desbloquear más elementos como en los viejos tiempos.

En resumen, si buscas un juego de fútbol en línea, este no es para tí, pero si lo que buscas es un offline alternativo, no muy costoso y muy bien elaborado este es justo el juego que buscas.

review: Esse jogo é sensacional. Eu demorei anos pra comprar, achando que ia ser um jogo bobo, que eu só ia entrar de vez em quando. Não. Kopanito é um jogo de futebol de verdade, do jeito que todo mundo sempre sonhou que mega man soccer fosse. Os itens devem ser usados com maestria e a física do jogo é muito boa. No fim, tudo se resume à habilidade, treinamento e conhecimento do que da pra fazer no jogo. Comprem, vale muito a pena!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076910910', 'num_games_owned': 2203, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1677060310}
review:
A lot of fun vs. a friend (MP is dead). It takes a bit to get used to though, especially if you are used to play Fifa f.e.

The game has a few annoying things though. Slide tackles are OP, and that can make your own throw-ins a disadvantage, or your goalie kicks etc. But in the end both players have the same things to deal with.
Im only 4 hours in and i know i can still get way better.

I only played one test match on easiest difficulty vs AI, so i cant really say (yet) how much fun that is.
Again, if you like Football (games) its a lot of fun (at least with a friend).

One more thing, if your friend hosts you dont get any steam achievements during that session, if you host though you get them for both your own AND your friends actions.
For fame its the opposite, you only gain it if your friend hosts

review:
Türkçe Açıklama;

Oyun %90 indirim ile 1.15 TL fiyata gelmiş, oyun 11.50 yi bırakın, 22 TL'yi bile hak eden bir oyun. Tek sorunu oyuncusu, onu da arkadaşınız var ise çözebilirsiniz. Muhteşem fiyatında ve konseptinde grafiklere sahip, zevkli ama elinize kramp girmesine neden olacak kasıntılara sahip çok zevkli bir oyun! Kesinlikle almanızı ve koleksiyonunuza eklemenizi tavsiye ederim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198228280296', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1606394993}
review:
Problemas no jogo:

Fonte das letras estranhas, chega até ficar dificil de ler as vezes
Dificil ver quando os poderes estão disponiveis pra serem utilizados
O jogo é basicamente uma chuva de "carrrinhos"
Pra cobrar lateral ou tiro de meta demora uma eternidade
O jogo não tem um tutorial (msm se arrogando de ser um jogo baseado na habilidade do jogador/curva de aprendizagem..) o maximo que tem é um guia no menu explica brevemente as coisas
N tem legenda em portugues (n faz tanta diferença pra mim mas ainda sim)
A troca entre jogadores na partida é ruim


Pelo preço eu n esperava muito, mas achei que seria pelo menos divertido

author: {'steamid': '76561198058967070', 'num_games_owned': 292, 'num_reviews': 180, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1641559073}
review:
如果你沒過玩過 熱血高校系列的足球 你會覺得本作 惡搞的不錯.
如果你玩過 熱血高校足球部 你會覺得本作 有許多不足.
天氣 大絕 特殊技巧組合 隊伍特色 腳色差異 這些都遠遠不足.
你只能當成 稍微暴力惡搞的 足球遊戲.
但是小品價格 特價入手 偶而開來玩玩 是不錯的.
畢竟是洋人的運動惡搞遊戲 想像力上 還是無法媲美日本人.
缺點是 優化普通 有時候會有一點點卡頓.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089839094', 'num_games_owned': 805, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 1103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1627268172}
review:
Es un buen juego, graficamente se nota que es un buen trabajo. Lastimosamente no hay nadie con quién jugar.

Logré jugar una partida y aparte que iba mal la conexión de la partida, la persona que hosteaba la misma, se salió y no pude continuar con el partido. Volví a acceder a la cola de espera y no pude jugar nunca más. No se puede jugar contra la IA tampoco, solo en modo práctica o dos jugadores, creo.

Pienso que este es el tipo de juego que debería estar gratis, ya que no vale la pena comprarlo y no lograr jugar con nadie online. A menos que lo compres con un amigo y poder disfrutarlo juntos, así tal vez se podría aprovechar, de lo contrario, no esperes jugar partidas seguidas con jugadores aleatorios que estén a la espera de unos buenos partidos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077153956', 'num_games_owned': 4302, 'num_reviews': 482, 'playtime_forever': 1669, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1669, 'last_played': 1603403835}
review: Kopanito All-Stars Soccer начал с места в карьер, вроде ранний доступ а уже почти 100 команд и пять супер-ударов. Покупающие умилялись пиксельным красотам и безбашенным геймплеем. Футбол без офсайдов, и судейских свистков, приправленный мега ударами, телепортацией и тесла пушкой вполне мог стать аркадным хитом. Вот только поляки из Merixgames заботились лишь о лёгком заработке. Финальная версия Kopanito почти не отличалась от раннего доступа, добавили несколько турниров, команды Клаусов, Тыкв и прочей нечисти, но простецкий геймплей с неудобным управлением остались нетронутыми. Онлайн практически моментально стал мёртв, играть с друзьями даже в копе совершенно невесело, ибо всё действие представлено в виде алгоритма "подкат-навес-удар". А ведь из игры вполне мог получиться хит в стиле "Убойного футбола", надо было только постараться и наполнить игру правильным контентом. В итоге имеем скучную фармилку достижений, которых аж 226, на что потратите гарантировано 30 часов. Хотя устанете за первые 3. Скучный аркадный футбол, кто бы мог подумать. Еле еле 6.0 за визуал и команду из Тыкв.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158999561', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1042, 'last_played': 1612644360}

review: I loved "Nintendo World Cup" on the NES with their crazy super shots, no penalties for fouls, small field and small number of players. Kopanito picks that game design up and transforms it into a modern game with new abilities, fun teams, and online multiplayer. Love it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198281531821', 'num_games_owned': 251, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 678, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1629919928}
review:
(+) Aksiyon
(+++) Rekabet 
(+++) Optimizasyon
(+) Ses
(-) Müzik
(+) Oynanış
(+++) Eğlence

- Oyunumuz beşer kişilik takımlar halinde oynanan bir futbol oyunudur. 
- Farklı satadlar, takımlar, oynanış süreleri ve zorluk seviyeleri mevcut. 
- Yaklaşık 5-6 tane her iki takıma da ait özel yetenekler mevcut. Bu yetenekler ile rakibinizin size gol atmasını engelleyebilir ya da rakibe daha rahat gol atabilirsiniz. 
- Çoğu indie oyunda olduğu gibi müzikler çokta iyi değil. Oyuna girer girmez ilk yapmanız gereken müzikleri kapatmak olsun. 
- İndie bir oyun için grafikler yeterli. 
- Solo olarak alıp oynanacak iseniz bir zaman sonra sıkacaktır. 
- Eğer bir arkadaş grubunuz varsa oyunu karşılıklı 5v5 bile oynayabilirsiniz. Çünkü oyun 10 kişiye kadar oyuncu destekliyor.
- Oyun zevkli ve eğlenceli vakit geçirebileceğiniz bir oyun.

OYUN İNDİRİMLERDE 1.15 TL

OYUNU TAVSİYE EDERİM. 
OYUNA PUANIM 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198144002490', 'num_games_owned': 1063, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 76705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1699359224}
review:
เกมส์ฆ่าเวลาได้ดีเกมส์นึงเลยเกมส์นี้ มีลูกเล่นเยอะดี 
- ความสนุกเป็นจุดสนใจที่นี่ ฟุตบอลเป็นเพียงเหตุผลหนึ่งที่ทำให้เกมนี้มีอยู่
- มีตัวเลือกมากมายให้ปลดล็อก (มีการอ้างอิงถึงผู้เล่นตัวจริงแฟนบอลจะหัวเราะ)
- สนามที่แตกต่างกันและสินค้าสวยงามและแม้แต่สนามฟุตซอล
- โหมดเกมออฟไลน์ Online Coop และ VS.
- จะมีการใช้มหาอำนาจซึ่งอาจทำให้เส้นทางของเกมเปลี่ยนไป
- อย่าประมาทเกมในความยากลำบากมากขึ้นอาจเป็นนรกที่แท้จริงที่จะเป็นแชมป์

author: {'steamid': '76561198037176619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1650680672}
review:
- Diversão é o foco aqui. O futebol é apenas um motivo para esse jogo existir.

- Diversas seleções para desbloquear (existe referências a jogadores reais, fãs de futebol irão dar umas risadas).

- Alguns campos diferentes e bens bonitos, e até quadras de futsal.

- Modo de jogo offline, Online Coop e VS.

- Vão existir superpoderes para serem utilizados, que podem acabar mudando o ruma da partida.

- Não menospreze o jogo, em dificuldades maiores pode ser um verdadeiro inferno ser campeão.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022366727', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 585, 'last_played': 1601778966}
review:
Quite a fun game, specially when you are in need of just playing a game without having to think too much. I particularly love the fact that they added several leagues and cups for every continent (and even some special grouping of countries), as I do generally look for that in sports games – don't really much care about the online side of things or playing friendly matches.

Would be fun if scenarios were added, such as having to come back from a 3x0 deficit against Germany, using a smaller nation team.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147567052', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 243, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1597281943}
review:
Kopanito All-Stars Soccer é um game de futebol com jogabilidade simples e que nos traz a nostalgia do antigo Hero Soccer do Nintendinho 8 bits. Aqui não há faltas e há implementação de alguns poderes como super chute, super ventania atrás do gol, raios nos jogadores, imã para atrair a bola.

Os estádios possuem boa variação como campos de gramado, terra, quadras, etc. São diversas seleções do mundo mas não há diferença de habilidade entre elas. Também existem diversas Ligas que podem ser jogadas no estilo classificação de grupos ou sistema mata-mata.

Kopanito All-Stars Soccer é descontraído e foge dos jogos de futebol realistas, aqui o game é voltado para os jogadores de futebol mais casuais.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047319777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1792, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1019, 'last_played': 1671898817}
review:
First and foremost: if you haven't played this game yet, shame on you. It's brilliant.

Second: if you're about to play it for the first time, prepare yourself for a good spanking.
That's right, this is exactly what will most likely happen when you'll play this game for the first time.

Let me get straight to the point, this game is so hard to master that it becomes frustrating more often than not (and believe it or not, this is its main strength).
Using manual passing (mandatory if you want to pull some acrobatic moves, more on that later), I got some heavy defeats at the lowest level before even being able to score a goal (if we don't count the ones scored thanks to the power-ups).

Here lies the good of this game: it's almost entirely skill-based.
There's no difference between teams, you could easily defeat Brazil/France/Belgium using Suriname. There's no difference between players: all of them run as fast, shoot as hard and pass as well, and none of them will ever get tired.
The only thing that matters is how well you control your players and how lucky you are with power-ups through the match (everyone would love to always have super shots, innit?).

Let's talk about gameplay: the ones of you who played Nintendo World Cup (I know I'm old) will surely find some of it in this game: super shots, no fouls of any kind, fast-paced arcadey action.
Is this something bad? Not at all.
Once you get used to the passing system and to how your players move/react (they're not glued to the ball path and this will make controlling passes a nightmare at the beginning), this game starts to shine: you can create some good looking (and definitely rewarding) moments of football with this, and I'm sure that when you'll see your first curled shot curve 'round the keeper, kiss the post and go in you'll jump off your chair, pumping your fist in the air like I did.
Add to this that with manual passing enabled (a thing which brings the game to a whole new level) you'll also be able to perform overhead kicks, diving headers and a variety of first-time shots that will more often than not result in the keeper being beat if performed within a reasonable range.

Soon you'll master the first-time controls and the special moves so well that you'll start consistently beating the AI, and that's the moment when you'll decide to raise the bar and move to the next level. Rinse and repeat, get ready for another good round of spanking.
As you progress further, you'll then realize that power-ups can be used in several ways: freezing your opponents during a corner kick so you could have open field for a counter or to stop a special shot, using the ball magnet to pull the ball from the GK's hands into the goal, using your opponents' tesla-copter at your advantage so it will electrocute them instead of you. Your fantasy is the limit here.

Several cups and leagues (including a World league in which your team will have to take on 31 opponents to be crowned World Champion) definitely add to the game's longevity and help you past the game's shortcomings (which I have to admit aren't that big).

Yes, you've read it right: this game has also some flaws.

First of all, keepers don't always react as they should, especially on curled shots: some shots that you'd expect to be easily saved go in instead, but it's by design (it's even stated in the manual that keepers 'do get confused' by swerving shots) and affects both your keeper and the AI-controlled one so it's definitely fair. It's not like the AI-controlled GK is superhuman and you're left with Loris Karius in goal. Every keeper has a Karius photo in their locker, here.
This adds to the game's over-the-top feeling, as it definitely helps the crazy scorelines which, again, are expected to happen by design. No dull 0-0 draws during a cold and rainy evening here (there's no rain whatsoever, anyway).
Another thing that I noticed and that I don't really like much is that the AI-controlled players seem to perform first-time shots from their half in situations that wouldn't require them to do so, and it happens way too often.

And well, I had a player of mine getting stuck in the net once and had to quit the game but it only happened once so I don't think it counts.

Other than that, trust me, this game is great fun against the AI, and it's a blast against friends.
Great value for the money, that's guaranteed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198286302767', 'num_games_owned': 500, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 636, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 599, 'last_played': 1679189163}
review:
Sinceramente este juego me encanto, pero mas que nada en las primeras horas.
  Lamentablemente despues de un tiempo vas sintiendo que el juego se siente algo "Vacio" con detalles como que los estadios son todos iguales (a excepción de 2) con la unica diferencia, el logo en el medio de la cancha, los espectadores de las tribunas estan completamente estaticos, al igual que las celebraciones de un gol. Pasa lo mismo con los poderes obtenidos son muy pocos y se tornan aburrido, como cuando ganas o perdes un partido, solo suena el pitido del arbitro y ya, una interfaz con puntos y sin musica. En el unico momento que se escucha el sountrack es en el menu principal
 Me encantaria que se agregase nuevas canchas con tematicas, distintos fondos, modos de juegos que prolonguen mas la vida del Kopanito, edicion de equipos donde puedas editar tanto su aspecto como el festejo de un gol.
 Este es mi aporte con esta reseña que no va a aportar nada seguramente, de igual manera me gustaria dejar algunas ideas:
Estadios en la playa, en un lugar nevado, con lluvias. cementerios o en una ciudad algo mas "futbol callejero" y en cada una habra "algo" que haga mas dificil el partido (autos en el futbol callejero, zombies golpeando a los jugadores si se acercan a las tumbas en el cementerio), me encantaria que se animaran a agregar mas contenido, seria un muy buen juego tan divertido y podria hacerse hasta bizarro inclusive. 
De igual manera es un juego muy recomendable pero esta es mi humilde opinion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198872671023', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 874, 'last_played': 1596873007}
review:
[h1]A TENER EN CUENTA [/h1]

*Recomiendo comprarlo en oferta.
*Los controles pueden resultar incómodos al principio pero a lo largo que vayas jugando se te irán haciendo más fáciles [strike](jugar con teclado durante una prolongada cantidad de tiempo puede que te provoque un buen dolor de muñecas)[/strike].
*Mecánicas divertidas, me gusta que cuenta con poderes que determinan el rumbo de un partido de un momento a otro, lindo para pasar el tiempo cuando estás aburrido solo o con amigos.
*Cuenta con la opción de crear un GIF para cuando te mandás tremenda jugada y la querés guardar.
*A pesar de pedir pocos requisitos, en algunas partes me llegaron a dar unos buenos bajones de FPS, como por ejemplo cuando estás eligiendo el equipo o en jugadas rápidas.
*Cuenta con múltiples torneos que al ganarlos con determinadas dificultades vas desbloqueando equipos especiales o selecciones importantes, eso expande la rejugabilidad.
*Posee una tabla clasificatoria mundial y local, esta última solo competís con tus amigos de Steam que tengan el juego; donde a medidas que ganes partidos vas sumando puntos y ascendiendo en esta.

[h1]Reseña[/h1] 

[u]Estética:[/u] 7.5
[u]Música ambiental:[/u] 7
[u]Banda sonora:[/u] 7
[u]Sonidos en general:[/u] 6.5
[u]Cinemáticas:[/u] 5 [strike](tomando la cómica escena donde te dan la copa si salís campeón)[/strike]
[u]Historia:[/u] ----------
[u]Controles:[/u] 6
[u]Jugabilidad:[/u] 8.5
[u]Rejugabilidad:[/u] 9
[u]Diseño de interfaz de usuario:[/u] 8.5
[u]Precio:[/u] 7.5

[u]Nota final[/u]: 7.25/10

review: Sou viciado em FIFA e PES, e esse jogo me surpreendeu muito positivamente, é divertido e um ótimo passatempo para se divertir casualmente!

author: {'steamid': '76561197974379501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 481, 'last_played': 1689708308}
review:
Seul ou avec la famille (j'y joue avec ma femme et mes fils de 8 et 9 ans), on se régale ! Au départ, c'est assez délicat de trouver ses repères, on se mélange souvent les pinceaux, on ne sait plus qui est qui, on se trompe de bouton, mais c'est justement parce que ça fait partie de ces jeux qui ont besoin d'apprentissage pour être maîtrisés. Alors on fait 1 matc, puis 2,... puis 30. Et on ne voit pas le temps passer. 
Après 2-3 sessions de 1h de jeu, ça commence à bien rentrer, et on se surprend à faire des matchs plus techniques, et en mode Professionel. Et surtout, beaucoup de rires, de cris et d'émotions. Un très bon petit jeu qui promet de bons moments de partage et de fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197981593205', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1623169560}
review:
For less than 1 pound its a brilliant little game. Picked it up on sale.
Plays a lot like an arcade game with toon style, but huge amounts of fun.
Has maybe the best banana shots in any football game to boot.
If your looking for a pro game like pes or fifa this isnt it. For gamer`s that mod or update pes or fifa though
you don`t have to jump threw all sorts of hoops and install dodgy tools to mod this.
Everything is moddable ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197988723506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 685, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1608990314}
review: Я не могу определиться. Вроде игра прикольная и атмосферная, но блять такое тупое управление это пиздец. Вместо паса своему вратарь всегда отдаёт мяч сопернику, он просто бьёт мимо своих, хотя пас от игрока игроку идёт с ассистом и без ошибок. Когда ты бежишь к мячу и вот-вот уже готов, взяв его, передать пас своему - срабатывает переключение на другого игрока и хуй тебе, а не мяч, твой игрок просто отбегает от него, управляемый компьютером. Подкаты... Бежишь, прицелился, жмёшь подкат, но в этот самый момент твой игрок, управляемый компьютером перехватывает мяч у соперника, управление переходит к тебе и ты... посылаешь мяч нахер навесом в ебеня.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073147247', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2044, 'last_played': 1695752751}
review:
This is an excellent little indie soccer game!
It's fully skill based, meaning every team and player has the same stats.

That means the game is meant for cooperative or competitive play between friends. It will probably become boring very fast when played solo. Unfortunately, the game is pretty much dead online-wise, so you have to resort to local multiplayer. But that's where this game really shines anyway.

It can be played in any combination of cooperative and PvP, like 1 vs 2 human players.
Human players just assign their controllers to the one or the other team before the start of the match and then can switch between any of the players of that team during the match.
The other players will be controlled by the AI.
Controller support is excellent and it's even playable via keyboard.

The game allows for a great variety of passes, shots and effects which make it interesting and difficult to master. Basic handling is simple and intuitive though so it is easy to pick up.

Then there are the so called super moves which are available only once in a while during a match and let the player perform special moves that can't be defeated.
Some love them and say it's what makes Kopinatos stick out, others hate them because of their skill-defeating RNG component that often means a free goal for the team who applies them correctly.
Best and simplest would have been to enable or disable them via settings, but that isn't possible, so you have them in every match. You can of course decide to not use them during a match with friends.

You can select between a plethora of nations and even funny teams like Santas, Vampires, Zombies and such. However, most of the emblematic teams are unavailable at first and need to be unlocked by playing various tournaments which I didn't care to do.
So with friends, i still find myself playing such illustrious random encounters like "American Samoa" vs "Reindeers"! Lol

Oh, and personally, i love the cute visuals.

Pros
+ Skill based.
+ Easy to get into, hard to master.
+ Plenty of teams available. But many need to be unlocked first.
+ Great funny visuals.

Cons
- Super moves cannot be turned off.
- No more active development. Dev team seems dead.
- Online community is dead. You won't find people to play with other than your direct friends.

Verdict: Well worth the price! Great fun for local coop with friends.
A pity there aren't much players playing it online any more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161146291', 'num_games_owned': 488, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1591737560}
review:
Fun but some of the supposed skill seems to be just overcoming annoyances.
Unexplained super moves - that lighting rod always hits me no matter who summoned it.
Goalie is unable to pass the ball, just kicks it straight to the opponent.
Can never pass to the middle guy in formation, ball is always passed twice as far to another player if i try.
No indicator of who your next selected player will be.
