author: {'steamid': '76561197996917113', 'num_games_owned': 1289, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1657856788}
review:
Kopanito All-Stars Soccer est un jeu qui ne paye pas de mine mais qui est franchement très Fun.

On s'y amuse rapidement, on rage parfois et c'est un excellent jeu pour des soirées entre potes qui nous rappel les jeux de notre enfance telle que Soccer Shootout, Nintendo World Cup ou encore plus récemment Mario Smash Football ou Mario Strickers Charged Football.

La DA est franchement très sympa, le contenu est assez vaste au regard de son prix et surtout il y a pas mal de trophées à faire (pour ceux qui aime ça ^^)

Loin des standards des FIFA et autres PES, Kopanito All-Stars Soccer a ce petit goût de l'arcade et de Fun d'antan qu'on aime sortir de temps à autre pour se refaire une petite partie en solo ou bien accompagner pour toujours plus Fun, de rage et de bons moments partagés ensemble 

Je vous le recommande chaudement

author: {'steamid': '76561198033807339', 'num_games_owned': 397, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1585335802}
review:
ВНИМАНИЕ! ЭТО МОЕ СУБЪЕКТИВНОЕ МНЕНИЕ, АВТОР НЕ НАВЯЗЫВАЕТ ВАМ ЕГО!
Знаете... с перва кажется что это обычный футбол с видом на верх, но поиграв чуть чуть, я понял насколько классна эта игра. 
По скидке она стоит лишь 30 руб, что для такой игры просто халява. Пару вечерков игры вам обеспечены.
Ну, а теперь по порядку что меня зацепило в ней.
- Множество стран и команд за которое можно играть
- Цена
- Разнообразность способностей
- Полная поддержка геймпадов (на моём дуалшоке все шикарно)
- Наличие русского [spoiler] мелочь, а приятно [/spoiler] .
А теперь к минусам
- Мертвый онлайн 
- Одинаковые лица персонажей
- Нет возможности создания своих команд и прочего.
В целом этой игре я поставлю 7/10 
Рекомендую, но не для любителей онлайн игр.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055865509', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 247, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1587918574}
review:
Meh, para jugar media hora con los amigos no está mal, pero tiene poca profundidad y [b]como juego de fútbol arcade hay otros que lo han hecho mucho mejor[/b], como los [i]Mario Strikers[/i], aparte de lo obvio: tira pa los FIFA si quieres jugar al fútbol.

Por otro lado, [b]la mayoría de los equipos buenos están bloqueados[/b], y para poder usarlos tienes que jugar torneos completos, muchos de ellos en dificultad profesional, lo cual podría hacer que todo el esfuerzo necesario para desbloquearlos haga que no apetezca jugar más una vez desbloqueados. Qué manía con hacer este tipo de cosas y no dejar al jugador disfrutar de los juegos desde el principio.

Además, tiene otros problemas, como la conexión entre jugadores, que no es del todo sólida (a veces el juego hará cosas raras, por ejemplo). De todas formas, hay veces que está tirado de precio, por menos de 1 €, así que puede servir para alguna pachanga rápida con colegas, pero eso no lo convierte en un buen juego. Repito, si quieres un juego de fútbol arcade, juega a los [i]Mario Strikers[/i] (en las consolas de Nintendo o en ordenador con sus respectivos emuladores).

author: {'steamid': '76561198064877623', 'num_games_owned': 479, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 865, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 846, 'last_played': 1654099940}
review:
[h1] Kopanito All-Stars Soccer - Análise [/h1]
Eu sou o público alvo do jogo? [b]Sim[/b]
Controle recomendado? [b]Sim[/b]
O jogo pode ser jogado com os amigos? [b]Deve, cabem umas 4, talvez mais, não sei[/b]
O jogo é mais divertido com amigos? [b]COM CERTEZA[/b]
Qual a dificuldade do jogo? [b]Balanceado, você escolhe no menu[/b]
Breve crítica:
[b]Kopanito não é FIFA, Kopanito não é PES, Kopanito não é Winning Eleven, Kopanito é mais pra um Mario Strikers em 2D ou um Inazuma Eleven, então não venha procurando um "simulador" de futebol perfeito (porque pelamor, olha os gráficos, lógico que o foco é ser zoeira) porque vai se frustrar e muito.
Eu, particularmente, não gosto de futebol, nem jogos de futebol num geral então porque eu gosto de Kopanito All-Stars Soccer? Porque ele é uma bagunça e isso faz dele maravilhoso! (Claro que se você curte futebol, dê uma chance, o jogo não deixa de ser futebol, ele só não é aquele jogasso de futebol) Os jogadores não cansam e nem tem nome, só tem o fato de corre sem a bola, com a bola tem que tocar muito ou desviar do adversário porque ele não corre.
O jogo tem copas para cada continente, copas mundiais, desbloqueáveis e times de temporada tipo Vampiros e Aboboras pro Halloween, Papai Noéis, Presentes e Duendes pro Natal e por aí vai, altas loucuras. Poderes de colocar um ventilador gigante atrás do gol, super chutes, teleporte, arma de raio, congelar quem tá próximo...como eu disse: Altas loucuras.
Se eu pudesse apontar um defeito seria: Não dá pra criar times personalizados. Seria legal poder montar um uniforme, escolher as cores e o escudo, colocar nome (mesmo que os personagens não tenham nome), personalizar os bonequinhos mesmo que só tom de pele e corte de cabelo, sei la, seria legal pra jogar online com seu time único já que não tem como upar ou ter personagens com status diferentes e sim, depende apenas da sua habilidade.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561197969745375', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1587149494}
review:
Not a great football game (it's certainly not Sensible World of Soccer), and not a fun enough 'alternative' version of football to warrant a purchase. 

Fun for about half an hour against the CPU although games quickly become a predictable routine, and beyond that okay for couch co-op and games against friends - but there are countless other titles that would be better to spend your time and money on.

review:
Great game, except for the fact that most of the good teams are not only locked, but that you have to play entire tournaments to get them, many of these tournaments in professional difficulty. author: {'steamid': '76561198389202695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1676137739}
review:
Çok Değerli Gamer Kardeşlerim,
Oyun tek kelimeyle mükemmel ötesi... Kesinlikle almanızı tavsiye ediyorum. Bilenler bilir, eskiden kraloyun vardı. Orada EURO 2008 oyunu oynardık, ona çok benzettim bu oyunu. Biraz farklılıkları olmakla birlikte güzel bir oyun. Arkadaşlarınızla keyifli vakitler de geçirebilirsiniz. Yalnız bazen bağlantı sorunları yaşanabiliyor çok sevgili gamer kardeşlerim. Kısacası, indirim bekleyin ve bu oyunu kesinlikle kütüphanenize ekleyin ... Dünyamızın içinde bulunduğu COVID-19 salgını nedeniyle malumunuz birçoğumuz evlerimizdeyiz. Bu yorumu okuyup yüzünüzde ufak bir tebessüm bırakabildiysem ne mutlu bana ... 
İyi Günler, İyi Oyunlar diliyorum çok değerli gamer kardeşlerim. Sağlıcakla kalın ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198436644856', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1590376388}
review: Her ne kadar futboldan nefret etsemde bu oyun gözüme çok güzel gözüktü ve steamde verdiğim en iyi 2 liraydı. gayet zevkli bir oyun ve milli takımlarla oynuyoruz. Arada noel babalar, kurt adamlar gibi takımlarda gözümden kaçmadı değil :d. gönül rahatlığıyla alıp direk CcC türkler geliyor diyip oyuna girip herkesi gol yağmuruna tutamazsınız açıkçası, sebebi ise oyunda belli başlı takımlar açık ve o açık takımlarla kupa kazanıp, ondan sonra kilitli olan ülkeleri açıyorsunuz. Çevrimiçi ve çevrimdışı oynayabiliyorsunuz ki şahsen hiç çevrimiçi oynamadım tek başımada çok zevk aldım ve ileri zamanlardada sıkacağını düşünmüyorum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051997678', 'num_games_owned': 333, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 468, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1644576544}
review:
Oyunun grafikleri çok tatlı, içerik olarak eski atari efsanesi olan "goal 3" oyununun harmanlanıp bilgisayara uyarlanmış şekli adeta. ^.^ Arkadaşlarınızla arada sırada girip eğlenmek ve stres atmak için birebir. :) Hatta oyuna biraz daha içerik eklense daha da geniş ve iyi olabilir. Ayrıca "Türkçe dil desteği" olması ayrı bir güzellik katmış, böylece her yaş grubuna hitap edebilecek seviyede. :) İndirime girdiği zaman gayet mâkul seviyelere iniyor, denemeye ve fırsat vermeye değer. ^.^

Dipnot : İnternet üstünden başkaları ile veya arkadaşınızla oynamak isterseniz fena lag olabiliyor, ona göre alırsanız daha iyi olur. Fakat arkadaşınızla buluşup, yan yana oynamak için oyun arıyorsanız tam size göre. Zaten oyunu oynadıkça çıkan koleksiyon kartlarını satarsanız, oyunu indirimli fiyatından  bile daha düşük fiyata almış oluyorsunuz. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198057601248', 'num_games_owned': 563, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1656199255}
review:
高額のサッカーゲームはいくつかあるけれど、
やってることはこれとさほど変わらないなと思ってしまう。
特殊な技など　ありえない技はあるにはあるが
サッカーゲームを楽しむという点では　この金額では破格の楽しさがあります。
言語の壁は　サッカーのルールが分かれば難なくできるでしょう。

ｐｃ３などで　高額サッカーゲームもしたけれど
もう　これでも十分楽しめてる自分がいます。
単純操作で明快で短時間で勝負がつき　
特殊技を抜けば　高額ゲームに負けない楽しさがあると思います。

日本語対応が待たれるところです。
そうしたらもっと日本人が増えそうなのにな。
キャラデザイン　そのた　日本人にはそこまで嫌悪感を抱くものではないので
ぜひ日本語対応してほしい作品。安いですし。

author: {'steamid': '76561197994166327', 'num_games_owned': 252, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 995, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1601503618}
review:
This game is a fun little arcade soccer game. It's made even more fun when you can play with friends or even when you are able to find an online match. It's a simple game, but it's completely skill and timing-based so you never feel like you are being cheated by the AI.

It's fun to play through the tournaments in either single-player or local co-op and unlock all the teams, and it does provide a challenge as you progress through the difficulties. I've had no issues with controllers, was able to use Xbox 360 controllers plug-and-play. Detected right away, no problems.

Pick this one up on sale if you like arcade sports games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068473335', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 858, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1658972305}
review: Miro la hora, pongo Kopanito para ver de qué trata, lo adquirí por las opiniones, porque me gusta el fútbol y porque las franquicias más conocidas pasaron a ser algo repetido y complejo que ya no me atrae tanto cuando quiero jugar rápidamente. Veo una simpleza que en principio me pareció desagradable, me pongo a jugar una copa, reviso los controles, aprendo a tirar superpoderes y hacer algunos goles, pienso que es muy sencillo… hasta que paso al siguiente nivel de dificultad, esto se transforma en un desafío, me entusiasma pero tengo que largar, miro la hora y me doy cuenta que pasaron más de 2 sin mosquearme; Solo los buenos entretenimientos tienen esas virtudes. Fin.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047577925', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1608994949}
review:
Cool game for single player.
But absolutely garbage for offline local multiplayer. Controllers are totally messed up:
- joysticks are recognized as keyboard
- 2 joysticks often control one ingame character
- one joystick controls 2 ingame characters simultaneously

I bought the game to play with friend and as the result got ruined evening.
We hadn't play a single game because just stuck in selecting team stage.


UPD

All mess was on linux (manjaro with latest steam and updates), windows version of the game is OK.


UPD2

Further investigation gave new answers: to fix this misbehaviour you must turn off joystick identification in your steam settings 
Steam -> Settings -> Controller -> General Controller Settings => turn off all checkboxes


So, the game become awesome again!
Some info for developers of the game. Double input, as my research showed, is due to input form joystick is catched both by nwjs.io and steam. And than both steam and nwjs.io try to control ingame characters movements.

review:
not gonna lie, this game so addicting for me.

1. this game is seriously arcade and make happy
2. graphic is good, not trash
3. contain a lot of team, ALL COUNTRY(?)
4. you can play with 10 PLAYER ONLINE FRIENDS!!!
5. no dlc or something like that (totally good)
6. there is a LOT of achievement
7. CONTROL IS REALLY REALLY CUSTOMISABLE (some game like this cant customize the contol)
8. dope

but there is a downside too!
1.there is no training or some info for the new player but whatever this issue still make nonsense, people love this.
2. ping is not so good when play multiplayer with friend. (fix this please and this game super super fun)

very nice game and so worth it at discount. Go buy this game and make u fun!! 4/5

author: {'steamid': '76561198077589271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1577240451}
review:
Melhor que FIFA!
Diversão GARANTIDA com teus amigos.. lembra um pouco aquele clássico Mario Strikers.. futebol em que você pode usar itens pra ferrar com seu adversário, e que pode fazer falta à vontade que não tem árbitro!
É possível jogar com até 10 jogadores.. cada um controlando seu jogador em 2 equipes de 5 pessoas cada.
Possui as mais variadas seleções ao redor do mundo, incluindo times especiais como: Time dos Zumbi's, Time dos Lobisomens, Time dos Vampiros.. e por aí vai! xD

Em promoção o jogo fica SUPER barato e vale muito a pena pela diversão que lhe é proporcionada.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106112231', 'num_games_owned': 776, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 1075, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 705, 'last_played': 1625596818}
review:
Es un juego divertido y bastante adictivo, está un poco bugeado el online pero se puede jugar almenos con colegas. Por lo que cuesta te puedes echar unas risas o viciarte y querer conseguir todos los logros, lo cual no es tarea fácil.
Las dificultades de la ia son perfectas para aprender y desafiantes a la hora de dominar el juego.
También guarda cierta nostalgia para gente que ha vivido la era de minijuegos, miniclip y esas páginas con juegos hechos en java. 
"Fácil de jugar pero difícil de dominar"

author: {'steamid': '76561198353293369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1582496408}
review:
Enfin un peu d'originalité pour un jeu vidéo de football! Je trouve que l'aspect jouabilité et stratégie de jeu est encore à travailler mais je donne une bonne note car c'est le seul petit jeu de football sur Steam qui me donne envie de rejouer: rapide, original et fun.
Il ne manque plus qu'à améliorer les déplacements (un peu trop saccadés et rectilignes) et peut être ajouter des techniques de feintes ou de dribbles. Les reprises de volée de la tête ou même au pied sont mal gérées, surtout en défense, mais sinon, pour ceux qui veulent un jeu intéressant et original, je le recommande fortement, il ne prend pas de place à l'installation et peut se jouer avec la manette (pas toujours le cas), il est possible de jouer à plusieurs, 4 ou 5 joueurs je crois.

Plutôt content de mon achat (acheté en rabais)!

review:
If this game every goes on sale, GRAB IT. It's a great party game if you have multiple people (or even just two people) and also fun to play yourself. The bots can go anywhere from really easy to ungodly difficult, so if you are looking for fun or a challenge, this game is for you.
8.5/10 Can run on a potato

author: {'steamid': '76561198017526863', 'num_games_owned': 199, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 2452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1890, 'last_played': 1670147454}
review:
The Nekketsu soccer was my favorite when I was young so I like it too (I'm not a FIFA fan). 
Shortly: I love this game.

Pros:
- Good vibe
- GIF creator
- Many achievement
- Polished game
- Indoor stadium
- You can turn off the celebration
- Fantasy teams

Cons:
- Technical issues (fps drop sometimes, the indoor is slow, some small bugs - physics when there is a knocked out goalkeeper)
- The newly selected player remembers last pressed button
- There is no difference between teams
- Random superpowers (Perhaps only the weaker team would need - for balancing)
- You're vulnerable when you're in a corner kick
- There is no blood-pumping music during the match (like in N World Cup).

8 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198021422660', 'num_games_owned': 3620, 'num_reviews': 1228, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1570805822}
review:
[h1] Тот футбол на NES назывался Kunio Kun no Nekketsu soccer league. Эта игра могла бы быть похожей на ту безбашенную игру, но не сложилось... Может на ютубе посмотреть длинное прохождение и посмеяться :) [/h1]

Что было на NES:
- Погодные условия - ветер, листопад, лужи, снег, молнии... Всё это влияло на игровой процесс и вносило элемент неожиданности. Было крайне забавно видеть мощный разряд молнии и разлетающихся после него человечков с выпученными глазами. Ну и также порывы ветра, которые замедляли или ускоряли в зависимости от направления.
- Наличие женских персонажей в команде. Может быть и мелочь, но понимал равенство и способность к мордобою даже у женщин. Они также пробивали вертухи, унося мяч в ворота на космической скорости.
- Менеджер команды с характеристиками каждого футболиста. Каждого футболиста можно было либо мотивировать либо демотивировать в меню тренера. У каждого есть свои интересы, предпочтения, дело и т.д.
- Куча приёмов и суперударов. Я понимаю, что футбол не совсем контактный вид спорта - за нарушения в плане мордобоя наказывают карточками вплоть до дисквалификации. В версии для NES контактность возведена в абсолют. Тут можно буквально вышибать мозги соперникам.
- Шикарные мелодии, которые буквально настраивают на ритм игры и это всё на картридже в пару сотен килобайт. (не считая памяти самой консоли конечно) 
- Здесь нет дурацких физиономий. Персонажи здесь предельно сосредоточены и это видно на лицах.
- Крупное изображение персонажей по отношению к игровому полю. Игроки на NES нарочно гипертрофированы по отношению к футбольному полю.

Вот некоторое из того, что было тогда на древнем картридже и что я хотел увидеть здесь. Увы, разработчики пошли в сторону большего реализма и сделали более разгильдяйскую версию FIFA или PES. Это к сожалению, но футбол конечно добротный и даже можно назвать его доступным. Но это совершенно не то, что ожидалось... Хочется именно той несовской безбашенности...

Тут же в плане подачи игры претензий нет, но всё-таки не то... Странно, что разработчики не пошли дальше. Здесь и игроки мелковаты. Менеджер слишком ленивый. Боевых приёмов толком нет. Энергетики вообще не чувствуется... Зато на русском, с карточками, достижениями, облаком, контроллером, даже поддержкой линукс. 

Рекомендую только из-за того, что футбола с большей безбашенностью в стиме и нету.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023134604', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1579389836}
review:
Highly recommended for couch play. Real good fun. 

Starts simple with 2-3 buttons but gets complex when you realize you can combine buttons for different shots. The game is extremely fun and intense if all 4-5 players have similar skill level. If any player is too skilled, or struggles with the mechanics, it can get a little annoying.

There are some powerups which are better than others. I wish there was a way to select powerups but you're stuck with a random powerup. 

It is definitely worth a buy especially if you play couch-competitive games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035237293', 'num_games_owned': 690, 'num_reviews': 224, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1571613017}
review: Kopanito All-Stars Soccer czerpie inspiracje z kultowej gry na NES'a - Kunio-kun no Nekketsu Soccer League, znanej w Polsce bardziej jako Goal 3. Co prawda swojego protoplasty zdecydowanie nie przebija (o wiele mniej umiejętności specjalnych, brak możliwości zmiany składu, formacji, muzyki, efektów pogodowych, statystyki piłkarzy są takie same oraz brakuje jej tego uroku i klimatu), jednakże jest to dobra produkcja jak na swoją niską cenę. Rozgrywka polega oczywiście na strzelaniu bramek, jednak w przeciwieństwie do większości gier tego typu, wszelkie faule są dozwolone. Kosimy przeciwników, używamy na nich losowo trafiających się umiejętności specjalnych (np. zamrażanie okolicznych piłkarzy), aby zdobyć upragnione gole. Oprawa graficzna jest poprawna (chociaż czcionki są nieco rozmyte). Do dyspozycji mamy kilkanaście mistrzostw, mecze lokalne lub online, a także dosyć ubogi tryb treningowy. Miłym dodatkiem jest lokalny tryb kooperacji do 5 graczy przy jednym komputerze. Polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058824226', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2050, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 357, 'last_played': 1688820100}
review: Tek kelimeyle "muhteşem" bir oyun. Evet; bir oyunda ilk olarak aramanız gereken eğlence faktörü bu oyunda en üst düzeyde mevcut. Her yaştan oyun ve futbol severin mutlaka deneyimlemesi gereken bir tecrübe. Sakın fiyatına aldanmayın; size sunulan beklentilerinizin çok daha ötesinde olacak. Üzücü olan ise 2 paralık (2 tl) bir oyunun; PES ve Fifa'dan çok daha keyif verici ve adil olması. Mutlaka ama mutlaka kütüphanenize ekleyin; zaten saatlerce oynayacaksınız.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077752412', 'num_games_owned': 2454, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 998, 'last_played': 1636376539}
review:
【能够体会到中国队踢球踢人血虐世界强队还有外星生物的机会，就是现在了！一定要多人游戏！！！】

一些小提示：
风扇道具留着防守用，但注意药劲过去的一瞬间守门员是没站好位置的，当然也可以在对方使用时反过来利用这一点。
幻影闪现可以直接带球闪到对方门里（需要一定操作）。
磁铁可以在对方球门内使用直接将球吸入球门，最佳时机是在对方守门员开球时…
如果拿到超级球道具，只要前方无队友直接起脚，途中微操方向键注意不要碰到球员，基本不歪都能进。
有冰冻道具时原地绕圈李毅式盘球，多吸引几名对方球员再使用，只要1换2就不亏。
无人机雷电不管哪方使用都是控球人控制，所以对方球权或者带球不如李毅就慎用，否则就是送人头。

author: {'steamid': '76561198371803838', 'num_games_owned': 563, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1589726713}
review:
从早睡的推荐来的……总的来说游戏是个好游戏，打折期间5¥也是比较实惠的价格。

游戏总体上偏向娱乐卡通，和传统的FIFA 实况什么的玩法是截然不同的。没有裁判，没有越位，没有红黄牌的六人制足球赛（除去AI门将，最多可以5v5对战）。游戏当中一键爆铲外，还有各类奇奇怪怪的道具（球门鼓风机、电磁飞机啥的），对战十分有趣。你要来这耍传控流？铲到你怀疑人生！

游戏的话支持本地多人联机（需要手柄）、联网多人，也可以单人打打世界杯亚洲杯什么的。里边的球队可以慢慢解锁，奖杯逐个打，一局几分钟。无聊时候来一把，也算是不错的消遣～

author: {'steamid': '76561198033314161', 'num_games_owned': 1262, 'num_reviews': 501, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1573239052}
review:
я вообще не понимаю как вы в эти футболы играете, вот гоните на меня что я дрочу на своего марио, при этот ничего не говорите про тех, кто играет в симуляторы футболов да я вахуе - 19 минут я смог просидеть в этой игре, это самое скучное что придумало человечество, это просто симулятор скуки, реально смертельно опасно, я смотрел все фильмы тарковского, я сидел в очереди к врачу с апендицитом и палил в зеленую стену 5 часов, я посмотрел полностью видос "Я КАРТА 10 ЧАСОВ" было конечно тяжело,  но всё это не так утомительно как 19 минут ебучего футбола пиздец я был на грани, вобщем я просто вахуе с того что в ЭТО кто то играет и получает удовольствие пиздец я просто в тотальнейшем ахуе

а сама игра довольно прикольная милая ачивок много красивенько так рекомендую

author: {'steamid': '76561198976740419', 'num_games_owned': 40, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1582645281}
review:
opanito All-Stars Soccer - игра для тех, кому виртуальный футбол кажется сложным.

Количество игроков на поле у каждой команды сократилось с 11 до 6. Никаких правил нет. Можно весело въезжать по ногам соперника сзади, забивать гол из офсайда и грустно смотреть на отсутствие кооператива и мультиплеера.

К сожалению, помимо сокращения количества игроков на поле, игра потеряла и глубину виртуального футбола. Вся игра сводится к забросам и дальним ударам.

author: {'steamid': '76561198200385759', 'num_games_owned': 587, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1703719554}
review:
Lo unico que te tiene de malo. es el nombre😂...
.
En un mundo donde todo parece estar regido, por FIFA o PES, encontrar un game asi es como una caricia al alma!!
.
Kopanito realmente vale la pena tenerlo en la biblioteca, con unos Hermosos Gráficos 2D, acompañados de una jugabilidad Árcade retro, muy de los 90 y con miles de países, por desbloquear/elegir. Este game nos ofrece unos clásicos partidos donde no existen ni las tarjetas rojas, amarillas, ni fouls, ni el VAR anula penales😂, sino que solo 6 jugadores (5 + el arquero) con un único objetivo, meter goles como sea🏆.
.
Con una mecánica super entretenida, que se basa en ir acumulado una especie de stamina🧨, para luego canjearla por un super poder como por ejemplo: un tiro mas potente, un imán que roba la pelota al contrario y otros mas.
.
El juego cuenta con la posibilidad de jugar modo local, single o multi player de hasta 5 jugadores en un equipo o la posibilidad de jugar modo online. 
.
Si queres un juego para no pensar y solo divertirte, para la pelota y busca Kopanito.💣
.
PD: maten al genio que eligió ese nombre horrible para el juego.🤣

author: {'steamid': '76561198080569449', 'num_games_owned': 1968, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1572101514}
review:
和热血足球一样，除了越界本作没有任何规则
只要能抢到球射门，不论是雷击、冰冻、食人鱼什么道具都可以
加上本作的游戏节奏快，单个球员控球时间不会超过5秒
这种传球断球频率必然增加交流内容
如果是1v1还好最多就是两人骂骂咧咧
如果你是线下3v3或者和好友开黑的话嘿嘿嘿
这种分队合作对抗的撕逼程度绝对比分手厨房、马车来的更刺激
如果你近期有开黑计划
那么本作绝对是线下聚会，线上撕逼的不二选择
至于游戏内的球队解锁则需要你通关一些单机赛事
完整：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av70889154

author: {'steamid': '76561198359264292', 'num_games_owned': 242, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 748, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 399, 'last_played': 1691512202}

author: {'steamid': '76561198142145418', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 1030, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1571091791}
review:
Игра - не понравилась, рекомендовать этот шлак не хочу. Почему? Мёртвый онлайн - это пол дела, отмечу гипер-активный ИИ и бестолковую механику игры:

Вратарь чаще всего даёт адекватный "пасс" своим игрокам только навесом, дать обычный пасс вратарём на ближних игроков нет смысла, почему? потому что он страдает косоглазием и тупо пинает мяч .i. пойми куда - в итоге мяч тут же забирает бешеный ИИ и ты ловишь гол в свои дырявые ворота.

В этой игре нереальные проблемы с "пассом" ты бежишь с мячом, ты хочешь дать пасс открытому игроку справа вблизи, вроде направляешь стрелками на товарища и что происходит? а ни.i.я не происходит, пасс не работает и мяч тупо отпинывается в сторону, его тут же забирает бешеный ИИ и ты ловишь гол в свои ворота.

Управляя командой, игроками - все на своих позициях: защита, полузащита, атака, вратарь - у тебя отобрали мяч все сохраняют свои позиции как в нормальном футболе. Когда ты отбираешь мяч у соперника происходит нечто а.i.нное - толпа игроков соперника налетают на тебя со всех сторон и ты ни.i. тут не поделаешь, порой кажется, что на поле на самом деле куда больше соперников чем твоих игроков.

Да игра забавная, но не более того. Рекомендованная цена игры 9 рублей 30 копеек, я увы лоханулся и купил ЭТО за 30 рублей ! и теперь меня грызёт совесть, что за ЭТО я заплатил кровные 30 рублей !!!!11

Оценка 1/10, "игра ничего не имеющая общего с футболом"

review:
很有乐趣的足球游戏，有当年流氓足球的风采，打完折就5块钱，本想送几个给愿意一起玩的朋友，结果都不喜欢踢足球。可惜。一定要试试联机模式，各种搞笑，根本停不下来。

有手柄的话一定要用手柄玩，键盘玩起来方向不好控制，铲人总是铲不到，难度越大，AI走位越骚。

顺便问一下有没有大哥知道为什么我笔记本上了四个手柄但是第五个人就是进不来吗？？求告知 hxd等得急死了！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198069565258', 'num_games_owned': 766, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1603019150}
review:
A classic styled- simplistic soccer/futbol game that is perfect for when playing with friends.

However, just like a classic game, do not expect crazy depth.

No power-ups do not break the competitive nature of game.

Yes, the AI will make some questionable plays and not understand when it is appropriate to do a header.

But if one can find this on sale, it is well worth the pricepoint.
If one typically plays games with groups of friends- this is a definite must-have

author: {'steamid': '76561198366847993', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1704295968}

author: {'steamid': '76561198117811595', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1570386581}
review: Я не люблю футбол. Но эта игрушка понравилась своей рисовкой и чем то напомнила жоский футбол без правил от японских разработчиков, который был у меня на 8-ми битной приставке в далёких 90-х годах. Здесь можно играть за вампиров, зомби, сомалийцев и команду оленей (последнее для меня актуально). Играть лучше всего на геймпаде, попробовав поначалу клавиатуру я чуть было не сломал себе руки, стол и нервную систему. За 2 часа игры мне удалось забить 2 гола и занять первое место в турнире Океанской лиги (ладно, шучу). И, да, онлайн вроде мертвый, но я него еще не ходил, потому что страшно.

review: I recommend Kopanito All-Star Soccer. It reminds me of the 1990 Nintendo World Cup for the NES. And this childhood memory has led me to buy this game. The graphics and animations are very nice and there are many funny special tricks. In offline mode, there are many different teams and tournament variants. The online mode is unfortunately dead. All in all, a funny little football game, which does not take the sport so seriously.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106654290', 'num_games_owned': 259, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1560596517}
review:
This Review is written as of 07/06/19 and could be subject to change in the future.

Kopanito is a skill based game where there is no individual difference of stats between any of the players or any of the teams and the outcome of the match is solely dependent on the player's skill. This may sound great but on the other hand it also means that there is no uniqueness between any of the teams, & they are all just re-skinned templates of each other.

Now to the gameplay. It is interesting at first, but gets very repeatative very fast. The game is a 5v5 football match (No I won't call it soccer) and whoever scores the most wins. There is no foul in the game which means you are gonna see a lot of slide tackles from both sides and I mean a lot. It spices things up with some super moves which you get at random which introduces some RNG to this skill based game. Now, this could be fixed if both sides get the same super move and it gets replaced if they don't use it for some time which gives it some more strategy factor but that remains to be seen. The offline tornaments feel like copy paste contents and feel like a chore after a few games and there is no "sense of pride or achievement" (*wink*) for beating it since you feel like you just beat the same team 8 times. Ironically this skill based game is more fun if you don't take it seriously and just try to screw around.

The repeatative nature could change slightly if you have 4 other friends and 4 other controllers to play with or you go online and play against 5 other players. which is probably what this game is made for. 5v5 player v player.

Overall the game has a lot to improve especially on the offline aspect which seems just sorta there to practice with the AI. Even playing with 2 other friends, it just felt boring after the first 2 matches. The gameplay loop needs to be overhauled or tweaked to make the games feel less repeatative and more unique.

With all that said the game scores a 5/10 for an average game but gets the recommend because of its cheap price which i got for 1 USD on sale. Get it if you have some friends and controllers and just want a football game (Not soccer) with super moves.

P.S. The slide tackles can affect your own teammate so you can already imagine the hilarity of playing with several friends and screwing with them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071753399', 'num_games_owned': 1060, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1065, 'last_played': 1655044086}
review: Fantastyczna rozrywka przez długie godziny. Tak można określić polską produkcję Kopanito All-Stars Soccer. Gra pozwala na długie godziny niczym nie zmąconej rozgrywki. Umożliwia nieczyste wślizgi, które w jednej chwili zmieniają sytuację na boisku. W jednej chwili z przegranego zostajesz zwyciężcą meczu. Kreskówkowa  grafika podkreśla zabawny charakter tej produkcji. Jest to dobra gra dla syna i ojca, jak również na spotkanie towarzyskie ponieważ umożliwia wspólne granie na jednym komputerze. Polecam, to bardzo dobra gra.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076097297', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1605362793}
review:
Faul yok, ofsayt yok, barbarca futbol oynayabileceğiniz bir oyun. Pas ve çalımlar keyifli. Karakter tasarımları komik, özel güçler eğlenceli. Fakat pro modu epey zor, çok seri oynamayı gerektiriyor, rakip çok zorluyor. Böyle olunca da oyunun tadı kaçıyor. Pas ve şut çeşitliliği daha fazla olup, tesadüfe yer olsaymış daha eğlenceli olurmuş. Lakin değil, oyunun açıklamasında da belirtildiği üzere teknik bir oyun. 

artıları; eğlenceli, az yer kaplıyor.
eksileri; uzun süre oynanacak oyun değil, zor. 

7/10

review: One of the best "hidden gems" on Steam. Arcade-y looking but tight play controls. A must for soccer fans looking for a fun game. I like how you can unlock every country in the world and then some.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998957687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1585594029}
review:
My 6 year old son and I have played this for just a few hours and we already love this game. It took us a few minutes to grasp the controls and game mechanics, thankfully you can adjust the difficulty level of your computer AI opponents so it can be enjoyed by novice and veterans alike. No ref, so rough tackling is in! The funny animations, the cool looking hair dos and facial appearances of the players are refreshing. My son especially enjoys using the special attacks. 

Highly recommend for casual football play and laughter.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996014154', 'num_games_owned': 486, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1040, 'last_played': 1562149900}
review: Niesamowicie wciągająca gra. Rewelacyjny pomysł na stworzenie piłki kopanej. Dosyć dynamiczna, momentami (w zależności od stopnia trudności) trudna gra. Tryb multi gdzie można zagrać ze znajomymi oraz coś czego jeszcze nie miałęm okazji wypróbować gra z 5 znajomymi w jednej drużynie :-) Raj dla fanów zbierania osiągnięć Steam. No i co najważniejsze - brak sędziego! :-) Kapitalna zabawa na wiele godzin jak i na chwilkę w celu odstresowania.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039446285', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1558786055}
review:
Fun little game, reminds me of Hot Soccer from Sega.

Drawbacks - 
* Player switching is abit weird sometimes, it's hard to switch to the player that you want. I feel like it just selects randomly.
* We should be able to create our own teams.
* Would be fun if we could upgrade player stats with points, etc.
* Sometimes when pressing on a key, it registers that certain action and you cannot change it, like when pressing the S key to pass when you're getting a lobbed ball, we should be able to change our action. Something like how Fifa has implemented it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009918891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1558737115}
review:
This is a well made product, it has quality,that´s why I voted positive, but have a few thing that annoys me, and get me out of the game.I really want to like Kopanito, but no, I´m done with this crap. Normal and professional difficulties are unfair:
- Controls doesn´t respond the way you need in that difficulty, very slow and random
- You pick random players, making impossible to control the ball properly under pressure, you will end up throwing the ball away to nowhere.
- Enemy CPU is unfair, it can do things you can, apart from being perfect at chasing you down, they can pass the ball very quickly even when you tackle them, you hit the enemy player, but he did the pass anyway. Only beginners is playable, other difficulties seems to be unfair and lucky and not base skilled.
- Your team AI is stupid,  they gathered together, in line, filling the center of the field, everyone trying to get the ball, I got the 3 of them running to the ball, leaving the others unmarked, while CPU is always marking you, making very difficult to have a good or clear pass.
-Enemy goalkeeper is almost unbeatable at professional, he will catch the 90% of shoots, you have to be alone (which never happens) so you can score. Otherwise, you will have to be a little lucky to do it
-Long pass is very difficult to control, resulting in random actions. The only useful thing aobut it, it´s trying to get a goal long pass
At the end, you will end up running and tackle and shooting fast, because otherwise you will lose the ball.
Maybe you can cope with this, you can rebind controls, and adapt it to you, but even so....

author: {'steamid': '76561198025533862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1638515407}
review:
Great arcade soccer game but with some annoying pitfalls. It's best to play it with a friend - that is where the game generates its most fun activity! Interesting graphics and good sound quality. The part I dislike is switching between players and inability to sprint while dribbling at the same time. The most annoying part is when you're tackling the offensive and then when you suddenly have the ball, you can't just time the pass to your open man (unlike in other soccer games, this is automatic). And so the ball ends up either to the opposite team or out of bounce. 

The difficulty setting needs rework. The "beginning" level (aka the lowest setting) feels like a pro because  whenever you are ahead by 2 goals, the "handicap" mode suddenly kicks in, which gives the CPU ridiculous amount of leverage to even up the score. That is not enjoyable for people who just want to relax and have fun. That would be okay if you and your partner are veteran gamers, but it won't be easy if you've partnered up with a newbie who just wants to relax and pass the time.

I had fun with this game, especially the coop part. It would be nice to be able to customize or create your own team from scratch. That would be an awesome feature! In the end, this game is not geared towards for casual people per se. The graphics may look arcady but the gameplay is not. lol If they can fine tune the difficulty to where each setting is comfortable for different skill sets, maybe i'll have more friends to play with. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198127308265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1706402476}
review:
Jogo muito divertido para se jogar com amigos online(porém não há players online então é necessário que chamem amigos para jogar junto, PS: se comprar me chama xDD). Há várias ligas no modo offline também. O jogo é muito simples de se entender e se jogar, vale muito a pena pelo preço que é pago principalmente estando em promoção :)

The game is really fun to play with friends(but there's no players online, so you have to invite your friends to play with you and if you buy the game, add me xDD). There are leagues in offline mode too. The game is very simple to learn and play, it really worth the price paid especially in steam sales :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198181802606', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1920, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1070, 'last_played': 1664049201}
review: Bu oyun rastgele karşıma geldi ve indirimde çok da pahallı olmadığını gördüm. Oyunla ilgili çok bişey bakmadım alıp denemek istedim arkadaşıma da bir adet aldım ve oyuna girdik. Çok büyük bir yer kaplamıyor buna rağmen bu oyunda eğlenmek için çok fazla nedeniniz oluyor :D Özel güçler, onlarca takım, şampiyona vs. gibi özellikler oyuna ayrı bir tat vermiş. Birden fazla çok oyunculu modu var ister tek bilgisayardan ister farklı bilgisayarlardan, ister klavye ile ister oyun kolu ile size kalmış. Bu oyunu alıp eğlenmek varken düşünmeye gerek yok :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198019270397', 'num_games_owned': 4179, 'num_reviews': 733, 'playtime_forever': 792, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 792, 'last_played': 1533425504}
review:
[h1] Points positifs : [/h1]

- Le genre arcade très développé
- La touche cartoonesque du titre et les graphismes en général très rafraîchissants
- Pas de prise de tête: toutes les équipes sont égales, pas de statistiques compliquées, seuls les drapeaux des différents pays ajoutent une petite personnalisation aux équipes
- Les différences entre les personnages ne sont que d'odre cosmétique
- Les différents replays proposés... et pouvoir les sauvegarder en gifs ! Très original !
- Possibilité de jouer en multi
- Le gameplay simpliste et efficace
- La liberté de mouvements et d'actions durant les matchs: possibilité de tacler à outrance, pas de hors jeu, être une vraie ordure avec le gardien, etc
- Les pouvoirs spéciaux façon "Mario Kart"...

[h1] Points négatifs : [/h1]

- ... Bien trop peu nombreux et parfois anecdotiques !
- Le manque de diversité en général
- La simplification à l'extrême et l'absence de statistiques assumés... cela peut être aussi une faiblesse sur la durée !
- Malgré toute l'originalité et la qualité du titre on finit par se lasser sur le long terme... Mieux vaut jouer sur des sessions plus courtes mais autrement plus savoureuses !

[h1] En conclusion... [/h1]

Au contraire des jeux dits "sérieux" type FIFA ou PES, Kopanito All-Stars Soccer est clairement l'inverse du genre footbalistique. Avec ses graphismes cartoons, son gameplay ultra efficace et son côté décalé, le titre à un style bien à lui et particulier qui ne plaira pas forcément à tous les joueurs, notamment à ceux qui érigent en principes sacrés les règles du football ! Exit les hors jeu, bonjour les tacles à répétition par exemple ! Pourtant cela ne dénature pas le titre, bien au contraire, cela donne du piment et certaines situations sont parfois cocasses. Les pouvoirs spéciaux façon pur jus "Mario Kart" ajoutent encore à ce titre une touche humoristique déjà bien mise en avant !

Kopanito All-Stars Soccer est le genre de jeu qu'il ne faut pas prendre au sérieux, qui permet de se défouler après une dure journée de labeur et qui, selon moi, se joue par petites sessions pour éviter ainsi de se lasser ! Au cours des différents championnats et de vos victoires, vous débloquerez tout de même des nouveaux stades, des nouveaux modes de jeux,des ballons, etc. Cela ajoute au jeu un véritable intérêt supplémentaire à aller jusqu'au bout pour tenter de tout débloquer ! Amateurs de succès Steam vous serez également servis !

Ce titre est une jolie trouvaille que je ne peux conseiller, notamment aux moins férus de football, ils risqueraient d'être très agréablement surpris quand au détour d'une session de jeu cela fait déjà 4 ou 5 matchs qu'ils enchaînent ! >> 17/20

author: {'steamid': '76561198161309770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1545789355}
review:
J'ai fais l'effort d'y jouer deux heures, le jeu est tout simplement trop pauvre, il manque de rythme, il a une mauvaise gestion des pouvoirs(aléatoire), la jouabilité est approximative, et ma seule satisfaction est le prix car je me dit que j'ai pas perdu gros :( 
Je m'attendait à mieux après avoir jouer à une très bon et innovateur Beholdd the kickmen.

Fuyez ce jeu n'est pas encore au point, ce jeu a besoin d'être revisité avec je le précise tout à revoir car malgré mes critique il a un potentiel inexploité.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066408737', 'num_games_owned': 1146, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 458, 'last_played': 1571832863}
review: Приобрел эту игру на одной из распродаж и ни разу не пожалел. Футбольная аркада с мультяшной графикой,которая помогает убить время. Турниры,чемпионаты,товарищеские матчи,а также игра online не дадут заскучать. Да,возможно кому то игра покажется простой и однообразной,но в таком случае стоит повысить уровень сложности. Открытие команд и ачивки как дополнительный стимул. Если игра по скидке идет рублей за 50,то однозначно стоит брать. Как минимум пару вечеров за ней скоротать можно

review:
Un juego de fútbol diferente, donde debes saltarte las reglas para ganar, realizando todo tipo de entradas.
Más de un centenar de equipos para elegir, aunque muchos de ellos hay que desbloquearlos ganando los diversos torneos.
Estaría genial que hubiese un editor para ponerles nombres a los jugadores.
En cualquier caso, entretenimiento asegurado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011903621', 'num_games_owned': 6890, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1534508100}
review:
Bir kaç saatliğine eğlenceli olabilecek bir oyun. Goal 3, Sensible Soccer, eski FIFA'lar ve eski ISS'lere benzer yönü olduğu su götürmez bir gerçek ancak sadece benzerliği var. Herhangi ekstra yaptığı bir durum söz konusu değil. Oyun sırasında kullanabileceğiniz özel power up'lar bulunuyor. Bu güçleri kullanarak oyunu daha eğlenceli bir hale getiriyorsunuz diye söylemek isterdim ama dilim varmıyor. 

Herkes eşit derecede hızlı, topsuzken daha hızlı, top ile daha yavaş koşuyorlar. Yapacağınız tek şey, kayma tuşunu spamlamak, topu alıp iki adım ilerleyip şut çekmek. Herhangi bir eğlencesi yok. Ayrıca adam değiştirme olayı tamamen rastgele yapılmış sanki. İnsan topa yakın adamı verir değil mi? Yok vermiyor. Taraftarı seçecek utanmasa. 

Açılabilir toplar, stadlar, takımlar, kupalar mevcut. Eğer tek maçta oyundan hoşlanırsanız oynama unsuru artabilir. Grafikler resimlerden hoş gözükebilir ama herhangi bir estetiği yok. Bildiğimiz eski flaş oyunları gibi. Ayrıca bu komik boyuttaki oyunun optimizasyon sorunları da yok değil. Menülerde bile takılabiliyor. Spor oyunları yapısı gereğince çok fazla bir şey sunmuyor.  Kopanito da tüm sıradanlığı üstünde toplamış bir oyuncuk. Sahte bir oyun. 

Arkadaşlarınızla 5-10 dk oynayabilirsiniz. Ama eninde sonunda anlayacaksınız ki kafanızdan bir süre sonra silinecek bir yapım. Daha mantıklı, daha eğlenceli oyunlar bulun.

Daha fazla oyun önerisi için küratörü takip edin: https://store.steampowered.com/curator/5379168/

author: {'steamid': '76561198186291701', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1643605839}
review:
Qualidades:
+Mecânica e Jogabilidade perfeitas.
+Gráficos 2D bonitos.
+Váriedade de seleções imensa.
+Diversos torneios e tipos de partidas.
+Emoções bem grandes, especialmente no modo ''Golden Goal''
Defeitos:
-Modo online ruim.
-Tradução não disponível.
-Controles que você demora se adaptar
Resumo:
Em geral, um excelente jogo, a jogabilidade é o que mais chama a atenção, Recomendo muito, especialmente para fãs de futebol.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154694296', 'num_games_owned': 207, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1586841873}
review:
游戏价格非常实惠，半价入手更值！但是游戏还有很多缺点，例如守门员传球时不会自动停在球员脚下，往往回穿过球员，导致守的下却攻不出，也有可能是我没掌握好什么技巧？
  还有游戏的抢断是只要球员碰到带球球员就会被抢断，新手玩家会经常触不及防没有准备，即使老玩家应该也会时不时抢断传球提出界外的局面。
  但是瑕不掩瑜，价格合理，游戏很棒！如果能和好基友一起玩，顺便打出漂亮的配合，那感觉非常棒！

author: {'steamid': '76561198294065613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1534621234}
review: Jogo divertido , precisa de mais players online , poderiam caprichar mais , variedade de times e jogadores , na era 8 bit era mais divertido rssss , da pra melhorar .

author: {'steamid': '76561198306979552', 'num_games_owned': 537, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1610138267}
review:
Mocno średnia gra, polskich wydawców :P
Plusy:
+ Grafika
+ Niskie wymagania
+ Supermoce, które dostajemy podczas meczy, np. super strzał, teleportacja itd.
+ Multiplayer (martwy, ale przynajmniej jest)
+ Dużo reprezentacji i drużyn np. Bałwany, Elfy itd.
+ Duża ilość turniejów
+ Dużo achievementów
Minusy:
- Martwe multi
- Szybko się nudzi
- Sterowanie na klawiaturze nie należy do najlepszych
- Nie zauważyłem aktualizacji od dłuższego czasu
- kiedy ja to kupiłem gra kosztowała ok 12 Euro, więc całkiem sporo aktualnie cena jest ciekawsza
Ocena:
6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198313500667', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1627249797}
review:
Muy divertido el juego, no es un Pro Evolution Soccer pero tiene unas animaciones que por mas que sean basicas y simples encantan y son divertidas.
Lo jugué con el teclado y configuré a mi gusto y aun así gane la copa america en una hora en nivel aficionado.
Un juego recomendado si quieres pasarte un buen rato de futbol animado.

La única falla que creo que sería el online que está muerto o por lo menos a mi no me encontro ninguna partida y espero que lo arreglen, porque sería un verdadero juegazo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009549529', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1197, 'last_played': 1566430024}
review:
Played a cup on beginner... too easy. The gameplay is alot of fun and very chaotic!! I love making sick plays and scoring a rad goal! I had a few that made me jump out of my seat and run around lol. I played a professional cup and wow... i got smoked in the very first game! What the Ai were doing was insane and some moves they did I never have done before... such as a bicycle kick from an out of bounds throw! What really makes me happy is to see Republic of Ireland, my go-to team. ;)

This Sunday I'll be playing with a buddy on my big screen and I do not doubt we will have a blast!

(Edit after 17hrs) Yep, my buddy and I had a blast last weekend!! I still have fun playing by myself and especially after getting better at the game to actually start beating the "pro lvl" Ai. It's almost gotten too easy unfortunetly, but thankfully there's a Legendary lvl to unlock, so I'm aiming for that! It's been pretty rewarding unlocking these teams through winning cups and league tournaments, but one thing I kinda wish for are stats to these teams... yes it will just demoralize your want to play your favorite team if their stats are pretty bad compared to the others, but maybe they could just keep it to simple stats such as Aggressive and Defensive on a 100% scale. You could still play your favorite team and have a fair chance against all others, even if your team has like a 30%-70% aggressive to defensive stats scale.

Having a more defensive team could mean much more accurate defenders and goalies in their slide tackling/range, blocking incoming goal shots, as well as increasing their lob pass range (considering it as a clearing skill). For a more aggressive team, they'd have much faster attackers, faster goal kicks (more prone to knocking out enemy defenders as well as the goalie instead of having to hold B for longer for maximum speed), and less likely to get tripped by a slide tackle.

Just an idea, could be a bad one and hard thing to achieve for the devs, but it's worth a try to add a little more variety and spice to the games teams.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353151326', 'num_games_owned': 275, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 415, 'last_played': 1525527649}
review:
游戏特色：慢镜头、队伍和人物形象丰富、各种赛制、朋友调节剂。

不推荐的原因：
各队伍、角色没有差异，只是样子不同。
游戏重点——必杀技系统可玩性较低，必杀技之间的策略战术单调——犹如剪刀石头布。
而且但凡贴身抢球时，就是一顿相互铲球，除去必杀技，这就是个铲球游戏。

不知道制作组看不看得见的意见：
1.贴身就可以抢到球这点需要改变。
2.至少增加三个道具——必杀技。
3.做国家的个性化工作量大，可以做赛场的个性化，让不同的地图不只是不同的风景。

author: {'steamid': '76561198096346598', 'num_games_owned': 251, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1525792352}
review:
友尽足球
不堪守望先锋竞技里坑逼队友折磨的我和呱呱
决定找一个轻松一点的休闲游戏玩耍一哈
于是欢快的打开了steam

根据呱呱的要求 我机智的总结出了目标游戏的标签：
单机/多人/合作  欢乐 搞笑 休闲
于是出现了这个妖艳贱货
灰常满意~于是推荐给了呱呱看
呱呱看了之后开心的说出了自己的评价
“这个游戏很适合我！好像不用脑子玩！！！”
（她终于知道自己适合啥游戏了，操碎了❤的我留下了感动的泪水）
被测评所吸引的我们果断就入了手。

为啥说这游戏不用脑子呢，因为，它灰常简单。。
上下左右，awde加上一个血伏特，一共九个键
没啥规则，就是一个目标——把球送入对面球门

于是我和呱呱开始了愉（dou）快（bi）的踢球之旅
“我在哪？球在哪？
诶球怎么丢了？诶球怎么又回来了？

我人怎么躺地上了？诶诶诶？？球怎么进的？谁进的？

啊这是自家大门？？？啊？我又进了乌龙？？”
（游戏自带GIF制作器，效果爆炸 but图片好大，就不放上来杀猫了 请各位脑补）
全场飞铲，不进铲对手 还可以铲队友 被铲翻的人就会趴在地上装尸体一会。
铲到墙和门柱会撞晕。
想进球可以先把球踢到守门员头上把他砸晕。。。

总之就是一路哈哈哈哈哈哈的踢球。双人对战，膝盖铲断

review:
This game is very good, and reminds me very much of the old school football game Nintendo World Cup, I used to play on my NES. With super powers that can be used during the matches and the characters also remind me very much of that game. although I miss following
- there is no one to play this game with online 
- there is no music 
- the game seems to be forgotten as it crashes now and then, therefore I cant recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969606968', 'num_games_owned': 4382, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1123, 'last_played': 1544200927}
review:
Un juego que de primeras puede parecer una chorrada pero que detrás esconde un trasfondo bastante divertido y estratégico.

Para el singleplayer tienes varias copas y ligas que al terminarlas en dificultad profesional vas desbloqueando los equipos que están bloqueados por defecto.
Tiene muchos logros la mayoría repetidos relacionados con la dificultad con la que estas jugando.
Para jugar solo esta bien para desbloquear los equipos y sacar algún logro, pero la gracia del juego es jugarlo con amigos y chat de voz a ser posible.

Como contra le pondría que tarda un poco en cargar cuando le das a empezar a jugar, para lo que es tendría que cargar instantáneo, por lo demás es un juego divertido que te dará unas cuantas horas para jugar solo y muchas mas con amigos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198445301648', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1526540130}
review:
This football game is light and is great especially when played with local multiplayer. There are several game modes to choose from and the skills adds a lot more fun into the mix. The graphics as well as the sound of the game is pristine, however, the downside of this game for me is the ONLINE MATCHES. For some reason, every online match I join in has a slow connection. During an Online Match, the game is about a second delay due to these latency problems (server-side). Hope they get a fix for this, because overall, this is a solid, fun football game.

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198039329770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1522849214}
review:
Insanely fun. Easy to play, difficult to master.

Not much else to say - I played PES and FIFA and felt annoyed most of the time, but such a simple game had me laughing and joking with my son. I have had a rough time lately with depression so gaming is something not easy to get into and not something I can sustain for long. This game had me forgetting my problems for a couple of hours and we plan to play a hell of a lot more.

Thanks!

author: {'steamid': '76561198000203126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1537758479}
review:
Mixed reviews, was this a brigade? C'mon, this game is amazing.


This is an insanely fun pick up and play arcade experience. It's actually incredibly deep too, by far more for skillful than FIFA. The only AI issue you really fight here is the player switching, but it's a ton more than fun playing soccer on scripted rails (fifa). Couldn't recommend more!

author: {'steamid': '76561198050853569', 'num_games_owned': 3422, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1522292734}
review:
There’s a category of games which try to be neither exceptional nor genre defining, not incredibly original nor reach Crysis-like graphics but be fun as they are entertaining as they are flawed. This “fun but flawed” category is immense and gets a lot of bashing for its shortcomings, its repetitiveness, its one-dimensional story (or its no story at all) but there’s one aspect that those reviews miss and that the writers seldom get… it’s fun to play. 

The problem with sports games is that they are trying to replicate something that is repetitive in nature. How to make a futbol game NOT be repetitive when it is 22 men (or women) running after a ball in a field trying to put it between goal posts. Other sports games suffer the same innuendos but the ones that manage to get it right are special. See, as an avid player/lover of the sport, I understand this completely… and the people at EA understand this as well as they push out a “new” FIFA every year which seldom is more than graphical and squad updates but they make millions doing so… and its quite a shame really since the games get no better (in fact they get worse) and you Call of Duty realize that you’ve been doing the same maneuvers for the past six years. Still both Fifa (with its millions) and Kopanito (with its humbleness) fail in the same way, and you can’t blame them: they are both trying to recreate a repetitive sport which gets its thrills and fame at a psychological level more than physical.

Understand that when Ozil makes a sexy pass when any dumb player would’ve shot miles wide and the commentator wonders “how did he do that?” it’s about what’s going on up here in the membrane than with the legs (of course we do need them to play but hear me out). When Messi breaks Boatengs ankles and then chips Neuer, its as if he’s reach a plateau mentally where there is nothing more than the ball and the opposition; no media, no fans, no camp nue, not even himself. When the ball is at his feet, I’m sure he feels the same way a pilot feels in the air, an adrenaline junkie in war, an animal lover with his dogs….. complete.

And when you’re playing in the Sunday league and are so tired from being out of shape, nauseous from the beers you had beforehand, angry that your wife makes such a fuss instead of letting you play, and the ball comes to you and without thinking, you hit it first time… into the stands, into the defender, or hell at least into the post, and it goes top corner and you wonder…………………. “how did I do that?” and all your mates congratulate you at the corner flag and you see your wife jumping for joy (which is unheard of), THAT’S what Fifa and Kopitano are trying to recreate; everyone is already in shape, has a great touch and is a great player in the top flight (or none of that in your Sunday league jaja) but the winners are separated much more than physically but psychologically and no sports game will ever be able to replicate that with a controller in hand, maybe in vr, I don’t know, but they won’t and presently, they can’t. Kopanito is repetitive (nooo, really??) but its fun. Fun and flawed. Now go outside and kick the ball around.

review:
"support manette complet" avec la belle image du steam controller alors qu'il ne fonctionne pas du tout avec !!
Le problème est connu et épinglé dans le forum steam du jeu.
J'ai également un stick arcade qui n'est pas du tout reconnu...
Mes 2 derniers "anciens" gamepad fonctionnent mais il faut remapper les boutons...

Donc à moins d'avoir une folle envie de jouer à un jeu d'arcade au clavier, passer votre chemin.

Merci à Valve pour le système de remboursement et pas merci à Valve pour le manque totale de contrôle qualité !

author: {'steamid': '76561197982490998', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 487, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1530464391}
review:
Un gros oui!
Je cherchais un jeu de foot simpliste et drôle. Je suis 100% servi.
Les commandes sont paramétrables à souhait, ce qui est toujours du meilleur confort de jeu.
Coté gameplay, les équipes sont super drôles avec des personnages farfelus mais aussi la plupart des équipes Nat. Si on trouve Vanuatu, vous trouverez forcément votre équipe.
En jeu, après 5 min d'entrainement, on se lance dans le grand bain en mode facile et on gagne plutôt facilement. Au bout d'une heure de jeu, on passe en mode normal... C'est simple, fun, dynamique, bref très agréable a jouer.
Seul bémol pour les "power up" dont j'ai du mal a saisir le fonctionnement et la disponibilité.

L'idéal reste quand même d'affronter d'autres joueurs (surtout des amis) afin de bien rigoler. Bref, une très bonne surprise pour moi qui avait peur de la déception en l'achetant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082633270', 'num_games_owned': 1448, 'num_reviews': 222, 'playtime_forever': 458, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 458, 'last_played': 1519204938}
review:
一款很不错的小品足球游戏。
本人在此之前从未接触过足球游戏，买了这个主要是为了跟小伙伴一起玩。
直奔主题吧
优点：画风清奇、可硬核可休闲、教学尚可、开黑欢乐（只能本地合作）、价格便宜
缺点：手柄不震动，长时间游玩容易疲倦
·························································
就想到这么多，有人和你一起玩的话，推荐购买。
12块钱买到的欢乐可不少

author: {'steamid': '76561198258737783', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1519408116}
review: Bir zamanların o eşsiz Atari'deki efsane Goal 3'ü hatırlatmasından ötürü aldım oyunu, oldukça eğlenceli ve keyifli bir oyun. Türkçe desteği %100 mevcut ve 5 kişiye kadar single oynama şansınız var (4x controller + keyboard beya hepsine controller tak usb kalmasın pcde fantazi yap sana kalmış :D). 6 Lira'ya değer mi diyen arkadaşlar olacaktır, değer niye; çünkü grafikleri çok şeker, oynanış kusursuz, controller desteği %100 uyumlu (Logitech F310 kullanıyorum) ayrıca oyun yeni sürüldüğünden biraz daha merixgame' a kazandırıp geliştirmelerinde ve başka oyunları çıkarmalarında yardımcı olmak gerekir. Şu an 6 küsür TL olan fiyatın hepsini oyuna verdiğini düşünme yarısını geliştiriciye destek veriyorsun. Birde bu açıdan bak ;). Sonuç olarak al, bebe belek gelir eve açarsın oynar güzel bir oyun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122849109', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1707339878}
review:
No lo recomiendo. Pero desearia que hubiese mas gente jugando o que los servidores no anden tan mal, es imposible jugar online o incluso encontrar alguien jugando y cuando ese milagro sucede (despues de 5 o mas minutos en cola) Se desconecta automaticamente por la lentitud o mala conecciòn, nose donde se ubiquen los servidores pero problema de mì conecciòn a internet no es, lo aseguro.
 Modo campaña o ''Arcade'' o simplemente Offline, Me divierte sinceramente, pase buenas horas jugando y seguro pase màs, es curioso jugar con o contra paises que (no me da verguenza decirlo) no tenia ìdea que existìan. 
 En resumen, El modo offline me parece bueno, divertido, entretenido. El ùnico punto negativo que encuentro es el Online, de verdad espero que se solucione eso para que almenos las pocas personas que hay online intentando jugar lo puedan hacer.

review: Kendi açımdan konuşmak gerekirse arcade türünü sevmeme rağmen Kopanito güzel oynanabilir eğlenceli bir soccer oyunu olarak geldi gözüme fakat bir problem var ki oyunu hem arkadaşıma hediye olarak hem kendime almıştım anlamadığım şekilde bende çevrimiçi modu açık ulaşım sağlanabiliyorken arkadaşımda bu mod açık değil gri şekilde kesinlikle girilemiyor kendimden davet attığımda ise davet gidiyor ama hata alınıyor oyuna girerken online mod için bilen eden varsa aydınlatabilirse sevinirim..

author: {'steamid': '76561198004979949', 'num_games_owned': 694, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1573327137}
review: Genialna gra, klimat z dawnych czasów C64 i Amigi oraz tytułu Microprose Soccer ('89) :) Multi w coopie i emocje z dużym poczuciem humoru ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198071201025', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 323, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1581857022}
review:
足球小清新，可用于打发时间。
不论如何，对得起这个价格。

操作有点别扭，但熟悉了之后不难。
注意：这是一个铲球游戏！
能不能赢，就看你下脚够不够准。
没有犯规。
标准的带球动作是将球传给对方然后去铲倒他……
是的，这个动作你如果熟练后就无敌了。

控球时间越长，必杀能量积累越快。
超级射门很带感，但不是必进的，而且需要瞄方向。
守门员是可以用超级射门的，横贯全场的射门，很给力。
但破门神技并不是超级射门，而是磁铁。
站到对方球门里，等守门员开球直接吸过去……
传送也可以把球直接带到球门里，但是操作上有一点难度。

低难度进球很容易，边路吊中有奇效。
高难度进球很难，基本靠必杀。
弧线射门很好用，如果蓄力时间恰到好处，可以打到上边角弹射入网，几乎无解。
问题是高难度补位很快，对方不会给你时间去蓄力。

哦，最后，杯赛联赛如果要输了，可以退出重赛。

author: {'steamid': '76561198078093756', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 590, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 285, 'last_played': 1634062613}
review: Petit jeu de foot arcade qui mériterait un gameplay un peu plus approfondi notamment au niveau des passes. Dans l'ensemble la réalisation est basique mais suffisante pour ce type de jeu arcade. A tester avant achat car la jouabilié est quand même un peu "spéciale" au niveau des passes et frappes.

review: Eğer vs atacak arkadaşınız ya da arkadaşlarınız varsa ve eğlenecek bir oyun arıyorsanız hem rekabetçi hem de oldukça eğlenceli bir oyun Kopanito. Hem komik karakter çizimleri, hem şut veya gol attıkça dolan çeşitli özel güçler, hem de oyunda istediğiniz kadar faul yapabilmeniz gibi artı yönleri var. Tek eksi yönü olarak serverların çok boş olmasını gösterebilirim. Aktif oyuncu sayısı oldukça az fakat oynuyacak arkadaşlarınız varsa kesinlikle kaçırmayın.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271941801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1547354370}
review: This game is really fun, I am just going to say that right now. There are so many things that I like in this game. When you score a goal (especially on Professional) it feels amazing. In this game all you need to do is have fun and it will be a great game. But, and there is almost always a but for most games, some things make me a little mad. For example, the player switching can be very frustrating at some points. Also CORNER KICKS. OMG, whenever I give up a corner kick on Professional difficulty I already know that they are going to score. It is a 90% chance that they will score. There are very few things that are bad about this game. The Professional difficulty is very challenging at the beginning, but once you keep playing it gets easier and easier and soon you will be really good. Overall this game is great and you should buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198285605207', 'num_games_owned': 2608, 'num_reviews': 534, 'playtime_forever': 336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1541762222}
review:
哎呀，终于有中文了，大赞啊！！！！！！！
20180113

射门D
补心得，玩了几次，发现要按住D调好方向才容易进球，直接按D是进不了的，只会被守门员没收。
按住D的时长要自己把握好，按得太久会踢飞了。

传球S
一定要传好球，这游戏拿球时是没办法加速的，所以对方要拦截你很容易，只要靠近就会自动拦截。当然你不拿球时，是可以按SHIFT加速的。

铲球A
其实这款游戏应该叫做 流氓足球 ，疯狂铲球把对手铲到内伤都没裁判出来吹哨。
不过对方不知道怎么召唤出来的UFO，要铲球时会被雷劈。
按S换人靠近对手，往对手带球的方向按A很容易把球铲下来。
20180114

author: {'steamid': '76561198142592080', 'num_games_owned': 1741, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1561642902}

author: {'steamid': '76561197960420790', 'num_games_owned': 1549, 'num_reviews': 399, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1514570802}
review:
This is a good arcade football game (once you've sorted out the default control scheme...) that is very SWOS like.... except for one cruical flaw that means I cannot recommend the game.

The player switching is completely brain-dead, which is incredibally frustrating when playing on professional difficulty (and above), as it's often impossible to select your defender between their attacker and your keeper -- you often end up selecting another midfielder, which means they can shoot unopposed on your goal.

If they fixed that I imagine it would be a great time-filler.

(It'd also be good if there was an option to remove the power-ups. Sometimes one team has a great one and the other team has a rubbish one and that's quite unfair!)

author: {'steamid': '76561197970938346', 'num_games_owned': 794, 'num_reviews': 558, 'playtime_forever': 641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 629, 'last_played': 1571891146}
review:
As a SP game it is one-dimensional and boring; you always score goals the exact same way by holding LB to make an advanced passing/header/kick move which is code for "just pass and kick with this button held or you won't score".

Local MP might be worth a go but I doubt it because it isn't the kind of game somebody unfamiliar can just pick up, plus the "powers" seem tacked-on when the core game is needlessly convoluted considering how simple it is under the surface.

Online MP is completely devoid of players.

Just pass on this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018346350', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1482535002}
review:
Dost nadějný projekt, za málo peněz srandovní fotbálek plný prasáren a podvůdků s absencí rozhodčího. Hrál jsem před rokem a v tu dobu multiplayer dokázal zabavit, jen nebyla komunita dost veliká, aby se vždy našel hráč. Stále se ale vývojáři o hru starají a řekl bych, že dnes už to nemusí být takový problém.

Příjemná oddychovka pro všechny soutěživé, co si rádi občas zajdou za hranici pravidel.

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198268676423', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1508670198}
review:
强烈推荐开黑！！！爆笑！！！
从来没接触过足球游戏的朋友也能快速上手，因为这款游戏根本就是不是正经足球游戏（笑
从后面铲人，超能力进球，只有你想不到的，没有它做不到的，队友的球都可以自己占为己有
只不过没接触过足球游戏的朋友要注意，在切换队友的时候会比较别扭，经常出现的状况就是我是谁？我在哪儿？我要干啥？
不过这也是开黑时候儿的乐趣，我跟朋友在语音里经常笑到不能自已
遇到坑队友还会怀疑人生，是不是对面派过来的奸细！！
总之，很推荐几个人一起买~！

author: {'steamid': '76561198107786050', 'num_games_owned': 240, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1537960181}
review:
This game is pretty casual and very fun, but can also become a hardcore game if you want it too. Overall I recommened this game to anyone that has that "sports itch" at the moment and is looking for something to play. I also recommend to anyone that likes sports games in general too.

From a singleplayer point of view:

I was never into sports games or watched any sports in real life, but I do enjoy playing the games from time to time. I am one of those that got the "sports itch", I looked around and saw this game. The graphics are very welcoming and fun which pushed me to buy this. When I started playing, I was amazed at how fun the game actually was, the overall mechanics are simple, but there is an underlying depth to it which makes it hard to master.
Anyone can pick up this game and play it right away with no problem. The fun factor was instant, I just wanted to play more and more.

What also appealed to me is that, there aren't any rules, except when kicking the ball out of bounds, anything goes beyond that. You can slide tackle all you want and watch your opponent eat grass all day if you want too. This to me is awesome because sports games with all these rules turn me off, I just want to play for fun, if I want rules then I'll play the other fifa games or w/e.

Overall I would recommend purchasing this game, especially if you play with friends, I can see lots of enjoyment coming out of it. If not then definitely keep an eye out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255588391', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 996, 'last_played': 1666459917}
review:
, еПриветствую любителей всего прикольного и необычного. После покупки данной игры, даже близко не пожалел тех денег, которые "вложил" в эту игру) Во-первых, игра достаточно оживленая и динамичная, во-вторых, разнообразие игровых команд очень порадовало, в-третьих, кол-во "уровней", а именно соревнований, турниров, различные отборочные матчи, сам устанавливаешь кол-во команд в сезоне, турнире и т.д., сложность... А самое прикольное, это возможность пригласить друзей домой и рубануть толпой в одну игру!! И причем очень удобно, там человек 6 максимум вроде..., подключешь джойтики и вроде все. Имеется онлайн, автоподбор соперника или можешь свое лобби создать, достаточно интересно. Система празднования голов и автоповтор гола тоже радует. Вобщем, без минусов не обошлось... Физика хромает, особенно скин-бокс, а именно, когда между соперником и мячем, по которому ты ударил секунду назад будет 1-1.5 см, то он каким-то мистическим образом имеет шанс его перехватить..., хм.., собственно, когда подворачивается случай пробить в "девятку" и ты наблюдаешь, как никчемным вратарь соперников не долетает до мяча, то вот, к моему удивлению, его может телепортнуть резко вперед и все, плакал ваш шанс выйти финал)) 
Подведем итог, игрушка стоит тех денег, которые мы за неё платим, имеются не значительные баги, фризы, недоработки, но, впринципе, я как оптимист, отношусь к этому больше не с презрением, а с забавой и даже, иногда удается проорать от того, как можно, сука, вытащить мячь из девятки находясь у противоположной штанги!!?????? Хаха, ладно, думаю, 8 шайб из 10-ти игруха себе заработала)
Удачного дня)

author: {'steamid': '76561198013267513', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1555, 'last_played': 1577627728}
review:
[u][h1]SPASSOSO[/h1][/u]

Il prefetto binomio tra passatempo e divertimento, è un gioco molto semplice al livello di difficoltà più basso, ma mette a dura prova al livello di difficoltà più alto che tra l'altro bisogna sbloccare raggiungendo degli obiettivi. Restando in tema obiettivi, sono svariati ed alcuni complessi da sbloccare quindi garantiscono un'ottima longevità al prodotto. Peccato per l'unico neo che è il multiplayer online, praticamente quasi impossibile trovare una partita.

This is really nice. I do like arcade games like this. There's a curve to do it better and better as well. So I think for the less monetas it's really awesome. Reminds of Mario Soccer for the NGC. I recommend to play free without the assistant cause of the cool moves in the air to score!

author: {'steamid': '76561197981601200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 3406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1613, 'last_played': 1615019962}
review:
... and there I was thinking "Soccer with super moves? How rediculous! It kills the realism and ruins the game."
Then I saw the game on sale and thought I'd pick it up nevertheless just to try it out -- I was hooked. 5+1 players (of which 1 to 5 human players), 6 + 6 minute matches (by default, can be adjusted), one ball, and no referee. Havoc and slide tackles soon become a norm.

The gameplay is smooth and the AI offers a pretty decent challenge for starters. A grinder like me takes on the challenge and plays only on pro level (until platinum gets unlocked). You will be crushed for a few matches but once you get the gist you'll soon become a pro yourself and winning a game becomes a walk in the park. Challenging and fun at the same time.

These super moves, there aren't that many but they add an element of surprise to the game. Your breakthrough with the ball may be short lived as your opponent just stole the ball using super magnet, and now he's ready to catapult the ball to your goalie's face! Literally, as you watch your goaltender fall back on his butt after getting hit right between the eyes by the ball that is now slowly but surely bouncing accross the goal line. So you retaliate right from the kickoff by swiftly blasting through their defences without losing the ball and launch an extremely swerved shot right past their goalie, and you do this three times in a row withing 30 seconds (realtime) -- and you get rewarded with three achievements by doing so.

The way achievements are incorporated into the game is one of the best ways I've encountered. In the beginning of each match you get a suggestion of what to do in a match to earn fame poins, like "win without using slide tackles" or "score three more goals than your opponent", and each one of these is tied to a steam achievement so gradually you end up getting them all simply by playing the game (and completing the given challenges of course). Play as a pro and you'll get the medium and easy level achievements, too.

Soundscape is good, the intro track is catchy, and the controls are pretty intuitive except that I swapped the left and right swerve buttons. This is one of those games where local co-op supports up to 5 players so you can either team up against the AI or go rogue with elbow tacktics and have fun, yet painful brawl on a virtual soccer field. Wether you win or you lose, it's still fun.

The one thing that annoys me the most in this game is tesla chopper flying sound, but this is just a personal opinion.

All in all, this game is definetly worth checking out if you're even remotely into soccer / football. It is simply fun!

One more match? :kopanitoball:

author: {'steamid': '76561198355643322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 748, 'last_played': 1534810737}
review:
這是一款既適合把妹交友又可以闔家同樂的好遊戲
遊戲中沒有複雜的足球規則
唯一的目標就是把球踢到球門裡得分
遊戲中提供手段讓gamer搭配使用
只要搭配得宜往往可以獨創出自己的絕技
更讚的是
遊戲程式還會在進球時提供精采回放
讓您在踢出精彩好球時
還能分享在社群媒體中讓大家給你按讚
真的是非常適合休閒育樂的好遊戲
