author: {'steamid': '76561198204159008', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 3357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3357, 'last_played': 1511017678}
review:
In a different review, it is said that Kopanito All Star Soccer would be a mixture of "Mario Strikers" and "Sensible Soccer". From own experience, it cannot be accounted for the first one, but for the second. Strictly speaking, what the developers might have done is commuting the x and y axis and put the Sensible Soccer AI up again. In addition, the banana shot style and GFX remind us at least a little bit of "Micro Prose Soccer". 
As so often, these impressions may be seen as a strength and also as a weakness of the game. The strength is nostalgy, the weakness lacking complexity, as it refers to 20+ years old titels. In deed, from todays perspective, it looks like an only half complete game:
-  regardless of the four difficulty levels and the teams chosen, the AI reacts always in the same way with a difference set only in attacking aggressivity depending on the difficulty level (reducing the player's time to (re)act).
- There are procedures to invoke goals regardless of difficulty (as in Sensible Soccer) that make the game (as long as the player intends to win) extremely repetitive. 
- Some parts just seem to be incomplete and terribly unnecessary, for example the "long shots": There is no chance of passing the ball over long distances, instead there are straight shots invoked in mid-air that almost cannot lead to goals (0,2% propability) as they are harmless, automatically directed towards the middle, but fill the player's skill bar for a special ability... A bit strange, this shots should be more refined such that the player can show his/her skill performing them as this game is praised as "skill based" by the developers. Since this feature is well established in Sensible Soccer, it's even a minus compared to a 22 years old game!

Since this can be, in some way, read as a comparison review to former games, we'd like to conclude it by stating that the special abilities, such as SUPER SHOT, ELECTROSHOCK, FREEZING, WIND MASHINE (behind the goal) and last but not least the BALL MAGNET can clearly be seen as inventions and novelties to improve this kind of arcade genre, but a general recommendation looks different and shall only by given for a 70%+ sale as already stated in other reviews.

Ne me dite pas merci, ça me fait plaisir de vous aider dans votre choix...

author: {'steamid': '76561198066025304', 'num_games_owned': 279, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1507812507}
review:
毒性很强，很好玩。
虽然还不是很玩的明白。
但是有基友一起的话绝对是不容错过的佳作。
操作相比大作的足球游戏做了很多简化。上手不算很难。

这都无所谓。

重点是。
体力无限啊！随便跑，撒欢儿的跑，瞎鸡巴狂奔。
也没有红牌，见人就踢，我踢，我踢，看我不踢死你丫的，哈哈哈哈哈哈！
真好玩

author: {'steamid': '76561197990469178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1484866373}
review:
It's just kind of dull and lacks flair to keep a lasting audience.
It's an otherwise [b]extremely[/b] competent arcadey soccer game.

I really like soccer games, but there's almost no sense of sportsmanship, hype, or excitement when you play. The crowd is lifeless, the players have little to no personality or visual distinction, and the game is just far too quiet.

What keeps a lot of people around, myself included, are usually the attachment to the characters and the tension that comes with scoring or even just running with the ball. This game doesn't really have all that.

Solid mechanics and more than decent soccer title, but very little else.

author: {'steamid': '76561198310703161', 'num_games_owned': 381, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 722, 'last_played': 1624798428}
review:
一款技术与趣味并存的欢乐向游戏
觉得不同玩家都可以从中找到乐趣，本地同屏食用更佳，很开心我有这么一些人
+适用人群广，欢乐休闲， 也不乏硬核性（最高难度）
+适合作party game
+铲球好评，滑稽
-线上无人，但是对于小游戏，服务器也无法奢望
8.5/10

review: Gerçekten çok tatlı karakterleri takımları olan ve göz yormayan bir grafiğe sahip kendısı arkadaşlarla oynanınca tadından yenmeyen bir oyun ben oynarken çok eğlenıyorum oyunda attıgınız gollerı gıft halınje getırebılıyorsunuz (çok enteresan goller oluyor) arkadaşınız varsa çok güzel bir oyun yoksada güzel bir oyun fakat onlıne oyunucus çok az quick maçlarda bi kaç kişi buluyor ama browser odalar hiç yok gerçekten hiç yok ama bir güzel yanıda eğer evde 2 kardeşseniz bir bilgisayar üzerınden oynayabılıyor kupa maçlarını kardeşlerinizle yapabılıyorsunuz bence bu çok güzel bir özellık bunun kadar eğlencleı bır oyun gösterın deselerdı ben (Stick Fight) oyunun gösterirdim oda çok manyak bir oyun çıldırmalık bir oyun stick fayt lara hayrsansanız onuda alın fayt uashdıouasdasd nese hadi ii eğlenceler.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100381010', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 855, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 751, 'last_played': 1647492232}
review: 在gba时代，有款游戏叫做《友情足球4v4》，虽然是个小游戏，但是制作精美，剧情引人入胜，游戏系统在那个时代已经可以称得上十分优秀，这个翻译过来叫友尽的足球游戏，名字恰恰与之相反，但是这种足球游戏，不管之前你喜欢的是fifa还是pes还是fm，他都有着独到的魅力。

author: {'steamid': '76561198140118346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1528273678}
review: Como su nombre indica, Kopanito es de coña. Lo llamaría la "mascota del antifútbol", un fútbol sin árbitros en el que la forma de quitar la pelota es lanzarse en plancha contra el rival. Un saque de banda o de puerta a favor es siempre una ocasión de peligro para el rival gracias a la escasa puntería propia, un homenaje al "fútbol-waltrapa". Probablemente en la vida hubiese echado más de la media hora que jugué inicialmente si no fuese porque es el único juego que funciona en mi destierro a un portátil con un rendimiento gráfico equivalente al de una piedra del suelo. La broma que comenzó con el clásico "voy a echarme unas risas con esta mierda" terminó en "joder, voy a jugar otro partido más". Y así sin parar. Vale la pena indicar que, al contrario que en los PES y los FIFA donde intentan copiar las caras de los jugadores reales, Kopanito hace lo que le da la gana, lo cual hace muchísimo más divertido el asunto. Te puedes encontrar con un señor muy parecido al tal Roncero haciendo de portero de Islas Cook, o un hermano de Diego Costa de atacante de Haití. El antifútbol ha llegado y es muchísimo más divertido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198291031779', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1507355019}
review:
尽管游戏时间1.3小时，但我已经看到了这款游戏强大的操作性和可玩性：
没有剧情，完全靠杯赛来完成线下模式，分三种等级的奖杯；
传球的微操和射门角度和弧度都需要很长时间的磨练；
该游戏最多可以五人同时操作一支队伍进行比赛，也是面基的好选择；
团队合作里更是可以互坑队友，把队友放倒之类的搞笑场面很多；
终极技能会随控球时间获得，用得好可以扭转局势；
进球视频可以导出gif格式分享；
游戏人物非常可爱。
有中文（虽然没什么用）。

author: {'steamid': '76561198141767887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1506381202}
review:
Football is one of my favourite sports, just behind motor racing, and of course I like to play "e-football".

Games like FIFA, PES or many others are good games, however, often, when you're playing it, you get so much focused in winning the matches, that you forgot the main principle of video game: to have fun. And, fortunately, "Kopanito" is all about it, having fun.

I mean, the gameplay is so easy to understand, but at the same time, so much precise that often, even when you lose the match you're with a silly smile on your face thinking "what a great match!".

The multiplayer is a great sum! Nowadays, times where we're being pushed to individual gameplays, or at most online multiplayer, "Kopanito" has still having a good local multiplayer - cooperative and competitive. Alright, FIFA and PES are just like that in this point, however "Kopanito" is more fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198290144620', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 286, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1499028319}
review:
因为没有中文版（好像后来加了），所以先大致介绍一下这个游戏吧。这游戏是2D画面的六人制足球，游戏支持最大玩家数为5人，可以手柄操作也可以键盘操作，游戏内容跟《热血足球》很像，贴身即断球或者铲抢拿球，你可以正儿八经的把球射进门里，也以放个大招开个挂。游戏里没有犯规一说，所以也就没有越位这个概念，不过袭击门将可行不通，因为他拿球的时候无敌。
键位设定很简单，拿球时有短传、长传、射门、走路、直塞球切换，防守时有切人、铲球、冲刺、走路。射门的时候会进入子弹时间，然后开始调整角度和弧线，当然没弧线的球会很容易被扑出。
关于大招，在比赛时会有个进度条“蓄力”，平时控球、断球、扑救都会涨进度，满了之后会随机——貌似——给一个技能，然后按下大招键释放。据我所见这些技能有大力制导足球、吸球磁铁、球门吹风机、瞬移、范围冰冻魔法、谁拿球帮谁的电击无人机。
游戏里有很多国家的球队，单机挑战有各个洲际的比赛，赛制就和世界杯一样，先小组赛，然后淘汰赛，赢了特定难度的比赛就可以解锁特定球队。

接下来我就吐槽一下这款游戏。
之前看到有人说这游戏好过FIFA，现在看确确实实是言过其实了。
首先这游戏不能变阵，如果没有几个玩家相互配合，玩起来根本无战术可言，进攻时你看电脑控制的球员，要么原地发呆，要么转身往回跑拿球。
其次，贴身秒抢的设定也让人很不舒服，有时候人挤一堆你根本不知道球最后到谁手里，有时候感觉良好想带球突围，然后下一秒就发现球已经被抢走而且跑远了。
还有这游戏给人的感觉就是拼操作的，就是用眼花缭乱的闪避来防止对方抢断，或者精确尾随精确抢断，真是手粗点玩着都不爽。
另外关于闪避那当然是搓手柄最爽，轻松画圆，但是地滚球短传经常传不中人，不得不起高球；而键盘处理短传的精度却高出不少，但是又不适合防守锁定和进攻闪避，起高球的机会也不多；但不管你用什么操作，门将的短传几乎百分百会传丢，要不然就是后卫刚得球就被对方前锋秒断，再不然你急着快攻按短传门将能直接不转身把球踢进门里，简直操蛋。
最后，关于电脑难度，无非就是你的球队和着对方球队来开挂，不但球经常莫名传给对方，平时站位也对玩家不利，经常一个球门球出去立马变对方反击。
这游戏专业？那是不可能的。FIFA的生涯模式都能秒这游戏几条街，不过人家毕竟是“航空母舰”，强拽过来比也真是没得说了。

另外再说一下游戏系统，我觉得没什么深度，几个球队除了站位、抢断，根本看不出区别，系统在数值方面也没什么说明，惟一区别大概就是国旗和花色吧。

评分：7/10，娱乐有加，深度不足。不过如果你想看一些神奇的进球，《足球经理》会更适合你。

PS：我不会跟你说每次看到朋友浪费我给出的射门机会，又不做二过一配合，真是有摔手柄的冲动←_←

author: {'steamid': '76561198058123128', 'num_games_owned': 433, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1566418407}
review:
Bir Futbol oyununda bu kadar çok güleceğimi tahmin etmezdim. Şirin grafikli gerçekçi futbolun yanından bile geçmeyen bir futbol oyunu. adamların animasyonlarına oyundaki ufak detaylara bakarken bi bakmışsınız top ayağınızdan kaçmış. Zaten o top bi yerinde durmuyor bazen kim ne derde ne yapıyor anlamıyorsunuz bile :) Atari zamanı Gol 3 ün günümüz için farklı değişillerle sunulmuş bir türü diyebiliriz. Oynaması keyifli Arkadaşlarla oynaması daha çok keyifli.Aynı fikirde arkadaş topluluğnda oynamaktan zevk alabileceğiniz basit ama güzel bir oyun... 

Bu oyun için 30 lira falza olabilir ama indirimdeyken 6 liraya düşüyor o zaman alınır işte...

author: {'steamid': '76561198035303725', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 1150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1150, 'last_played': 1500538280}
review:
If I could give this game a neutral rating I would but after a slight consideration it needs to be negative. 

This game is basically a World Cup clone (from the old NES) and it's quite fun if you've got a few controllers and friends to play with locally but other than that it doesn't offer much. I've got a ton of games I'd rather play solo and I've NEVER managed to get an online game against a random person despite quite a few tries.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978033254', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1503780296}
review:
[h1]De l'arcade ? Oui mais après entrainement[/h1]

Alors qu'est ce que ça vaut ? Et bien, disons que pour un titre qui se veut arcade, il faut quand même s'entrainer pas mal avant d'arriver à s'amuser. Au départ, les parties sont vraiment molles.
À force de maîtrise et d'entrainement, on finit par arriver à créer un jeu un peu plus dynamique, mais c'est pas complètement ça.

Il est plus recommandé d'y jouer à plusieurs après quelques sessions d'entrainement que seul face à l'IA. J'ai consacré une vidéo aux jeux de foot arcade, et j'aborde Kopanito à 1:48 pour ceux qui veulent directement aller voir ce que ça donne en vrai ! :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=csupj_PgqIw

NOTE : En difficulté pro, c'est de la bouse. Le goal est con comme un balai et les joueurs de votre équipe ne font que de la figuration.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960474230', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1501627376}
review:
L'IA complétement aux fraises ruine complétement le jeu dès que vous passer en pro. Les bots sont incapables de créer de l'espace pour que vous puissiez faire des passes en profondeur.^

De plus, le jeu souffre de mauvaises implémentations de certaines capacités, telle que le sort "éclair" qui permet de fondroyer les ennemis quand vous avez le ballon. Kes ennemis peuvent vous foudroyer quand vous avez activé le sort, alors que le contraire n'est pas possible...

Bref, peut-être qu'en multi il est bien, je n'ai pas essayé. Mais en solo, clairement pas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134315627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1070, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1067, 'last_played': 1500769667}
review:
Bought this a year ago. I still have some hope that this game will get better.

What I don't like about It:
The biggest issue, very poor sound ambience. International Superstar Soccer, a game released near 1995 outperforms a 2016 game in that area.

Constant changes on the gameplay. Filtering passes doesn't seem to be there again. Player receiving the ball has a slow reaction again.

Bugs that weren't there in early access are now here (just adressed one in the discussions (Issues) after 5 minutes of gameplay.

Game seems to be good for local multiplayer matches with friends. Forget about online MP, It's dead at the moment. It was a lag fest with non locals time ago and I couldnt test the performance with people in my country over LAN so I can't tell how good or bad It was.

Honestly, It has potential, but all these issues and lack of features makes hard to recommend Kopanito even on sale.

"Behold the kickmen" and Fernando Sansberro's "Pixel Cup Soccer 17" look way more promising than this one.

review: 不是足球爱好者，同时是手残党。进一个球能高兴半天（人机），赢了电脑就觉得自己天下无敌hhhhhhh。期待和好友一起玩，玩了在补测评。

author: {'steamid': '76561198011826552', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 726, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1566756062}
review:
O jogo deixa bem claro qual é o seu principal objetivo: divertir o player.
Levando em consideração isso, o jogo é realmente muito bom,  tanto no quesito gráficos,  quanto jogabilidade e até sons.
Mas vamos por partes.
-O que mais te chamou atenção nesse game?
Primeiramente o gráfico, todos os personagens caricatos e uma infinidade de personagens (todos os jogadores q eu vi até agora são únicos, podem ser até parecidos, mas todos tem uma característica que é unica) isso sem contar com os times doferentes que o jogo disponibiliza,  como o time de vampiros ou o time de bonecos de neve.

-E dentro do jogo?
quando você starta o game a primeira coisa q nota é q nao tem juíz, ou seja, não existe falta... exato, carrinho pra todo lado, sem dó.  Os campos são grandes, o q permite fazer diversas jogadas diferentes. Os chutes são um show a parte, quando seu boneco vai chutar o game fica em slow motion (É o tempo q vc tem para mirar e colocar curva caso queira), e esse efeito deu uma cara que ha tempos eu não via em jogos de esporte (mais especificamente em jogos de futebol). É uma emoção a parte ver seu chute em camera lenta e dar aquela sensação de "cara... vai ser um golaço".
Tem tbm um detalhe muito bacana no campo, cada carrinho dado pelos bonecos deixa uma marca na grama (ou em algunscasos madeira/gelo, dependendo do campo que vc escolher), isso mostra que quando criaram o game pensaram em tudo.

-Sons?
Os sons são bacanas porém poderiam ser melhores, de vez enquando acontece algum bug e o som simplesmente desaparece.

-Considerações finais
Vale a pena cada centavo gasto (comprei em promoção mas nao me arrependeria de pagar o preço original)
O jogo é divertido, podendo ser jogado em até 10 players, é um ótimo jogo para ser jogado com seus amigos. 
Ahh... para os fãs de Fifa Street, o jogo parece de leve com ele, talvez pelo fato dos super poderes que você adquire aleatoriamente durante a partida.
Super recomendo, está entre meus top 3 jogos da steam.

Alguma crítica construtiva, dúvidas ou comentários? Deixe suas palavras aqui.

Espero ter ajudado :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198023441855', 'num_games_owned': 3610, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 438, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1499903836}
review:
In una galassia lontana ©, prima che i vari FIFA e PES arrivassero a cannibalizzare il mercato e a lobotomizzare i giovani di mezzo mondo, i videogiochi di calcio si ritagliavano un seguito dedicato all'interno del grande calderone degli arcade da sala giochi, approdando in un secondo momento anche sulle maggiori console casalinghe. 

Kopanito All-Star Soccer è sostanzialmente un omaggio ai vecchi soccer games di origine nipponica, ruspanti e genuini: in particolare non può passare inosservata la grande somiglianza con un titolo storico per Game Boy e NES, e cioè l'indimenticato e per me indimenticabile NINTENDO World Cup di Technos (a.k.a. Nekketsu Kōkō Dodgeball Bu: Soccer Hen... starring Kunio-kun!).

Sulle prime, Kopanito potrebbe sembrare un gioco eccessivamente semplificato: effettivamente i controlli sono ridotti all'osso e prevedono passaggio raso-terra, pallonetto, tackle e tiro, lasciando poco spazio all'immaginazione e al genio calcistico. In realtà a livelli di difficoltà elevati il gioco acquista una profondità inaspettata, e la capacità di intercettare le traiettorie di passaggio, di giocare sul breve o ancora di effettuare rapidi cambi di gioco fanno spesso la differenza tra un successo e una sonora sconfitta. Badate bene, siamo ovviamente lontani anni luce dal realismo tecnico/tattico offerto delle serie citate in apertura, con i quali è inutile fare paragoni. A rimarcare questo aspetto si aggiungono la totale assenza di sanzioni per le entrate da macellaio, oltre ai vari, improbabili power-up che potremo collezionare ed utilizzare nell'arco di un match: si va dal super-tiro in puro stile Holly & Benji fino al teletrasporto, dall'enorme ventola che respinge ogni tiro fino al magnete che ci permette di strappare la palla all'avversario senza nemmeno muoverci.

Lo stile grafico di Kopanito è unico nel suo genere. I giocatori mostrano tratti somatici differenti a seconda del continente/nazione di provenienza, rendendo di fatto ogni singolo team unico e facilmente riconoscibile; pur non disponendo di alcun tipo di licenza e nonostante siano assenti i nomi dei calciatori, con un po' di attenzione è possibile scovare tra le squadre più blasonate qualche giocatore reale (es. Zanetti ma soprattutto Messi nell'Argentina). Le uniformi si rifanno per quanto possibile all'aspetto delle casacche ufficiali delle varie federazioni, con colori sgargianti e sempre molto piacevoli; infine è possibile scegliere la location della partita scorrendo tra un buon numero di stadi differenti, o addirittura cambiare l'aspetto del pallone da gioco.

Kopanito è senza dubbio un gioco che non può mancare nella collezione di ogni retrogamer che si rispetti, perchè incarna in maniera perfetta l'essenza dei soccer game classici, con un gameplay che riesce nell'impresa tutt'altro che banale di riproporre in chiave moderna l'inconfondibile fascino dell'approccio arcade old-style. Per una volta sono davvero dispiaciuto nel constatare che i server online siano praticamente semi-deserti: il multiplayer globale, con la possibilità di ospitare fino a 10 giocatori nella stessa partita (5v5), poteva essere il fiore all'occhiello di un gioco già di per se assolutamente apprezzabile per la componente single-player. 

Peccato!

[i][b]Se questa recensione ti è piaciuta clicca "Segui" sulla [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/retrogamingcafe/curation]pagina del Curatore[/url] del mio gruppo: sarai sempre aggiornato con i miei personali consigli e le recensioni dei migliori titoli indie/retro/roguelite in circolazione![/b][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198025833979', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1498441603}
review:
El juego en si es muy bueno y no tengo muchas quejas, pero hay una cosa que si me molesta bastante: El hecho que la gran mayoria de los equipos nacionales estan bloqueados y que hay que jugar para desbloquerlos. Esto incluso puede tener un trasfondo cuasi-xenofobico, puesto que equipos de paises muy populares (como Mexico, Brasil, Argentina, etc) estan bloqueados y que te tengas que romper la cabeza para desbloquearlos, cuando hubiera tenido mas sentido tener como equipos ocultos a equipos ficticios o chistosos.

Cambiare mi opinion sobre el juego cuando los programadores cambien semejante ridiculez.

Would recommend if this stupid mechanic was fixed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015588078', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1501793787}
review:
Gutes Spiel+
Angenehmer Schwierigkeitsgrad+
Witzige Aufmachung+
Erinnert an Smash Soccer für den Gamecube

Wer ein kurzweiliges, lustiges bzw. witziges Fußballspiel
mit derben Grätschen ohne Folgen (außer der Rasen leidet) sucht,
ist mit diesem Spiel gut versorgt.

Es gibt keine Lizenzen, die sind aber auch nicht Notwendig.
Dieses Spiel kommt mit einer sehr ausgewogenen Spielmechanik daher,
dass ich es sogar als E-Sport ansehen würde. Es geht ums reine Können 
und nicht um festgelegte Spielerwerte.
Vereinzelte Superstars wie Messi, Ronaldo, Puyol und Co. sind sogar wiederzuerkennen.

Von mir gibts ne klare Kaufempfehlung

author: {'steamid': '76561198060626465', 'num_games_owned': 385, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1603659452}
review:
Świetna gra. jestem pesymistą dlatego zacznę od wad:
-teleportowanie się bramkarza do piłki z którą wpada do bramki,
-za dużo wślizgów,
-brak możliwości wyłączenia power up'ów,
-lagi gdy dołączymy na czyjś serwer, nawet jeśli połączenie z tą osobą w innych grach jest bez zarzutu,
-mała popularność (brak serwerów),

Plusy? :
+przyjamna grafika ("śmiechowa"),
+śmieszna rozgrywka (odbieranie sobie nawzajem piłek raz za razem),
+nietypowe drużyny (bałwany,elfy,mikołaje,renifery,zombie,wampiry),
+mapa "hala" gdzie można cieszyć się ciagłymi próbami (udanymi lub nie) strzelania bramek, bez out'ów i rożnych,

W normalnej cenie nigdy bym tej gry nie kupił ale 70% zniżki to już był tzw "must have"

author: {'steamid': '76561197980692989', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1499526196}
review:
Tryed this game for the first time with a friend.

We discovered there's no refree and there are no rules, we completely forgot about scoring goals and started playing the "break ankle game".
We discovered superpowers and air support.
We discovered that you can play a "reindeer vs santa" match.
We played more
I won

Cons: multiplayer is quite empty and netcode is crappy
Pros: More teams in the roster than Fifa

11/10 best 5 bucks ever wasted in my entire life

author: {'steamid': '76561198077963106', 'num_games_owned': 3227, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1559345330}
review:
En primer lugar, al principio tenía dudas para comprarlo, lo ví al 70% y quise guardar la oferta para ver que echaban en las ofertas de verano. Cuando ví que me quedaba para comprar este juego, no lo dudé y lo adquirí.

Cuando lo adquirí empecé a jugarlo, me enganchó. Es un buen juego, pero estupendo. Me recordó a un juego del facebook que solía jugar. Meter tiros desde mi casa... hacer faltas sin parar incluso a mis propios compañeros... el mismo sistema de pases. Al principio no me gustó por la misma dinámica que tiene frente a un juego que estuvo gratuito tiempo atrás.

Pero este juego es completamente diferente. He metido goles a lo Oliver y Benji (Tsubasa Ozora), a lo Roberto Carlos... y te ríes, porque son tiros que lo haces de coña y dichos tiros salen así y gol.

Si estáis con las rebajas, pillároslo. Os va a encantar y os engancharéis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072202577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1498889663}
review:
总评：5.5/10

为什么要把射门这么爽的事情，搞成子弹时间那样的慢动作，导致爽快感全无？
为什么进攻球员只要和防守球员轻轻一挨，球就丢了，想护球都没门？
为什么守门员发球总是发不到本方球员脚下，守门员是瞎子吗？
为什么……
为什么……
为什么……

如果您是一位重度街机足球游戏玩家，那么请远离这款游戏，免得给您添堵。

建议作者先把《得点王》和《VR射手》玩上几百个小时，回过头再来看看自己做的游戏，就明白问题出在哪儿了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198004689562', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1537012789}
review:
Мне очень интересно, кто ищет в игре за 83 рубля глубины геймплея или еще чего-то серьезного. Ребят, это футбол для друзей, которые захотели поржать и расслабиться за бокальчиком пива. Либо хороший способ отдохнуть тем, кто устал от серьезных FIFA и PES (привет, это я).
Это не игра на постоянку, не нужно затирать её до дыр, доводя свои действия до автоматизма, а потом жаловаться на трехкнопочный геймплей. Просто пригласите к себе друзей на выходной/праздник или поиграйте с семьей после тяжелого рабочего дня. И тогда вы получите максимум удовольствия от Kopanito All-Stars Soccer. За 83 рубля это подарок.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130883382', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1099, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1552074880}
review:
İndirimde 6₺ 'ye kütüphaneye eklenilebilecek bir oyun. Tuş yapısı standart futbol oyunlarıyla (fifa, pes) benzerliğinden dolayı alışmak kolay. Online olarak 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, 5v5 mevcut ama arkadaşlarınızla birlikte başkalarına karşı oynanmıyor. İleriki dönemde eklenecektir. Arkadaşlarınızla cpu'ya karşı oynayabilir veya kendi aranızda kapışabilirsiniz. Arkadaşlarınızla oynayacaksınız oynanış süresi epey artabilir. Atılan pas isabetlerine ve gole göre kazanılan puanlarla gelen yetenekler mevcut. Oyunda hakemin, doğal olarak faulün olmadığını da eklemek gerekebilir.

+ Multiplayer
+ Basit oynanış
+ 6₺
+ Co-op, versus modları

- Online modu henüz yetersiz
- Sağ, sol, aşağı yukarı ve çapraz dışında bir yöne hareket mümkün değil (konsol dahil)

author: {'steamid': '76561197978534278', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 563, 'last_played': 1687897427}
review:
Fun and addictive at lower difficulties. Bit barebone...

Difficulty determines how much the game will either ignore your input or prolong the input so you don't only steal the ball with a sliding, but also kick it over the sideline, regardless of you releasing the key or not. Playing professional, it also tends to completely ignore your attempts to switch player to a specific player, or automatically switches you to the most useless player the moment you try to intercept, ignore the keys when you try to pass so you're almost always too late, and so it's near impossible to even defend... It feels like cheating in how REDICULOUSLY noticable this is.

Lightning powerup somehow only shoots players on the players side, regardless of who triggers it, so getting this powerup is hardly a good thing...

The teams are different in their tactics, which keeps the game interesting.

All in all, it's a fun game, but the way the difficulty affects the controls in addition to the speed, accuracy and skill of their players makes it very painful to even watch, and completely destroys the value for Professional. And since most achievements and unlocks rely on Professional, you only get to enjoy 2 3rds of the assets (shirts, ball, stadiums, etc).

author: {'steamid': '76561198223716456', 'num_games_owned': 1114, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1594482590}

author: {'steamid': '76561198037536195', 'num_games_owned': 336, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1589245168}
review:
This game is pretty awesome. I view it is a modern day Nintendo World Cup, except more fluid and faster pace and with optional super powers. If your looking for an arcade soccer/football game that's easy to pick up and play, look no further. This game is worth every penny spent, especially if it is on sale :)

Pros:

- Fairly easy to customize through local files
   - Can add teams/stadiums/balls without replacing existing items
- Controller support. It works well.
- Character design makes me smile
- Difficulty steps are consistent and fair
- Local multiplayer supports up to 5 players (full team of field players)

Cons:

- No in-game team customizer
- Not a big online community

author: {'steamid': '76561198014080229', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1501962121}
review:
Un jeu de foot à la sensible soccer pour ceux qui connaissent. Vraiment marrant et pas si facile à prendre en main. Il faut un bon timng pour passr tirer tacler. On peut sortir le gardien avec le bouton "Y" du pad XboX.
Il y a des cous spéciaux genre un super tir de la mort qui tue, un hélico qui électrocute les adversaires qui s'approchent trop près etc... Perso je sui spas fan de cette option et j'espère que l'on pourra tout paramètrer et configurer son mode de jeux sur mesure.
Pour l'instant il y a du monde qui joue mais c'est pas non plus surpeuplé. 

 Bref on s'amuse ! 
Surtout avec la promo à 70% qui m'a motivé et je ne regrette pas du tout.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107516348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 936, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1526600123}
review: Sin duda es el sucesor espiritual del "Sensible Soccer". Si jugaste a ese juego de los 90 este te va a ecantar. No tiene nada de serio, de hecho a parte de selecciones tiene equipos hechos por vampiros, muñecos de nieve, hombres calabazas, renos  y cosas asi. El juego es puro nervio y frenético, no tiene penalties, ni fueras de juego y puedes hacer todas las entradas que quieras (salvo al portero). A diferencia del Sensible Soccer la  vista es lateral, y tiene diferentes botones, de pase largo, corto y tiro (el cual se ralentiza durante unos segundos para que elijas la dirección) Tiene tambien un botón para "magias" las cuales van saliendo aleatoriamente segun la posesion de juego. En definitiva si quieres un juego para desconectar y echarte unos vicios rapidos, que incluso como te descuides pueden ser horas, este es tu juego. Con amigos no lo he probado pero online tiene que ser la risa. 100% Recomendado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011091888', 'num_games_owned': 1225, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1498761682}
review:

More power ups, An option to make and manage your own team with custom heads, clothes etc, a currency you earn by winning games, workshop support to share map and character creations, more sound effect (diversity) etc to name a few.

review:
Oyun fiyatıyla kıyaslandığında gayet iyi bir oyun.Fakat kısa bir süre sonra kayma mekaniği insanı sinir ediyor sahanın her tarafında kayan adamlar görmek mümkün-maçına göre değişebilir-aynı zamanda takımlar arasında herhangi bir fark yok.Örneğin her takımın kendine ait bir özel gücü olabilir vb.Oyunun Online bölümünde sıkıntı var üç dört defa maç aratmama rağmen hiç maç bulmadı bulduysa da bağlanamadı ama arkadaşımla oynadığım zamanda bir problemle karşılaşmadım.KIsaca oyunun offlıne modu sizi bir süre oynadıktan sonra sıkabilir ama arkadaşlarınızla keyifli vakit geçirmek için ideal bir oyun.

PUAN:82/100

author: {'steamid': '76561198322569236', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1498204869}

author: {'steamid': '76561197982486331', 'num_games_owned': 166, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 1051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 561, 'last_played': 1701536193}
review:
I've only played a few matches but I already really enjoy this game.  5 player local co-op is awesome (up to 4 controllers + keyboard).

Easy to find a suitable difficulty level.  I'm only on Amateur as I've just started, but games are close.

The controls are pretty straight-forwards though you can get quite creative and skillful with only a few moves.  For example, passing the ball just ahead of yourself so you can sprint to it and slide off with it for a boost of speed.

Default game setting of a 6 minute match (3 minute halves) makes for intense amounts of fast-paced chaos, with options to shorten/extend as desired.

Super moves can make for some crazy and hilarious plays.

Goals can be quickly converted into GIFs with built-in GIF creator.  It breaks up the fast-paced intensity because it takes a few moments, but I really love it.

Got it on sale for $3.59.  Worth every penny and then some.

Definitely reminiscent of those NES World Cup days where eliminating the other team is an option.

Best part is everything is based on skill - no pre-determined animations.  Every shot, pass, slide, super-move and header is yours to control giving a high skill cap, making every goal that much more satisfying.

author: {'steamid': '76561198367235220', 'num_games_owned': 28, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1497992090}
review:
Понятия не имею почему у этой игры столько положительных отзывов. Я конечно ничего не ждал от такой аркадки, но это какая то не понятная игра от которой у меня за пол часа игры заболела головаю. Я просто не понимаю, что там нужно делать. КАК В НЕЁ ИГРАТЬ ? Почему голкипером я могу управлять обеих команд , что ДЕЛАТь  Аааа Сложнаааа. 

Тайм идет безумно долго. На поле творится никому непонятный хаос никто не знает в какие ворота бить бьют куда хочется . И при всем при этом еще и музыки нет во время самой игры, играешь и слышны только удары мяча , и тишинааааа.

review: Gra według mnie bardzo fajna i dałbym jej 8/10, ale daję jej ledwie 2/10 z powodu tego, że nie mogę dołączyć do meczy online. Pierwsze 2 macze były bez problemu, ale teraz za każdym razem gdy próbuje z kimś losowym zagrać wo dodaje mnie do meczu i zanim zobaczę boisko mnie wywala i wyskakuje komunikat, że utracono połączenie z gospodarzem. Próbowałem dołączyć wielokrotnie i nawet zainstalowałem tę grę ponownie, ale z ponad 70 minut naliczonych mi w tej grze przez steama grałem tylko jakieś 15-20, a resztę... PRZECZEKAŁEM W KOLEJCE.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138165021', 'num_games_owned': 260, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1497979810}

author: {'steamid': '76561198327999731', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1498149395}

author: {'steamid': '76561198355900616', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1510394661}
review:
鏟球後讓所有人追之不及的衝刺、萬夫莫敵直入禁區，然後不慌不忙調好射球路線，GOOOAL!!!
可能兵臨城下時對方守門員突然搬出大電扇吹跑球、空中降下雷電劈中球員、或者磁鐵吸走球，但你也可以用SUPER SHOT在中場直接進球還以顏色，進球後充滿喜感的誇張示威動作，更是百看不厭啊~

你想玩國家隊？有！
你想玩非人類？有！
你想在單機多人玩？有！
你想在線上挑戰全世界高手？有！

這麼好的遊戲，搭配超美的閃亮足球徽章，也不過5美元。在FIFA可能還抽不到一張金卡呢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198034118715', 'num_games_owned': 4134, 'num_reviews': 508, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1497614480}
review:
BOTが操るキーパーを含めず、オンラインなら最大5:5で、オフラインでもK/B＋パッド4個で最大5人まで遊べるサッカーゲー。

審判不在で反則し放題、ゲージを溜めての必殺技あり、10人までオンラインプレイ可能、とこれだけ聞くとすごい楽しそうだし、熱血高校ドッジボール部サッカー編とかドラッキーのAリーグサッカーとかこの手の奴には優秀なお手本がいくらもあるので丸パクリしてオンライン機能をつけるだけでハズしっこないジャンル。

……のはずなんだけど、オフラインでの画面共有プレイを主眼に設計されてるっぽい仕様がシングルやオンラインではマイナスに働く。

画面共有ではなるべく多くの選手を一度に画面に収めなければならず、自然とカメラが引き過ぎになりキャラが小さく一個一個の動きがせせこましくなる。またフィールドを隠さないように各種表示も小さく、点数や残り時間はさっぱり目立たないしスローインとかの演出もしょぼい。さらにプレイヤーの会話を邪魔しないようワーワーと観客の声による環境音はあってもBGMがなく、何かしら音は鳴ってるのにシンと静まり返っているような錯覚に陥る。

各チームごとのゲージ消費技も誰が発動させちゃっても大差ないようになのか防御や嫌がらせどまりで派手な必殺シュートは無いし、コートも精々壁で覆われているか否かくらいの差でベルトコンベアが仕掛けてあるとか地雷が埋まってるとか砂嵐が起こるとかそういうハチャメチャ感も足りない。

多分オフラインでドンチャン騒いでやれば面白いんだろうけど、プレイヤーが自主的に補填してやらないとゲーム側が提供できる盛り上がりが乏しいという残念なゲーム。

review:
M'bof.

En fait, il est bien trop proche d'un jeu de foot traditionnel: les bonus idiots qui devraient rendre le gameplay "arcade" et fun même pour les réfractaire à PES/FIFA ne tombent que tous les 100 ans, et entre temps, on a juste un tackle bourrin à se mettre sous la dent.

Bref, pas aussi drôle que ce que son look laisse penser, son gameplay est beaucoup trop classique.

author: {'steamid': '76561198206571095', 'num_games_owned': 199, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1490581151}
review:
Very fun, Mario Super-Strikers-esque game with one glaring problem. The online is just nonfunctional, and there are never any players in the lobby.

If you have someone to play local co-op with or against, this game is a blast! You can slow down time and curve your shots, and there's lots of cool power-ups and such. Additionally, if you really like the single player, there's like an infinite amount of tournaments in the game, with increasing difficulty. 

No matter what you do though, probably wait till the game is on sale. $14 is a bit steep for what amounts to a pretty decent arcade-y soccer (football) game with a nonfunctional online.
7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198039463444', 'num_games_owned': 322, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1698948564}
review:
Troppo carino, troppo divertente e davvero rilassante.
Dimenticate le statistiche di Fifa e PES, dimenticate il realismo, il fuorigioco, i falli ed i cartellini.
Aggiungete colpi speciali, come il supertiro, la calamita, il satellite difensivo, il teletrasporto, e capirete la vera dimensione di questo piccolo gioiello indie.
Peccato che non ci sia nessuno a giocarlo online. Sarebbe uno sballo assoluto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002557842', 'num_games_owned': 1103, 'num_reviews': 283, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1610631341}
review:
Me encanta los juegos deportivos arcade, no creo que necesiten mucho para ser juegos divertidosd. Pero a Kopanito le falta mucho contenido y más locura para destacar. No hay apenas power-ups y esta lleno de contenido vacío (todas las copas, mapas, equipos, meros skins tofos iguales). Me parece bien que los equipos no tengan diferencias para evitar el desbalanceo, pero más especiales o mapas con elementos dinámicos, así como copas con mayor peso se echan mucho de menos. Y la ausencia de torneos con amigos en el modo online (sólo local) lo acaba de matar.

No todo es decepcionante: la fórmula es sencilla y rápida, y el modo coop (aunque el control de los personajes sea un tanto impreciso) es curioso. Pero esperaba cansarme de él a la docena de horas, no en menos de una.  Se fija demasiado en los primeros arcades como en Nintendo World Cup y no en los sucesores espirituales como los Mario Strikers. Ojalá le vayan añadiendo contenido con el tiempo, pero a mí me ha dejado muy frío.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030872772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1096, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1053, 'last_played': 1504719735}
review:
Ich habe das Spiel im Sale gekauft und spiele es mit einem XBox-360 Controler.
Die Steuerung ist ganz angenehm,wenn man im Ballbesitz ist.
Wenn man nicht im Ballbesitz ist,finde Ich das genaue Mänövrieren mit dem Analogstick etwas schwierig und zudem habe Ich häufig das Bedürfnis,jemand entgegenlaufenden manuell zu aktivieren,als wie jemanden zu steuern,der automatisch aktiviert wurde und hinterher rennen muß..dagegen steht,das man ohne Ball mit einer Zusatztaste schneller rennen kann,man schnell und weit grätschen kann und die Spezial-Moves benutzen kann,die einem während des Spiel zugespielt werden.Mit letzteren habe Ich mich noch nicht beschäftigt..zmindest noch nicht so,das Ich weiß,was Ich da tue.
Dafür geht mir nach ca 90 min die Steuerung ganz gut von der Hand..anfangs noch meinen Erfolg beim Tore schießen mit frühen undkurzen drücken der Torschußtaste gesucht,darf es jetzt auch langes drücken und Visierlinie einstellen sein,beim auf's Tor schießen.
Sich selbst den Ball vorlegen und den Moment zum schneller rennen benutzen.
Den Online Modus habe Ich nicht ausprobiert und gegen einen Freund habe Ich auch noch nicht gespielt..aber Ich glaube,das könnte ganz spaßig werden.
Mal kann man auf dem Platz den Ball in das Seitenaus befördern und manchmal gibt es Wände an der Seitenlinie,welche die Sicht nicht beeinträchtigen,sondern nur dafür sorgen,daß der Ball nicht in's Seitenaus gespielt werden kann.Farblich sind einige Plätze etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig,aber im Grunde kann Ich bis jetzt gut mit ihnen leben.
Für ungefähr 3,74 Euro finde Ich das Spiel zum gelegentlichen kicken ganz unterhaltsam...nach kurzer Eingewöhnungsphase..von daher gebe Ich eine Empfehlung.
Im Prinzip kann sich ja jeder auf youtube ein Viedeo anschauen und dann weiß man,worauf man sich einläßt.
Nach etwas mehr als 3 Stunden Spielzeit,habe Ich mich nun beim gedrückt halten der Torschußtaste und dem einstellen der Linie im slow motion modus,an das gleichzeitige benutzen einer der hinteren oberen Schultertasten gewöhnt..das macht natürlich noch mehr Spaß..Bananenschuß Ole.
Wenn man über die Flanke spielt und einen hohen Ball zur Mitte spielen möchte,muss man den Spieler schon deutlich in die Richtung gedreht haben,damit der Ball auch in die richtige Richtung geht,was im Gegensatz zu anderen Fußballspielen vieleicht anfangs etwas Eingewöhnung braucht.Dann kann man aber mit X am Controler und je nachdem,wie lange man die Taste gedrückt hält,unterschiedlich weite Pässe schlagen.Mit der Torschußtaste B kann man schon vor  der Ballannahme dem Empfänger klar machen,das er beim Ersten Kontakt sofort auf das Tor halten soll..dann kommt es auch mal zum Hechtsprungkopfballtor.
Man kann also auf vielfältige Weise Tore schießen..manchmal denkt man vieleicht..Mist,schon wieder zuviel geschnibbelt,auf der anderen Seite war es mir bevor Ich schnibbeln/Bananenschuß zu benutzen gelernt habe und das mit dem Flanken,in der Mechanik nach einiger Zeit,fast zu eintönig.
Man kann das Spiel nicht so richtig mit zB Sensible Soccer vergleichen..mit Ball am Fuß ist es hier einfacher und vor demTor führen Lattenabpraller oder Pfostenabpraller meistens nicht zu einer weiteren Chance..abstauber sind trotzdem gut möglich und Ich muss sagen,so scharf bin Ich auf ein Sensible Soccer jetzt gar nicht mehr...wer hätte das gedacht !
Wenn Ich das Spiel beende,geht an meinem XBox360 Controler das grüne Lämpchen aus.Da Ich keine Beeinträchtigung beim automatischen wieder aktivieren habe,finde Ich diese Stromsparmaßnahme vorbildlich.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047053023', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1531947541}
review:
I really want to like this game, and, in a way I do. I paid 3 GBP for this and after spending less than an hour playing, I already have some strong opinions about how this game needs to be improved.

Asthetically, everything holds up. The art style is consistent througout and sound effects are clean and punchy. The problem unfortunately comes from gameplay.

My first and most prominent gripe is the dribbling system, or lack thereof. Slide tackling gets old pretty fast as you get pummled from every angle and with no penalty to the opposing team. It feels impossible to manouver anywhere in which an opposing player is standing due to the risk of getting tackled by a 10 yard slide. Getting rid of the ball ASAP seems to be the name of the game.

In a previous match, a challenge encouraged me to tackle 10 players without sliding (blocking tackle). I managed to do so but immediately after completing the challenge, I went right back to using sliding as my sole means of performing a tackle. There's little argument to justify using a blocking tackle.

Power ups are pretty cool but theres only 6 and they seem pretty unbalanced. A rather infuriating one is an electrocuting drone which lasts much longer than any other power up.

The challenges add some needed variety to the game although they can go from being mildly challenging to feeling down right impossible. You can collect stars and coins but the menu options and guide don't provide any direction as to what they mean or if they can even be used.

I've complained enough so let me reassure you that there are some good points to this game. Shooting feels robust and the abilitiy to switch between manual and auto passing on the fly is great. There's plenty to like about this game but the minor annoyances mentioned above are likely to put you off playing this one often.

If you have a few controllers and like to play with friends, or maybe you're looking for a cheap and causal game to play, breaking your usual FPS routine, this might be the one for you. Just make sure you don't pay too much for it as you'll likely get bored rather quickly.

Message to devs:
This game is so close to being really well polished. Keep working on it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198048161890', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1034, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 779, 'last_played': 1545776974}
review:
This is one game where I wish Steam didn't have a binary rating system. But it's enjoyable enough as it is. 

PROS:
Good AI System
Tons of Teams/balls/fields to choose from

Cons:
Game freezes if you pause it when the final whistle blows
Powerups are too sparse to feel relevant
No in-game music. Just grunts of players and the cheer of the crowd.

This game has a lot of potential and most of my gripes with it are minimal so I still give it a thumbs up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010231912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 1416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1137, 'last_played': 1513647105}
review:
Update:
The K.I. of your team and the enemy team is actively betraying you on Legend difficulty.
-> passing cross top/bottom when another player is in the middle always evolves to a mid pass- where two enemys are (obviously)
-> enemy K.I. gets ridiculously often the super shot
-> the switching problem is often a free goal for the enemy team
-> when the ball is kicked out of the field by the enemy (fieldplayer/ goalkeeper) and an other enemy player goes for it it doesn't count as out of the field
-> you hit the crossbar/ or the keeper gets the ball like nearly every time while your keeper seems to eat glue in his spare time
-> the enemy k.i. still reacts before the animation of your player begins
-> enemy players only need to be near your players to get the ball while you can run into the ememy and he has still the ball

I hoped  this game would change for good but it really doesn't.
I hope I get at least 67% of the achievements soon so I can finally abandon it....

_________________________
Only good as a coop game.

The autoselection sucks
Your keeper often doesn't catch the ball when it's facing him directly (no close combat)
Throw ins and corner balls are a shot to your own knees
The enemy definitely knows what you are doing before the character starts changing direction
Own keeper is often clued to his line even if you press "q"
Sometimes they move double with one buttonpress sometime they don't react
You can't blow out the enemy hardshot - the enemy can do it
Passing back to the Midfielder often goes straight to the defense (Keyboard)
Pressing S when the enemy has the ball often doesn't switch to the nearby player of yours
When you try to outpass the enemy with you attack and midfield they stick together like clue after the third pass...
Enemy Flash hits closesd target in the radius- you flash the furthust

Sorry but this game sucks really hard as a singleplayer game. Srsly Fuck It...

author: {'steamid': '76561198318375583', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1563033690}
review:
[h1] 强烈推荐的一款游戏！！！	[/h1]
简单的评价一下这款游戏吧，第一次评价有些不足的地方请见谅阿。

[h1] 价格AND联机问题	[/h1]

首先对于价格方面较为中肯，表示可以接受，当然像我这种穷人还是等打折买更划算一点——12金入手，抱着试探的心态玩了玩。哇，瞬间觉得原价买都不亏，游戏支持单人和多人模式，你可以创建房间拉上你的好基友和电脑对踢（带上本人5人上限），还可以十个人五五开!(前提你有这么多好基友）[strike] 我才不会告诉你十个人对踢有多混乱	[/strike],当然也可以在线搜索，本人没试过，各位可以自己去尝试~无数圈友已经被我拉下坑了哈哈哈

[h1]游戏设定AND画面 	[/h1]

老实说，个人不是很喜欢这种踢足球的体育游戏，之前有接触过类似的FAFI这款游戏，都玩过之后相比较，还是更爱这款游戏——里面蠢萌蠢萌的小人，各种炫酷的技能，恶意铲球不犯法的奇妙设定，使得游戏某种意义上变成了搞怪游戏。游戏画面相当流畅，没有复杂的球星系统和站位设定，你只需要选择选一只顺眼的队伍就可以踏上你传奇的征战了！
[spoiler] 反正给我这些东西我也不会选择	[/spoiler]
[spoiler] 还有，电脑第二难度就要把我虐哭了，求大神救我阿QAQ	[/spoiler]

[h1] 我编不下去了	[/h1]

总之有必要推荐这款游戏给各位，怎么说，这款游戏更多是献给那些喜欢足球却又对其和其赛事一窍不通的人的（just like me!)
很萌的小游戏，嗯对很小（300MB）但入手了一定很值,相信我喔，毕竟我的第一次，呸，第一次测评就献给它了~


还有喔，当你看见这篇测评打算入手游戏的时候，不要忘记加我一起被电脑虐喔~

author: {'steamid': '76561198068997833', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1628499516}
review:
Для этого нужен обзор:)))))

Мы привыкли к играм, сделанным по шаблонам. Если открытый мир, то как у Ubisoft, если MOBA, то копирующая «Доту», если футбол, то обязательно серьезный, как FIFA и PES. Kopanito All-Stars Soccer — приятное напоминание о том, что даже привычные формы можно разыграть по другим правилам. В данном случае их подсмотрели в восьмибитной классике, но игре от этого только лучше.

Реализмом в игре и не пахнет: зарядив специальную шкалу, вы можете активировать спецприемы. Помимо понятного суперудара огненным мячом, тут есть и кое-что оригинальное: например, вы можете поставить за ворота огромный вентилятор, который будет выдувать из них мячи. Или телепортироваться по полю. Или притягивать мяч к себе магнитом. 
И это лишь то не многое, что есть в игре.

Kopanito — игра очень быстрая. Прорваться к воротам здесь не составляет труда — в каждой команде всего пять игроков. Отнять мяч — тоже: сделал подкат, и он уже твой. С ударами по воротам сложнее, но вариантов много — при желании можно даже сделать крученый удар. В игре нет тяжести, характерной для FIFA 16, ощущения игры в болоте. Наоборот, за пару минут здесь проходят десятки ярких атак, пусть и неудачных.

Авторы Kopanito All-Stars Soccer, поляки из студии Merixgames, решили пошатнуть текущий футбольный статус-кво. Я узнал об игре почти случайно, шатаясь по инди-павильону выставки Poznan Game Arena, но она тут же привлекла мое внимание: шутка ли, вокруг нее даже выстраивались небольшие очереди — на соседних стендах такого не происходило. Мне хватило одного взгляда, чтобы словить мощнейший прилив ностальгии: да это же та самая Nintendo World Cup! Яркая, комичная графика, глупые движения, квадратные головы игроков — все пришло оттуда. Но для Merixgames восьмибитная классика была лишь источником вдохновения — графика в игре полностью авторская и совершенно не характерная для спортивных игр.

Вот уже который год цифровой футбол развивается очевидным путем: чем реалистичней, тем лучше. С каждым разом EA Sports и Konami хоть немного, но делают свои игры ближе к жизни — ну, или по крайней мере к телевизионным трансляциям. Казалось бы, другого пути нет, но в начале девяностых все было иначе: то была эра веселого футбола, авторы которого превращали чинную английскую игру в быстрый боевой дебош! :)))))

+-сы:

 - Напоминает классику 8-ми битной эры (включая "GOAL 3")

--сы:

 - Не сразу разберёшься с системой "Супер Силы"

author: {'steamid': '76561197985215786', 'num_games_owned': 2073, 'num_reviews': 199, 'playtime_forever': 1613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1456, 'last_played': 1592346002}
review:
Voi non lo sapete, ma la redazione dello Shelter segue Kopanito All-Stars Soccer dalla sua prima comparsa in early access di questa estate. La premessa era semplicemente perfetta: nessun arbitro, nessuna squadra composta da campioni o con valori da controllare, nessuna lega e nessuna differenza tra le squadre… un gioco di calcio interamente basato sulle reali capacità del giocatore. Ai miei occhi (e non solo), Kopanito è apparso subito come il sacro messia, la svolta, quel titolo che, infischiandosene dei nomi o delle marche, metteva sul campo ciò che ha sempre contraddistinto il campione dal semplice amatore medio di calcio: il talento. E non è un caso che, imparate le dovute basi, mi sia subito trovato a mio agio su un campo con tante sorprese in serbo.

Come ogni squadra che si rispetti, però, Kopanito e i polacchi di Merixgames hanno avuto momenti di splendore e altri di sofferenza dall’uscita anticipata fino alla pubblicazione, alternando stadi di euforia a sonore bestemmie. Il fulcro del gioco non è mai stato toccato: un 5vs5 (più portiere) a tutto campo dove ogni scorrettezza è permessa. Non esistono falli e non c’è limite di scivolate o corse sulla fascia che potrete compiere, non esiste alcun metro di fatica, né limite se non il campo stesso (esclusione fatta per il divertentissimo campo indoor). Ma come ogni titolo indipendente, Kopanito ha dovuto scontrarsi da subito con quello che è da sempre il più grande problema di questo tipo di giochi: la modalità online. Certo, l’IA non è certo delle più clementi, soprattutto sbloccati i livelli più avanzati, ma la possibilità di sfidarsi con degli amici ha da sempre spinto il gioco fin dagli inizi dell’early access. Anche perché, in fondo, di contenuti non ne sono stati aggiunti da inizio 2016 ad oggi, avendo già quasi tutte le coppe e i campionati disponibili, le nazionali pronte per essere sbloccate vincendo le varie competizioni e le super mosse a disposizione durante le partite.

Queste in particolare non sono mai state particolarmente squilibrate: segnando o effettuando giocate coreografiche, faremo riempire un barra che, una volta piena, ci offrirà casualmente uno tra un super tiro, una mega ventola dietro la nostra che respinge palla e avversario, il teletrasporto (utilizzato per la tecnica chiamata la “Kelvanata”), un’aura congelante e un magnete per recuperare la palla persa. Delle soluzioni molto carine che, combinate con l’idea di un calcio spettacolare senza freni, pur rendendo il titolo più piccante, non risultavano mai fastidiose o tali da cambiare le sorti di una partita. Anche perché, durante l’early access, a Kopanito uno scontro non è mai terminato con meno di 10 gol, mantenendo un gameplay sempre molto dinamico per non dar mai la sensazione di essere troppo forti o troppo deboli. Anzi, sarà proprio lo scarto di gol che farà aumentare o diminuire la difficoltà dell’intelligenza artificiale, a partire dal livello scelto. Per di più, mentre i ragazzi di Merixgames continuavano a produrre fix e bilanciamenti aggiuntivi, cercando di implementare una modalità multigiocatore online che un giorno funzionava e quello dopo (3 MB di update) faceva crashare tutto, la formula di gioco ha via via subito delle intelligentissime modifiche atte a rendere il tutto ancora più divertente: i passaggi manuali, ad esempio, in cui noi stessi dobbiamo rincorrere la palla o cercare di passare la sfera nella maniera più precisa possibile; o ancora i colpi acrobatici dopo un cross che, se effettuati in area, potevano letteralmente spiazzare ogni portiere (tecnica definita anche come la “Maglionata”). Non aveva alcuna importanza l’idea di poter compiere delle giocate squilibrate, perché tanto erano a disposizioni di tutti e l’unico limite era, appunto, il talento del singolo partecipante, la bravura nel saper sfruttare al meglio le proprie abilità calcistiche per dribblare e sparare in porta una cannonata, magari sfruttando l’effetto e creando una parabola imprendibile.

Risultato primo tempo: Kopanito 5–0 Aspettative Infrante

Ma poi tutto è cambiato: Merixgames ha deciso che Kopanito era pronto e l’ha fatto uscire ufficialmente su Steam qualche settimana fa. Se ad agosto era ancora possibile compiere partite online con un leggerissimo lag, il giorno stesso di uscita non era possibile nemmeno di cambiare squadra, producendo errori sconosciuti e rendendo impossibile qualsiasi azione se non la chiusura forzata. Per fortuna, adesso è possibile sfidarsi in un 1vs1 in maniera semplice e senza lag, ma l’idea delle partite 5vs5 rimane ancora un sogno. Ma non è tanto questo il problema, ma il fatto che, come un pessimo allenatore, gli sviluppatori polacchi abbiano deciso di cambiare totalmente assetto alla propria formazione. Il processo di “bilanciamento” ha infatti snaturato e violentato il nucleo che era alla base delle tante e forse troppe ore passate a tentare di giocare in compagnia: la spensieratezza. Lì dove regnavano le risate per le folli corse schivando scivolate, o gli intercettamenti al volo un secondo prima del tiro, dopo l’uscita si è deciso di eliminare tutto in favore di passaggi automatici, l’eliminazione delle rovesciate su ogni cross e la risultante costrizione nel non poter muovere liberamente i propri personaggi una volta effettuato un cross: questi seguiranno pedissequamente le palla, eliminando ogni possibile acrobazia presente prima dell’uscita. Se quindi prima l’idea di gioco era l’equivalente metaforico di un campione che supera un centrocampista lanciando la palla a destra e superandolo a sinistra, finta un difensore e fa un tunnel al secondo per poi dribblare e lasciare sul posto il portiere segnando di tacco con un doppio carpiato, adesso Kopanito si è trasformato in un legnoso omino del calcio a molla in cui la palla segue una semplice direzione e la fantasia è ridotta al semplice tiro ad effetto. Una scelta che nello Shelter reputiamo all’unanimità come la morte del divertimento e soprattutto la perdita di qualsiasi caratterizzazione che ci ha spinto a comprare (e consigliare con forza) Kopanito in questi mesi. A questo si aggiungono anche alcune scelte più o meno rilevanti, come l’aver modificato il tempo di pressione dei pulsanti richiesto per far compiere un tiro o un passaggio, la scelta grafica delle strisce lasciate sul campo dopo ogni scivolata, o l’aver reso meno avvincenti i calci piazzati (falli laterali e angoli) con delle traiettorie esatte.

Insomma, se durante il suo stadio di sviluppo Kopanito All-Stars Soccer era a tutti gli effetti uno dei migliori titoli sportivi dell’anno, adesso non vediamo più tanta differenza con un gioco di calcio qualsiasi. Ai ragazzi di Merixgames faremo sicuramente un commento dettagliato, perché è davvero incredibile come non solo siano state distrutte tutte le aspettative verso quello che doveva essere la rappresentazione calcistica della locura, ma che tali scelte siano state prese nonostante il continuo feedback della community che ha alimentato e aiutato il team di sviluppo fino ad oggi. 

Risultato finale Kopanito 5–9 Aspettative Infrante

***Aggiornamento 26/03/2017***: incredibile ma vero, da oggi Kopanito torna a includere il passaggio manuale, aggiungendo anche altre tre modalità per gestire il lancio della palla. Che dire, una scelta che per fortuna ristabilizza tutto ciò che ci aveva fatto odiare del gameplay, rincarando la dose con un multiplayer ancora più ottimizzato e giocabile. In questo modo ci sentiamo di consigliare di cuore questo piccolo gioiellino che vi farà provare le stesse gioie e dolori che il Fantashelter sta causando a tutto lo staff!

author: {'steamid': '76561198099954891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3068, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 739, 'last_played': 1664974957}
review:
Kopanito All-Stars Soccer jest to gra stworzona przez naszych rodaków.Zaledwie 3 osoby o ile się nie mylę były w stanie stworzyć niesamowitą grę,która da nam zabawę na kilkanaście jak nie kilkadziesiąt godzin.Sama gra jest to trochę piłka nożna na dopalaczu ,bez faulów,bez karnych,bez wolnych ale za to z różnymi supermocami jak np.wielki kop lub wielki wiatrak,który uniemożliwi strzelenie golla.

Plusy:
-Niska cena,12 euro jest fer ceną wobec twóców którzy pracowali nad grą po kilka tysięcy godzin
-Przyjemna dla oka oprawa graficzna
-Niskie wymagania sprzętowe
-Super umiejętności,które odblokowujemy podczas meczu
-Możliwośc faulowania,dzięki tej opcji rozgrywka jest zdecydowanie bardziej dynamiczna
-Multi
-Duże postawienia właśnie na singleplayer,mamy o ile się nie myle 17 różnych turniejów i przejście wszystkich zajmie nam około 10h ,jeśli wybierzemy sobie długość jednego meczu na 6 minut
-Proste sterowanie,zarówno na padzie jak i klawiaturze
-Taktyka,możemy ustalać strzał pod jakim kontem piłka ma trafić w siatkę

Minusy:
-W mojej opini optymalizacja leży i mam nadzieję,że Merixgames zajmię się również tą sprawą 
-Niestety multi jest martwe ,naszczęście singleplayer ratuje sprawę i niezły poziom inteligencji botów

Podsumowując Panowie z Merixgames odwalili kawał,ale to kawał świetnej roboty.Gra jest prosta,przyjemna,niezwykle śmieszna,wciągająca ,około 700 recenzji na Steam to potwierdza.Zdecydowanie polecam ,przyjemniej mi się grało w Kopanito niż w te wszystkie Fify,Pesy,polecam :D

author: {'steamid': '76561197999619833', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 421, 'last_played': 1482454249}
review:
E' inutile sprecare tante parole cercando di comparare Kopanito ad un Pes o ad un Fifa perchè è un gioco che va acquistato nelle varie offerte di steam. io lo presi a 3€
Perchè? 
Semplicemente perchè rispecchia i vecchi giochi arcade da bar, stile futsal, senza arbitro, falli a volontà e super tiri.
Le squadre si differenziano solamente per Skin e non per SKill di qualità. Quindi una squadra vale l'altra.
E' il classico gioco meccanico e un pò ripetitivo per giocarci un oretta per rilassarsi.
Tantissimi tornei in varie difficoltà, tornei anche custom ed un mutiplayer che non ho ancora avuto modo di provare.
Divertentissimo giocato con Amici.
Insomma consiglio l'acquisto anche solo per la versione singleplayer, per 3€, ne vale la pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100798029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1597315070}
review:
本来想网上找个汉化，结果网上汉化的版本太旧了不能用，作者也没有再更新。不过进游戏玩了下，发现操作什么的都挺简单的，英文苦手们不用担心。这里面最大的规则就是没有规则，里面没有犯规，随意铲人，没有越位，只要把球弄进球门就可以了。
送给无汉化的新手们，可以不用再去摸索了
默认的键盘键位：A---高吊球、铲球
                            S---传球、切换球员
                            D---射门
                            E---释放大招
PS：1、建议把高吊球改键为Z或其他无冲突键位，因为本人有时铲球过于激动，按太快导致刚铲倒的球直接一个高吊球踢出去了。。。。具体方法：options--controls--keyboard--lob pass 点一下换成你想改的键位就可以了。另外门将开球的时候需要用高吊球，使用传球则不会传到自己球员脚下。
       2、大招是能量条满了随机给的，貌似是和控球时间有关，一般来说控球时间越多，能量条涨得越快。有个飞机放闪电的大招，在你持球的时候如果有圈内的敌人，要按一下E飞机才会电他。一开始不会玩，不管是自己的飞机还是别人的都只电我，也是电得我一脸懵逼。
       3、里面各个洲的联赛电脑分四个难度，第一个难度很简单，不过第二难度明显提升，电脑跟人什么的跟得很紧，目前刚过第二难度，第三难度什么样的还没试过。
       本人游戏时间也不长，不能给大家更多的经验，像什么射弧线球也还没弄懂，不过总体来说是款好游戏，适合休闲时玩，比如打两把DOTA2，CSGO什么的累了踢局球也是非常不错的。

author: {'steamid': '76561197960399224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1589845613}
review:
The game itself is great and a lot of fun.  I think this is one of the most frustrating menu systems I've seen.  I wish you could permanently disable certain controllers in the settings.  As it is, since I have a keyboard / mouse, gamepad, and X52 flight stick I need to go to the main menu and disable the flight stick and keyboard otherwise every match I play it will create 3 players for me.  No problem, disable it in the game lobby you say?  No, if you forget to manually disable a controller you join your match with multiple players, have to quit out, disable controllers again, get another invite.. etc...  It's you're playing with 4+ people watch all of them have to do this once or twice.

Were you in the game and hit Shift+Tab for Steam overlay?  Woops, now your keyboard is active again and you have to quit out, go back to the main menu, disable the controller, and get reinvited to your game.

If they can fix this it's a must buy.  If they don't I still recommend the game as it's fun and skill-based, similar to rocket league.

review: I will not recommend this game due to buying this for the online feature in the first place. I have written about it and got no reply! The online / private match has issues from the client side. You create a game and play the game with a friend on the other side, your friend commands come with a delay to your game host side. So it make the game unfair to play for your friend. And NO, it is not an lag issue because I tried swapping between Super Arcade football and this game to compare and Super Arcade Football had zero lag, the issue is in Kopanito´s programming code. I will not change this review until I see the fix. VERY Disappointed...

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197997045080', 'num_games_owned': 2087, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 497, 'last_played': 1552815370}
review:
Kopanito is a fast paced arcade football game where standard football rules do not apply. On a match level the games are 5v5 with no referee, no offsides, no fouls and crazy mechanics. Tackles are brutal but harmless. There's next to no dribbling and occasional power-ups spice up the games. And above all it's simply fun to play.

The controls feel simple but in fact provide quite a few possibilities. On a basic level you've got shoot and pass buttons. But holding them longer results in a long pass, or a more powerful shot. Additionally when near the opponents goal charging the shot slows time and you're able to bend the shot. The amount of power charged defines as well how high the ball goes. This can result in quite spectacular goals. If you combine this with the cross ins and spectacular kick flip goals - well enough to say that the goals are really satisfying and fun to watch. 

Addition of power ups adds another layer to the game strategy and the fact that they're not abundant and you get just 2 or 3 per game makes them a good addition. 

Graphics are cartoon like with a distinct style. Really nice looking and fitting the game perfectly.

The only complaints I have with this one is that it gets boring playing by yourself. There's a lot to unlock - teams and arenas, but they don't add anything to the game really. The teams are always of same skill level - and same as arenas are only decoration. The multiplayer while being there at the time of me playing had around 10 players at the same time and all games I was able to play online were laggy to the point of not being fun.

I can see this game being fun playing with your friends locally with a beer or during a party. But as a single player experience - I clocked in 8 hours in it and have no desire to play it any longer. Even the hardest difficulty while challenging at first can be mastered and there is little challenge after that. 

Still a fun game worth picking up.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982545223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1492204709}
review:
Good potential, a few key flaws.
The auto-steal mechanics (you only need to touch the player with the ball in order to steal it) is messy.
When the goalkeeper throws the ball, it very rarely ends up with any of his teammates. That sucks (and even the AI suffers with this)

It seems the developers were greately inspired by Mario Strikers, but didn't copy the right gameplay tricks.
Unless they fix these issues, not recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975299795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 1630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 911, 'last_played': 1486329189}
review: Yeeeeeeeeah! Get this one. It's like the old Virtua Striker or Actua Soccer, but on steroids. It's also very skillbased gameplay, which makes this a very addictive experience, combined with the usual soccer fun. It has very few flaws if any. Power-ups are crazy, but also very rewarding. It also has plenty of additional achievements to get during any random match, which is good. It's a suprisingly easy to control game, but difficult to master. Oh and yes you can friendly-fire your own, whether through a shot or sliding. It's currently on a discount which should seriously make this an insta-buy for the money. Good online fun as well, which should be no surprise. Art style is good. It's perhaps not super detailed and such, but it has it's own style and it's fun to watch. I haven't been as excited about a soccer game since the Fifa series essentially dropped most of the skillbased control and added a lot of semi-automatic nonsense. Not the case with this game, you'll feel in control. And team AI is great.

author: {'steamid': '76561198247088182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 528, 'last_played': 1531434831}
review:
Tons of fun for a small game like this. Recommended.

Pros:
- Excellent gameplay and very fun to play with friends
- Has the feel of an older game called GOAL.
- Funny teams + large number of national teams
- No rules
- Special powers

Cons:
- Online multiplayer is restricted to friendly games (co-op and vs)
- Choosing side in online multiplayer is automatic and not avaliable to user
- If you want to join online game (via steam) you cannot play just with joypad, there is also a keyboard added (maybe there is a solution for all of this but I didn't find it).

Other than some minor flaws, game is light and fun. Adding tournament mode for online multiplayer would be excellent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025524473', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1499169619}
review:
ローカルCo-opの優良ゲームを探しているなら必須でお勧め。
ソロでもCOM相手に十二分楽しめますが、協力プレイが本当に楽しい作品です。

くにおくんのサッカーを彷彿させるシンプルで奥深いゲーム。
キーボードでの操作は少しやり難いなと感じました。パッド複数持ってた方がローカルCo-opは捗る気がします。

COM難易度ですが、ビギナーだと手に汗握る感が薄いので面白みに欠けますが、難易度上げると歯応えがスゴイです。私は高難易度勝てる気がしません。

協力プレイは本当に素晴らしいです。
キーパーが結構優秀でゴールを決める事が困難な難易度のため、ゴールを決めた際の喜びはなかなかのがありまして、それが協力プレイによって生まれたとなるとより一層印象的な瞬間になります。手を取り合って喜び合いたくなること請け合いです。

review: sensible soccer sevenler, bu oyunla azda olsa hasret gidereceklerdir. gerek eğlencesi gerek yapay zekası şahane. online konusunda pek deneyimlenemedim fakat tek oyunculu modda bile zevk veriyor. isterseniz alıp oynayıp iade edin ama kütüphanede durmasının hiçbir zararı yok. yarın bir gün bir ortam olursa şahane maçlar çıkarabilirsiniz. türkiye'de kaleciyi rüştüye benzetmeleri çok hoş olmuş :)

review: Ocena - 9,7 Świetna piłkarska, zabawna gra. Możemy grać w niej mecze o puchar oraz przyjacielskie. Możemy również grać mecze online oraz w kooperacji. W grze nie istnieją faule. Po każdym golu wzrasta nam pomarańczowy pasek na górze. Gdy dojdzie do końca dostajemy super moc, którą możemy użyć w grze. Po każdym wygranym pucharze odblokowują nam się nowe drużyny.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986761822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1581366242}
review:
Es ist eine willkommene Abwechslung zu diversen anderen Fußball-Games. Ein nettes Spiel für zwischendurch mit knackigen Schwierigkeitsgraden (soweit ich es nach 5 Stunden beurteilen kann).

Ich denke im Multiplayermodus, wird es erst sein wahres Potenzial zeigen. Gerade wenn man gegen Freunde spielt - konnte ich leider noch nicht testen... aber auf jedenfall Daumen hoch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142952500', 'num_games_owned': 1362, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 958, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 896, 'last_played': 1584819186}
review:
Занятный вариант футбола, реализация давней мечты - «А давайте сделаем футбол, но с суперсилами!» В общем, почти что Nekketsu Soccer League, но на ПК. А ещё Kopanito All-Stars Soccer напомнила мне классику PES 07 на J2ME, за что ей отдельный плюс

+ приятный графониумс, аккуратный дизайн и прикольная озвучка
+ очень весёлый геймплей - куча оригинальных движений, мячом можно управлять в полёте, подкручивать его, использовать супер-удары
+ «Kopanito All-Stars Soccer напомнила мне классику PES 07 на J2ME, за что ей отдельный плюс»
+ небольшая цена

- глюки! игра нестабильная до ужаса, вылетает каждую вторую минуту, не соединяется и соединение падает постоянно. Это самый большой минус, потому что не будь его - я бы задротил в Kopanito All-Stars Soccer, как макака над фанерой.

Поэтому рекомендую игру с надеждой, что глюки исправят.

author: {'steamid': '76561198239986038', 'num_games_owned': 141, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1486042137}

author: {'steamid': '76561198068629064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 932, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 858, 'last_played': 1490180887}
review: เกมนี้ได้แรงบันดาลใจจากเกมฟุตบอลเก่าๆ แบบไม่มีกติกา เป็นเกมที่ imba เกมนึง คล้ายๆกับ goal 3 ในเครื่อง nes ซึ่งตอนนั้นมันสนุกมากๆ เลยแหละ แต่พอมาเล่นเกมนี้มันไม่ใช่อ่ะ มันสนุกนะแต่ก็ไม่สุด ข้อดีคือเล่นได้เรื่อยๆ เกมมันออกมาแนวเกรียนๆ ไม่ค่อยจะพาหัวร้อนซักเท่าไหร่ ข้อเสียคือบางอย่างก็ไม่ควรจะมีในเกม (power up) และการบังคับกับคีย์บอร์ดก็ค่อนข้างยาก แต่ถ้ามีจอยน่าจะเล่นสะดวกกว่ามากๆ ในส่วนของเล่นหลายคน (คีย์บอร์ด+จอย) เท่าที่ลองเล่นแบบ 2 คน การบังคับก็ไม่ค่อยโอเค พากันมั่วกว่าเดิม เล่นคนเดียวน่าจะเวิร์คกว่า

author: {'steamid': '76561198003989601', 'num_games_owned': 242, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1502591695}
review:
wer kennt es noch - SuperSoccer auf der NES - es ist eine super Kopie davon, die genau so lustig zu spielen ist. Es gibt keine Fouls (gepfiffen wird nichts) man kann also schön um den Ball kämpfen und hat viele Möglichkeiten den Ball ins tor zu bekommen.

Was mich stört ist, das ich die AUFLÖSUNG NICHT UMSTELLEN kann... es ist schlicht nicht möglich... Die Auflösung hängt mit der nativen von Windwos zusammen, in meinem Fall 4K und das spiel lässt sich nicht runter regeln auf 1920x1080 - was mir enorm helfen würde, da ich nicht die beste GRAKA habe und somit das spiel nicht ganz so flüssig läuft, wie es sein sollte.... 

Bis auf den Kritikpunkt mit der Auflösung, gibt es natürlich das Problem, dass das Game online so gut wie keiner zockt und es somit auf einen "Local-Multiplayer" beschränkt ist... Es würde aber gehen, nur leider findet man niemanden... Ist jetzt nicht unbedingt das problem des spieles selbst....

Ich würde es sofort wieder kaufen, denn zuhause mit freunden ist es der totale spaß :)
ich spiele selbst kein FIFA oder ähnliches  -  es ist das (fast) perfekte fun-football-game ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197976492011', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 2516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1136, 'last_played': 1563656360}

author: {'steamid': '76561198189993433', 'num_games_owned': 192, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1557228527}

author: {'steamid': '76561198088529724', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1587989695}
review:
Muy pero que muy entretenido, si estás hasta la mismísima po*** de fifa, pro evolution y toda esa basura, este es tu juego. Es barato, facil de aprender (pero dificil de dominar) y permite partidos online de 5vs5, sin handicap, sin jugadores rotos, aqui solo vale tu habilidad.
Pros:
-Divertido y ameno
-Tiene 9 estadios, incluído uno de fútbol sala en el que hay un muro que evita las fueras (como si fuera hockey) y una version de hielo del estadio de fútbol sala (sin nada especial), además cuenta con 25 balones distintos.
-Gana el que más skill tenga (o al que menos le cante el portero, porque vaya tela)
-Jugabilidad mucho más profunda de lo que parece, tiros de calidad, pases al hueco, balones aéreos, fueras y saques de esquina, etc.)
-No hay árbitro, puedes partir todas las piernas que quieras. Tampoco hay lesiones.
-Multiples torneos
-Muchos equipos distintos (selecciones y algunos de evento como zombies, renos, duendes de navidad etc.)
Cons:
-Se echa en falta un editor de equipos y equipaciones, espero que en un futuro lo implementen.
-Problemas con el mando de xbox one, no lo reconoce como jugador 1 y hay que desactivarlo y jugar como jugador 2, ya que el jugador 1 siempre es teclado y ratón.
-Se echa en falta poder hacer torneos online con los amigos.
-No está en español (no es ningún problema, ya que el texto es mínimo, pero puestos a pedir)
-La overlay de steam durante el juego no funciona en linux a día 03/01/2017.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108866631', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 517, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1592047635}

author: {'steamid': '76561198072538580', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9744, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1699232483}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971101502', 'num_games_owned': 306, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 632, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1485301936}
review:
I'm probably just gonna repeat what others have already said, but this game is a real gem, a fantastic tribute to the likes of Microprose Soccer (those "banana" shots!), Kick-Off and Sensible Soccer (not to mention some of the '90s side-scrolling football games at the arcades). Yeah, it's not FIFA or PES...but IMO it's actually better than both when it comes to the pure "fun" factor. 
Hopefully, it will attract more and more people to the online scene as well. DEFINITELY recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996447168', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1499467850}
review:
O que falar desse jogo que mal conheço mas já considero pacas?
ótimo jogo, e melhor jogando com os amigos. Porém uma pena o online não ser estável e não se encontrar alguem para jogar. Imagino que isso será consertado.
