author: {'steamid': '76561198074722438', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1483731863}
review:
Really good game, and they're not lying about it being skill based. See this gif of a goal I scored, partly by accident - its what made me realise this game allows for some serious skill to be developed:

http://puu.sh/t13Ox/d066abd8b3.gif

I've been trying to replicate that goal ever since. You can further develop skills as well - even the AI will tend to pass the ball into space and then sprint onto it, but I kept finding that when I tried doing that against professional (i.e. hard) AI they could still slide into where you put the ball, so I started turning around quickly soon after picking up the ball again after sprinting onto it and it often means I evade their slide tackle attempt and I'm gifted a glorious chance on goal. Speaking of which, scoring is an absolute delight in this game, as it should be in any football game, especially when you get just the right amount of curve on the ball that it beats the keeper. I wish airshots were a bit more complex - its nothing more than just holding down the shoot button, but then again it does require some skill with lobbing and corners before you get a prime opportunity to airshot the ball into the net.

Gameplay is VERY fast on higher difficulty, the ball will travel a lot an utmost attention is required to keep up. The game certainly provides ample challenge for players and, as mentioned, the AI will start to show off their skill too (which I didn't expect, the hard AI in Rocket League is terrible, so I had lower standards for the AI in Kopanito).

My only issues are: no custom-made teams, the online play doesn't seem to be working (although you can still play against people on your Steam friends list, which is enough for me), there's no in-game chat, the keyboard sometimes adds itself as another player, and your friend can't personally choose their own team. Also I wish the crowds were animated (it's like playing at the Emirates Stadium) and that there were people on the subs bench - minor details that would add some nice touches. Being able to choose what colour Player 1, 2, 3, etc, is would also be really helpful - I played locally with a friend on the same team and I had pink and he had red so it was a bit confusing.

Overall I definitely recommend this game, I was already happy with my purchase only a few hours in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074350739', 'num_games_owned': 426, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1686934237}
review: Mistrzostwo świata! Naprawdę wciągająca i odprężająca produkcja. Tytuł przenosi "podwórkowe kopanito" jakie grało się "za młodych lat" na stadiony, dodatkowo okraszając je porcją "czitów". Kompletny brak realizmu podczas meczów, w których pierwszeństwo bierze sprawność własnych palców. Pięcie się na szczyty w tabelach dostarcza dużo satysfakcji. Rozgrywane spotkania potrafią być bardzo widowiskowe: wślizgi bez limitu, strzały głową, przewrotki, dodatkowe bonusy w postaci super strzałów, wiatraków, przemieszczania się w stylu ninja i inne. Gra dobrze współpracuje z kontrolerem x360 i pozwala na granie w kilka osób na jednym komputerze : )

author: {'steamid': '76561197966913375', 'num_games_owned': 1010, 'num_reviews': 192, 'playtime_forever': 584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 483, 'last_played': 1486252533}
review:
The game features online play and a host of offline modes for cooperative and competitive play: friendlies, custom tournaments, regional cups, and full-season leagues. A typical control scheme supports passes, shots, and slide tackles; shots can be manually shaped. As an arcade sports title, games have a fast pace, with powerful slide tackles the primary means to catch up and steal the ball. In addition, randomized super moves (a ball magnet, teleportation, super shot, and wind-driven goal defense) increase scoring. The AI opponents play well at a range of difficulty settings, though friendly players don’t push up the field enough (making cooperative play much more desirable). Kopanito All-Stars Soccer is an enjoyable, accessible arcade sports title.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FftNEPkWadQ

author: {'steamid': '76561198024469649', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1534083239}
review:
I was looking for a relaxing game I could play to have fun.

Well, I found it in All Star Soccer.
It reminds me of my early Amiga Sensible Soccer in its friendly gameplay, with a modern cartoonish design both in graphics and gameplay.


There are lots of frustrating things though.

- the game has no fouls so it's a tackle party where no one ever gets injured, no goalies etc.
- the controls are a bit too fidgety for my taste
- the player switching is ok but not very bright and gets frustrating sometimes
- the slowdown after a kick is painfully too slow to the point of frustrating
- the game has some power ups but not quite enough.

Overall a fun game which really much lacks ambition (more powers, better controls, no team management whatsoever).

author: {'steamid': '76561197977732340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1662571295}

author: {'steamid': '76561198138345485', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 712, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 672, 'last_played': 1503078891}
review:
This game is cheap and fun! Kudos to the devs who had such a brilliant idea!

Pros:
-No demanding system requirements
-Ability to play short/long games offline(local player with friends) or online as well and many tournaments and cups
-Intuitive and not hard to learn (but it is tricky to master all the game mechanics, which in my opinion is good)
-No referee/penalties/stamina/injuries/team tactics etc.
-Less bugs than FIFA
-Cheaper than FIFA
-Better than FIFA

Cons:
- Large room for improvement in the online multiplayer

This game should be well known in all the world because I got tired of FIFA and PES that every year change some players in the teams, polish a bit the mechanics and then sell the game for the same price of the previous year.
Devs u deserve a CAKE!
10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198217717831', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 835, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1489301521}
review:
- Torwart rennt bei Dreieck nicht zum Ball sondern grätscht stumpf raus.

- Eine Angriffstaste gibt es nicht, steht der Gegner neben einen, wird der Ball sofort abgenommen. So kann es in einem Getummel vorkommen, dass der Ball nur weitergereicht wird.

- Einwurf ist total grottig. Spieler gehen nicht zum Einwurf hin.

- Allgemein werden die Bälle nicht angenommen auch wenn man neben dem Ball steht.

- Ein RIESEN Manko ist, dass man mit dem Ball NICHT rennen kann! Somit sind die abwehrenden Spieler klar im Vorteil

- Bei den Schüssen kann man so genau zirkeln wie man will. Klare Kurve ins lange Eck. Torwart hällt!?!?!?

- Und man muss Festhalten wenn man zielen möchte. Zwar wird das Spiel dabei verlangsamt, jedoch kann die Abwehr ja rennen und ist in der Regel immernoch rechtzeitig da und grätscht einen um. Darf man ja, selbst im Strafraum...

Mir ist bewusst, dass das Spiel nicht realistisch sein möchte, jedoch sind alle Spielmechaniken fürn *****. Herausgeschmissenes Geld. Kann ich auf keinen Fall empfehlen!

author: {'steamid': '76561198141777568', 'num_games_owned': 5248, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1480265366}
review:
[h1]Review powered by [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/mamilosclub]Mamilos Club Group.[/url][/h1]

O futebol sempre foi uma grande parte da minha vida, a parte que eu sempre ficava vendo meus amigos jogarem, seja no campo de futebol e também no mundo dos games. Meu primeiro jogo de futebol foi realmente "FIFA 95" para o Mega Drive III, eu não era tão ruim nele. De qualquer forma, para ser um bom jogador de futebol, requer treinamento e isso inclui os videogames.

Jogar [i]Kopanito All-Stars Soccer[/i] me deixou bastante feliz, principalmente por conseguir meter uma bicuda na bola e derrubar o jogador do time adversário. Além disso, os gráficos do jogo parecem desenhos animados e os jogadores parecem que tem hidrocefalia, além de não parecerem humanos. Essa junção de características deixa o jogo divertido.

Esse é um jogo de futebol que permite o time obter, regalias ou poderes.... não sei bem como chamar isso. Mas estava eu, atravessando o meio de campo, quando toco a bola pro meu atacante chutar ao gol e me deparo com um [strike]puta[/strike] ventilador atrás do gol, meu super chute não conseguiu nem atingir a pequena área... outra vez foi quando o time adversário utilizou um poder de imã e roubou a bola debaixo dos meus olhos, ou melhor, dos meus pés. Há muito mais desses poderes misticos!


Prós:
+ Toneladas de realizações e modos de jogo
+ Diversão para jogar online e offline
+ Os super-movimentos loucos
+ Trading Cards
+ Steam Achievements

author: {'steamid': '76561198130351022', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2034, 'last_played': 1534091522}

author: {'steamid': '76561198070549140', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 5299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4323, 'last_played': 1508561402}
review: Kopanito is another pretty funny game without players. But that's not the fault of the game. Playing Kopanito is entertaining and challenging even in single player mode. But I assume Kopanito was intended to be developed as a stunning multiplayer experience. And that's the problem, cause there are way too few players and therefore it's hard to make online-matches. Anyway, despite the stupid teammate-AI and some minor bugs, which occured while the game was in EA, you will become a well designed, well balanced and easy to learn, difficult to master experience. It's really worth a try and I wish the game would become the attention it deserves.

review: Απλό και διασκεδαστικό , με άλλα λόγια ιδανικό όταν θέλεις να ηρεμήσεις το κεφάλι σου μετά από μια δύσκολη ημέρα . Θυμίζει τα κλασικά ποδοσφαιράκια της δεκαετίας του 80 και 90 , με το κύριο στοιχείο διαφοροποίησης από τα παρεμφερή ποδοσφαιράκια την δυνατότητα για τρελά φάλτσα στα σουτ . Μπορεί κάποιος να το επιλέξει και με την έννοια του party game  , αλλά να είναι έτοιμος γιατί θα πέσουν τρελά μπινελίκια .

review:
ข้อดี
-ไม่มีกติกา ไม่มีลํ่าหน้า

-เป็นเกมส์บอลที่คล้ายเคลียดได้ดี
-ปรับเวลาได้ เลือกโหมดได้

ข้อเสีย

author: {'steamid': '76561198016096893', 'num_games_owned': 11947, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1479412590}
review: Не смотря на то, что все не так гладко как хотелось бы, эта игра лучшая на данный момент в своем жанре. Немного напоминает Goal (вроде так называлась) от бразильцев, но тут намного разнообразнее и пока без доната. Очень хорошо что есть разные режимы сложности, и комп ведет себя на высоких достаточно интересно и требует различных тактик. В оффлайне есть чем заняться - куча различных кубков и достижений, есть общий ладдер, в этом молодцы, все прикрутили. Геймпад так же работает на ура. В онлайне народ видно, но сконнектится не удалось, возможно получится как будет больше народа. Игра без овсайдов, иногда и без угловых и боковых, а главное без штрафных! Колотить народ можно на ура, нет судьи - нет проблемы. Неплохо получилось, ждем онлайн, и от разработчиков аналогичную игру про хоккей!

author: {'steamid': '76561198331924803', 'num_games_owned': 33, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 837, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 602, 'last_played': 1602391162}
review:
Awesome and fun game. Takes a few games to really get into it and to see the depth of it and how much skill it can take to play it. Tons of offline gaming content such as tournaments etc. Just wish there were more people playing the online multiplayer. I've come across a few bugs already, but nothing that completely messed the game up. Definitely well worth the money and you can spend hours playing this.

*UPDATE: After writing this review and playing countless more hours, i haven't come across any bugs after their new update. Game works sock solid. I love this game and play it for a little bit almost evry day. Definitely get it. It's a must have.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061095129', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 3686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2822, 'last_played': 1625514278}
review: Dritti al punto: ad oggi, [b]Kopanito è il miglior gioco di calcio in vendita su Steam[/b]. Veloce, violento, illogico e con un'i.a. dalla forza proibitiva Kopanito è un serio tributo ai videogiochi di calcio di una volta. Un titolo fortemente ispirato ad arcade gloriosi come Super Sidekicks, Nintendo World Cup e Microprose Soccer, offre una sfida notevolissima: calcio arcade duro e puro, senza falli e fronzoli tattici 6 vs 6, in cui la curva di apprendimento è ripida, ma la scalata alla vetta non è quasi mai frustrante (almeno nelle prime 10 ore di gioco, quelle necessarie per sbloccare un numero decente di squadre e competizioni). In men che non si dica troverete soddisfazione nel vincere il mondiale con Vanuatu, o nel tentare le imprese più assurde per sbloccare altri elementi o nel segnare gol di tacco in rovesciata nella coppa indoor. In parole povere poche mosse, dribbling infiniti, palle lunghissime, per poi appostarsi al limite dell'area o sulla trequarti e far partire tiro violentissimo da “swervare” al massimo coi tasti dorsali RB e LB del pad Xbox 360. La fase di tiro è il momento topico del gioco: appena premerete il tasto X il gioco entrerà in un bullet time che farà rallentare l'azione in corso fino al rilascio del tasto. In questo tempo potrete mirare alla porta con una specie di puntatore che vi permette di scegliere l'angolino più preciso in cui scodellare il pallone con una legnata, ma attenti, dovrete essere veloci: basta prolungare la pressione per più di tre secondi e la vostra sassata finirà invariabilmente sulla traversa, provocando gragnuolate di bestemmie specialmente alle difficoltà più alte. Giocare bene, vincere contrasti e segnare farà riempire la barra a lato della HUD, che porterà all'attivazione di un power-up da usare nei momenti più infami per sbilanciare la partita a nostro favore. Il titolo ha perso un po' dell'immediatezza primigenia con l'introduzione dei passaggi manuali: ho dovuto rigiocarlo un po' prima di prendere perfettamente il controllo di questa nuova feature che lo rende meno "semplice" e più profondo, ma alla fine si è trattato di una novità piacevole, che consente di dare varietà e creatività al gioco in campo. Tuttavia Kopanito non è esente da difetti: l'online è semideserto e malfunzionante, la localizzazione è molto mediocre, l'i.a. alle difficoltà più alte è piuttosto scorretta e spesso si ha l'impressione che un certo script aleggi sul gameplay (certe partite sembrano impossibili da vincere per quanto uno si sforzi anche a suon di bestemmie). Inoltre sarebbe bello avere delle opzioni tattiche, per gestire meglio il risultato senza perdere la connotazione fortissimamente arcade del titolo e per leggere meglio gli incontri più complicati: l'ideale sarebbe un comando per cambiare l'atteggiamento del centrocampo a seconda delle nostre necessità, un po' come accade in FootLOL. Al di là di ciò, già così Kopanito è un must per gli appassionati dei giochi di calcio e degli arcade veloci e brutali, ha una community molto attiva con degli sviluppatori sempre attenti alle issues del pubblico. Dopo un solo anno sul mercato ha già un promettente futuro come pietra miliare dei videogiochi sportivi indipendenti. "Chi non lo compra è un burfaldino!" (cit.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198034977092', 'num_games_owned': 1686, 'num_reviews': 375, 'playtime_forever': 526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 482, 'last_played': 1495833075}
review:
Il gioco del calcio ignorante: Controlli semplici, nessun fallo, nessun fuorigioco, prendi il pad e randella gli avversari come se non ci fosse un domani!

La grafica è molto pulita, adatta al contesto e fa il suo dovere.
L'audio risulta essere coinvolgente, avrei preferito sentire cori personalizzati ed altre chicche simili ma siamo comunque sul buon livello qualitativo.
I controlli sono perfetti, sai sempre ciò che sta facendo, se sbagli è demerito tuo e mai colpa di qualcosa che è andato storto, si lascia giocare che è una bellezza!

Hanno da poco anche inserito l'online, che era l'unica reale assenza del titolo. Nonostante sia un accesso anticipato, ora possiede sia una discreta quantità di trofei offline che un comparto online (sicuramente da miglirorare, ci mancherebbe!)

A mio avviso, se amate il genere vale i soldi spesi, se invece siete indecisi dategli una possibilità in saldo, non ve ne pentirete!

author: {'steamid': '76561198059137630', 'num_games_owned': 1814, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1478193691}
review:
iğrenç rezalet bir oyun.
oyun en başta zevkliymiş gibi gelsede biraz oynadıktan sonra ne kadar rezalet bir oyun olduğunu anladım.

ÖZET: Oynamayın amk.

oyunda anlatılıcak pek bir şey yok klasik kraloyun oyunu gibi ülke takımları var ve nerdeyse hepsi kilitli açık olan ülkerler ise lüxemburg, köle ermenistan, fransız guyanası, amerikan samoası gibi daha milli futbol takımı bile olmayan ülkeler var.
kontroller çok basit her şey manuel oyunda hızlı koşmak var ama kısıtlı top ayağındayken koşamıyorsun ve nerdeyse sağa sola semazen gibi dönmekten başka çağreniz yok ve oyunda süper güçler var bunlar roket şut , adam dondurma gibi gibi uzar gider. bu arada ağır çekim modunu unutmamak gerek asıl beni kanser eden noktada bu

ve benim oyunu iade etmemin sebebi olan buglar!!;
-oyunda süper güç var demiştim ne zaman roket şut denemesi yapsanız topu rakip takım kapıyor %100 her türlü kaçarı yok yani.
-sırtınız rakibe dönük haldeyken sizden top kapması ama rakibinizin sırtı size dönük haldeyken ondan topu kapamamanız!!!
*****-ağır çekim .... evet kanser etti beni ağır çekime sadece şut çekerken girebiliyoruz ya da rakip şu atarken sorun şu ki ağır çekime yalnızca siz giriyorsunuz rakip değil yani aslında ağır çekime giriliyor ama rakibiniz koşarsa ağır çekimden çıkıyor normal hızına dönüyor :D****


bu oyundan çıkardığım ders:
+bidaha asla adını bile duymadığın geliştiricilerin yaptığı futbol oyunlarını OYNAMA!
+erken erişim oyunlarının ne kadar kanser edici buglarla dolu olduğu!
+ne kadar çabuk DELLENDİĞİM!

BOYKOT: ( DELLENDİĞİM için!)
=DELLENDİRİCİYİ DELLENDİRDİĞİNİZ İÇİN BU OYUNU ALIP 5 DK OYNAYIN SONRA OYUNA HAYIRI BASIN!!!

review:
Kopanito All Stars Soccer nedir : Arkadaşlarınızla online yada aynı bilgisayar başında stres atabileceğiniz mücadele edebileceğiniz çok eğlenceli bir futbol oyunu . Oyunun grafikleri gayet iyi türüne göre ayrıca oynanışıda beğendim . Birkaç özellikler (yetenekler) oyuna farklılık getiriyor .

author: {'steamid': '76561197974307656', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1088, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1011, 'last_played': 1535972084}
review:
This used to be a lot of fun until an update changed the way ball passing works. Passing used to work well where you press A to pass the ball to another player in your direction. Now, pressing A basically shoots the ball, so to pass the ball you have to basically aim your shoot on your team mate, which is stupid and makes the playbility bad and difficult.

Not recommended anymore.
developer_response:
Hi, thanks for feedback. We've updated the passing system and added many more improvements. Passes can now be automatic or manual.

Read more: http://steamcommunity.com/games/399820/announcements/detail/841438213217447176

review: Es un gran juego, te mantiene entretenido durante varias horas, y los torneos tambien están genial. Solo pediría varias cosas a este juego: Que se puedan hacer regates con el balón, que añadan equipos ( no tienen porque ser todas las ligas, ni los nombres oficiales, pero por lo menos el nombre de la ciudad de la que es el equipo, y que tuviese comentaristas, con esto, sería mi juego favorito, pero, aun así, lo recomiendo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096888128', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 2845, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 600, 'last_played': 1692124001}
review:
Kopanito ist super! 
Warum? 
Es ist ein Fußballspiel, dass einfach Spaß macht. Es kann grafisch und spielerisch nicht mit den Schwergewichten FIFA oder PES mithalten - wer eine realistische Fußball-Simulation sucht, ist hier absolut falsch!
Es gibt keine filigranen Spielzüge, keine ausgeklügelte Taktik, keine Topspieler mit besonderen Fähigkeiten.
Es ist ein fröhliches Gebolze, dass mich fast ein wenig an die C64-Zeiten mit "Superstar Soccer" erinnert. Grafisch natürlich wesentlich besser als dieses.
Aber es ist nicht umsonst eine Steam-Errungenschaft, wenn man es schafft, den Ball länger als 15 Sekunden am Fuß zu behalten, ohne umgegrätscht zu werden.

Was genau macht also Spaß?
Das Spiel ist im Großen und Ganzen immer ein Kick'n'Rush und - was das Tollste ist - das mit Abstand wichtigste Feature ist GRÄTSCHEN! Es gibt nicht nur keinen Schiedsrichter, der als Spielverderber den Grätschenden bestraft, sondern es ist auch die effektivste Möglichkeit, Gegner zu stoppen. 
"Leider" kann man auch die eigenen Spieler umgrätschen, was vor allem im Mehrspieler-Modus zu heftigen Wortgefechten vor dem Bildschirm führen kann.
Dsa Spiel selbst ist durch die fehlenden taktischen Möglichkeiten teilweise recht hektisch, was sich aber eher positiv auswirkt.
Kommt ein Spieler in Tornähe, kann ein Schuß abgegeben werden, bei gedrückter Controller-Taste wird der Spielablauf verlangsamt und es kann mit einer Zielvorrichtung ein mehr oder weniger genauer Schuss abgegeben werden.

Ein weiteres lustiges Feature sind die "Power Ups" - durch "intensivere Spielweise" erhält eine Mannschaft zum Beispiel einen Superschuss, der wie eine Kanone über das ganze Spielfeld Richtung Tor abgegeben werden kann. Die Flugbahn des Balls kann während des Schusses noch gelenkt werden, was auch nötig ist, denn wird ein Mitspieler oder der Torwart getroffen, geht der zwar zu Boden, aber ein Tor zu erzielen ist dann eben schwierig.
Andere Power Ups sind zum Beispiel ein Riesen-Ventilator, der Torschüsse vom Tor weg weht, eine Eis-Attacke, die umstehende Gegner und Mitspieler kurzfristig einfriert, ein Magnet, der dem Spieler schnell den Ball quer übers Feld vor die eigenen Füße saugt oder ein Teleporter, der den Spieler über einige Meter auf dem Feld voran bringt.

Hier würde ich mir noch mehr Power Ups wünschen, da ginge sicherlich noch viel mehr.

Allein ist das Spiel eine ganz nette Unterhaltung zwischendurch, richtig spaßig wird es aber erst im Mehrspieler-Modus.
Ich spiele meist zusammen mit meinem 6-jährigen Sohn, dem vor allem das Grätschen mächtig Spaß macht (weshalb er PES nicht so sehr mag, weil er da dauernd gelbe und rote Karten bekommt).
Bis zu fünf Spieler (4x Pad, 1x Tastatur) können gleichzeitig agieren.
Da eine Mannschaft aus jeweils 5 Feldspielern besteht, kann so also ein ganzes Team gesteuert werden.
Die Torwarte agieren nicht allzu clever, was allerdings beide Seiten betrifft - es ist also ein halbwegs fairer "Mangel".

Ein weiterer großer Motivationsfaktor sind die viiiiiiiiielen Errungenschaften, die man erreichen kann - zu Beginn stehen nur wenige Teams und wenige Turniere/Ligen zur Verfügung. Den Rest kann man nach und nach freispielen.

Ich habe das Spiel im Sale geholt und bereue keine Minute Spielzeit, denn der Spaß, den ich mit Junior damit habe, rechtfertigt jeden Cent!

Wer also realistisch Fußball spielen will - Hände weg!
Wer aber was Lustiges für zwischendurch oder Spaß beim Bolzen sucht - vor allem mit mindestens einem Mitspieler, der sollte zugreifen.

[b]Hat Dir das Review gefallen? 
Unter [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/germanicusreviewius]GERMAN REVIEWS[/url] gibt es eine wachsende Datenbank mit noch mehr deutschsprachigen Reviews zu vielen Spielen, erstellt von Gamern für Gamer![/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198111942178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1470574407}
review: This is a ton of simple fun. I don't even care about soccer, it's a fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005130329', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 807, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 807, 'last_played': 1473520509}
review:
Saw this on sale and bought it on impulse as I didn't have any kind of football game in my collection.  What followed was a few hrs of fun for a couple of pounds spent.  

Don't expect propper football, this isn't the game for that... What it is a funny and yet simple to master football game that can be played by up to 5 people at the same time... either on the same team (each player controls a single on screen player) or against each other on opposite teams. The 4 basic super powers add an element of fun and frustration to the game... having the ball snatched away from you as you line up your shot by the magnet power for example, or freezing the defense/keeper to allow you to stroll the ball over the line... It's all good fun that can and will have you and your friends screaming and cursing at each other in some good natured rivalry.

It's definitely worth a couple of pounds... even if only played on game nights with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093487410', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 787, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1647327837}
review:
这个游戏画风挺有趣的。不知道射门的子弹时间算不算新意，我第一次玩到这样的。射门能干晕守门员或者球员，爽。

说缺点：
[list]
[*]操作智障，传球到底是个啥啊，直传没有力度条，一脚就干出底线，很难传到球员脚下。
[*]AI智障，基本别想传球的时候给到正确的球员，切换球员完全靠手动。
[*]技能废柴，鼓风机这种防守技能大半时间没用。我的想法是，可以改成LoL那样，选两个技能带上，也可以像马车跑跑飞车那样，全场随机吃。
[*]按键设置不合理，射门的时候可以踢出香蕉球，但是弧线和我大脑直觉正好相反。当然，这个问题在设置键位之后就不存在了，我把跑、走和左旋右旋都改在了LT RT上，顺手多了。
[/list]
另外，在线几乎没人玩。

吐槽：我就奇怪为什么高球的传球可以有力度，地滚球就是随缘呢？你可能一脚干出底线，也可能轻轻地放在小朋友的后面，简直捉急啊！我最近几天挺迷这个游戏的，但是玩多了就觉得球的控制太反人类了，专业难度被电脑血虐，心累。今天又被业余难度淘汰出杯赛，气得快砸手柄了。

review:
The game is so fun for casual play. Real passing controls makes it competitive and powerups add exitement. Best thing is I can enjoy football with my friends on couch and dont need a powerful system, supports upto 5 players. There is no foul or offside rule, no referee, just kick off ! 
Looking forward to see more powerups and skid kick balance in game

author: {'steamid': '76561198306866064', 'num_games_owned': 765, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1038, 'last_played': 1475576979}
review:
Kopanito lo definiría como un recuerdo nostálgico de los juegos de fútbol arcade de la época de los salones recreativos, es decir una jugabilidad simple pero muy adictiva junto con una escasa presencia de reglas de juego, solo existe el saque de meta, banda y esquina; las faltas y el fuera de juego han desaparecido, lo cual te permite dar mucha leña.
El juego carece de historia, ¿qué esperabas? No había historias en los salones recreativos y aquí no va a ser menos, esto es un partido de 6 contra 6 y para ganar tienes que marcar más goles que el rival, para anotar goles te puedes ayudar de súper poderes que consigues al llenar una barra de poder (la barra se llena haciendo entradas, tiros a puerta, goles, etc.). Actualmente solo hay 5 súper poderes:
-	Súper tiro: Pues eso, un tiro con mucha fuerza que noquea al portero si lo intenta parar.
-	Ventilador: Un ventilador enorme se coloca detrás de la portería y evita que entren balones, excepto el súper tiro.
-	Teletransporte: El jugador (con o sin balón) se teleporta a otra zona del campo.
-	Imán: El jugador sin balón que lo usa hará que el balón vaya hacia él, pudiendo cortar una contra o ponerte solo de cara a portería.
-	Congelador: Congelas a los jugadores rivales y compañeros en el radio marcado.
Los controles son muy sencillos, aunque al principio pueden confundirte un poco si eres un asiduo de los PES (como es mi caso), yo lo he jugado con mando de Xbox 360 y me he adaptado muy rápido. La IA presenta diferentes dificultades las cuales están muy cuidadas pues el salto de una a otra se nota claramente, y además destacar que la última dificultad (Legendario) no te dará tregua, debo destacar que esta dificultad me lo ha puesto más difícil que cualquier jugador online. Esto último nos lleva al online, aquí está el talón de Aquiles del juego pues, aunque los partidos que he jugado ninguno ha tenido lags por contra la acción de encontrar un oponente puede llevarte una espera de 5 minutos o más fácilmente. Desde el punto de vista gráfico se nos presenta un juego de muy bajos requisitos que de vez en cuando al principio del partido y tras marcar un gol suele dar un micro tirón, pero nada que estropee la experiencia de juego. Kopanito se caracteriza por un aspecto visual donde todo está dibujado de forma caricaturesca lo cual yo no había visto en un juego de fútbol antes y le sienta muy bien. Con respecto a la música decir que es amena, pero nada destacable. Algunos detalles a destacar son:
-	Puedes guardar las repeticiones de gol en formato .gif lo cual facilita enormemente el compartirla con amigos.
-	La cantidad de torneos offline que tiene el juego es bastante grande lo cual te asegura muchas horas de juego.
-	El juego incluye 224 logros lo cual es una pasada y para los “logreros” (personas que buscan sacar todos los logros) son muchas horas de juego.
-	Puedes jugar numerosos torneos, ligas y partidos offline con amigos, hasta 5 jugadores.
-	Presenta traducción parcial al español ya que algunas cosas se mantienen en inglés.
Y poco más que decir, Kopanito es un juego muy adictivo de fútbol, con aspecto visual cuidado y con el que podrás soltar tensión derribando jugadores cada 2 segundos y si el rival es un amigo más tensión liberaras, en conclusión, Kopanito es esencial en la biblioteca de los amantes de juegos de fútbol y por tanto más que recomendado, por 12€ es un precio justo a la cantidad de horas que le puedes echar, aun así puedes esperar a rebajas que yo lo adquirí por 3,5€ y ahí sí que no tienes excusa para no comprarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198316350915', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 464, 'last_played': 1474536965}
review: Всем привет! Установил я эту игру т.к увидел что то знакомое из детства. Когда я был еще маленький я играл в что то подобное на Dendy. Игра называлась GOAL 3. И у меня сложилось такое ощущение, что Kopanito разрабатывали поиграв в GOAL. Но возникает вопрос: "Почему так мало разнообразных действий по сравнению с (Японским) сородичем?" Здесь нет пракически ничего что есть там! Нет этих сумасшедших суперприемов. Нет элементарных прыжков. Есть только подкаты, пас, навес и удар с навеса. Ну и еще унылый супер прием который выпадает рандом. Если бы разработчики сделали все то же самое как в GOAL 3 (возродили бы игру) и пускай с другим названием и со свежей графикой то это был бы хит хитов. Надеюсь что разрабы меня услышат.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054737674', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1531691847}

author: {'steamid': '76561198063150117', 'num_games_owned': 711, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1023, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 857, 'last_played': 1689445701}
review:
Si lo que buscas es un arcade rápido, sin complicaciones y com multijugador local para echar unas risas con tus amigos, este es tu juego. Hace poco que me he puesto con él pero apunta maneras, sobre todo si van implementando más items especiales y funciones adicionales al juego.

El slow motion en los disparos es un puntazo, si lo pulen más, puede ser la bomba sobre todo con un portero manual, contras y/o combos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087165951', 'num_games_owned': 450, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 823, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 598, 'last_played': 1594408975}
review:
8/10

Pros: Great arcade style football game, reminds me of Dino Dini's Soccer on Mega Drive. Entertainly chaotic in co-op!

Cons: Bit of a grind to unlock the hardest difficulty level, still a few matches to play despite winning most of my games by a 5+ goal margin now...

Suggestions: Some sort of injuries system might add to the chaotic hilarity.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062232099', 'num_games_owned': 5821, 'num_reviews': 291, 'playtime_forever': 623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 623, 'last_played': 1473478870}
review:
[h1]What is Kopanito All-Stars Soccer?[/h1]

Kopanito All-Stars Soccer is a fast-paced action soccer game that has been in development by Merixgame since September 2015. Throughout this development timeline they have continued to make regular updates to the game. They have also, at all times, communicated openly and quickly with their fans.

In fact, because of their consistent development and their great communication with their community it wouldn’t be out of place to consider them an Early Access role model. I honestly believe that indie developers would do well to look at the way in which they have gone through the early access pipeline.

The developers have openly claimed to have been inspired by some of the greatest soccer games in gaming history. These include Kick Off, Sensible Soccer and Nintendo World Cup. These games provided gamers around the world thousands of hours of entertainment. I believe that Kopanito fits that niche rather nicely.

[h1]Easy to Learn but Depth for Strategy[/h1]

The gameplay has been designed so that it is easy for gamers to jump into and play immediately. However, it is frenetic and challenging enough that it is a beast to master. There have been numerous times throughout the time that I have cursed at missed opportunities and even more when I’ve learned a new tactic or strategy that was previously unknown to me.

This is perhaps the biggest surprise to me. The game appears to be very simple. Players don’t need to worry about the general rules of soccer. There are no offside calls, fouls, etc. Yet the depth of the game to include strategy is deeper than it first appears to be.

[h1]Tournaments[/h1]

There are 16 different tournaments to play in. Some of them need to be unlocked by winning certain tournaments in various game modes. A nice feature of tournaments is that each game of the tournament can be played with up to five players and it isn’t dependent upon the number of players you began the tournament with. Therefore, if you have friends or family members come to your house and you’d like them to join you they can easily do so.

There is also an option for players to create their own tournament.

[h1]Teams[/h1]

There are a whopping 114 teams within the game. These represent countries from around the world.

I do have two minor sticking points with these teams. Firstly, I don’t believe that players have unique modifiers or attributes. If they are there then they are not necessarily clear. Each team plays the same as any other. While this ensures a level playing field with games determined purely by skill it doesn’t provide any point of difference on any of the teams. You’re not going to pick a South American team (e.g. Brazil) and expect to be able to play with more floor and pizazz.

Secondly, do not expect to be able to play as your favourite countries right away. The majority of the major countries are locked. They unlock when you complete a set task. For example, to unlock my native Australia I need to win the Oceania Cup on professional difficulty. To unlock England, you need to win the World League on Professional difficulty. This is intended to be motivating but when every team seemingly plays the same as any other the primary motivation may not be as high as anticipated.

[h1]Super-moves[/h1]

A significant part of the game’s enjoyment comes in the is the ‘super-moves’ feature. There are a number of super-moves. You gain one super-move for filling up the super bar. To fill up the super bar players have to do successful things in the field of play (e.g. a successful tackle, pass, score, etc.). These Super-moves can often prove to be match winners on both ends of the field.


I was playing a tournament game as Tonga against New Zealand and was 2-1 up late in the game. I unlocked a super-move which turned out to be a wind move. New Zealand had the ball late in the game and my last defender had unsuccessfully slide tackled the Kiwi striker. I quickly used my super-move just as he was about to slot the game-tying goal. The ball proceeded to be blown back out of the penalty area. New Zealand pounced on the ball and passed it back to the striker who again was met with the wind. My super-move saved the game for me. 

Conversely, in the final against Australia I was tied late in the game when I unleashed my power shot super-move. The keeper deflected it but it dazed him which opened up the goal completely for my rebounding striker who slotted in the game winner.

[h1]Is it Steamified?[/h1]

My word is this game Steamified. There are over 200 achievements. They unlock frequently enough that you’ll want to continue playing more and more. Yet there are enough achievements that are a challenge to unlock that perfect game does not feel cheap. It will take even the most skilled players many hours of play before they unlock every achievement.

The game also has a set of six trading cards. The developers are working on implementing Steam Workshop features into the game. Players can already create stadiums, balls and teams for modding. This should prove

[h1]Verdict[/h1]

If you’re looking for a casual soccer experience that provides entertainment and challenge, then look no further than Kopanito All-Star Soccer. It’s as enjoyable as any casual soccer game has been in years.

For similar reviews and your chance to win great giveaways visit [url=http://www.steamified.com]Steamified[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198270030992', 'num_games_owned': 863, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1808, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1267, 'last_played': 1500816125}
review:
Even though this game is in Early Access, there are really few mentionable flaws that could restrain someone from buying it in this phase of game development, like the fact that online mode is still in its early stage, or some AI flaws still persisting when it comes to picking up a passed ball.

Anyway, the game is very fun and playable, with an easy start in the Beginner AI modes and becoming very challenging when climbing the skill ladder. The developers look closely to comments and involve and let participate the KAS community in selecting the next enhancements to where the game should be developed to.

What I especially like about Kopanito is the simplicity of controls compared to other high class (AAA) football games like the FIFA (tm) series e.g.. In Kopanito, one does not need a long learning curve to become familiar with the controls and can start playing at an instant. Still one can do some really nice (trick-)shots, and especially playing local multiplayer gains a lot of Schadenfreude, e.g. when kicking the ball with an overhead kick into the opponent's goal (including their goalkeeper), or smashing the forward just before the shot with the goalie and a defender in synchronicity...

Keeping away no-fun rules (like offsides, yellow and red cards) and plainly focusing on game flow, Kopanito reminds me on the goody old times when a friend of mine and I played Sensible Soccer on the Amiga for hours and hours (he won most of the time ;-) ). 

Taking into account the absolutely fair game price, I believe that no one will make a mistake in buying this game who likes casual sports games that suddenly evolve into a family affair... :-)

I'd like to give two thumbs up to this game. Unfortunately, Steam does only allow for one :-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198087357415', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 4, 'playtime_at_review': 583, 'last_played': 1712355613}
review:
Kopanito to gierka która totalnie mnie kupiła. Ta mała produkcja we wczesnym dostępie już teraz jest najbardziej grywalną grą sportową w jaką miałem okazję zagrać od dawna. Humor i oprawa graficzna jest urocza, rozgrywka przypomina te stare gierki piłkarskie które ogrywało się na Pegasusie i daje tyle samo frajdy. 
A elementy które (według mnie) możnaby poprawić i dodać
- W turniejach po wyjściu z grupy grać systemem ABAB a nie AABB żeby drużyny wychodzące z jednej grupy mogły się spotkać dopiero w finale
- W multi możliwość stworzenia własnego "klubu" czyli zmiany nazwy drużyny, zawodników, koloru koszulek i avatarów piłkarzy
- Dodanie wszystkich (lub większości) reprezentacji świata (bo cóż to za problem, gierka nie musi walczyć o licencje ;-) )
- Zmienne warunki pogodowe
- Stopniowe dodawanie nowych power-up'ów

A tak po za tym 10/10 Każdemu polecam sprawdzić. Kopanito to wiele godzin zabawy w singlu, i jeszcze więcej na multi. A to dopiero wczesny dostęp.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042541676', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1473304401}
review: ¿Qué puedo decir de este juego? apenas si lo he jugado 1.5 h, pero les puedo decir que es bastante divertido, los controles son relativamente faciles, ya que te tienes que acostumbrar (no es tan fácil como parece). Hasta el momento la dificultad está muy bien (apenas si lo he jugado en principiante y me ha costado un poco), el IA es bueno, no se por qué razón se han quejado algunos, creo que es cuestión de gustos; puedes escoger entre muchos equipos, así como hay torneos para desbloquear, aún no lo he jugado online, pero lo probaré cuando pueda; los power ups son buenos, aunque espero que cuando el juego salga a full ponga más power ups, para que el juego sea emocionante. Lo recomiendo COMPLETAMETE, es muy divertido, más aún si juegas con amigos o gente online.

author: {'steamid': '76561198292721048', 'num_games_owned': 610, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1474743755}
review:
Pretty entertaining game overall with relatively easy controls, consistant action, and satisfying goals. Local co-op is definitely a plus as well! However, there are two major improvements that will convince me to give this a thumbs up:

- Improved netcode: I have a fast internet connection and decent setup but the responsiveness in an online game is miserable. I noticed that my opponent was having the same problems. Everything from switching characters in the timely manner, tackling when actually pressing the button, and passing was affected

- Information about how many players are in each online game mode: There is a count in the bottom-left of the mode select screen that says how many players are online and how many are waiting for a game. However, with so many game types (5 or 6, iirc) it would be a huge help to see what modes people are waiting to play. Its great to see that 2 people are in the game lobby waiting to play but it would save a lot of trial and error to just tell me what game I should select so I can play with them. Likewise, if I'd like to play 3v3 with randoms, it'll increase their chances of finding me in that lobby if that lobby notated that there is somebody waiting in it.

This is a fun game but these are areas that need improvement to make it fun to play online.

review:

Holy shit, this game takes you back to the era of the early fifas.
Fast-paced, Addictive, Challenging, great sense of humour.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007874063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1382, 'last_played': 1557454950}
review:
8/10 Will go all Zidane again and again

Kopanito All-Stars Soccer is a great arcade soccer game to waste a few minutes when you only have only a little free time.  The game is simple but still is has enough play to not get old.  The best is the ability to slide tackle and not worry about a red card. 

Pros-
Fun arcade style soccer
Slide tackles for defense and offense
Power attacks are great but not unbeatable
bending better than Beckham


Cons-
Not much as far as rewards
No Customizing players: it would be nice to make an avatar to throw on the team.

----UPDATE-----

Pro
Corners are alot better with the new changes and adds a higher level of skill to the action

Con
The new automatic passing/passing modifier throws off the timing to where it actually affects the amount of time I play this game due to frustration.  Mental for bringing this back.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091297992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1560816070}
review:
This game is fun and simple, as others have said. It's a good game to play with people who maybe aren't into games like fifa which are more complex (as much as a football game can be). 

There are however clear problems with the game that need to be fixed before the game is something I would recommend. 

CONS:
The AI man the AI. The AI really really needs to be fixed. On any difficulty the AI will always have perfect aim with its slide tackles, which you'll soon realize are the key meta to the game. 
This wouldn't really be a problem if slide tackling wasn't so difficult for human player. Sure you get better as you play but forget playing with your girlfriend when the AI never misses a slide (unless you juke, but thats a whole other thing). The AI also passes and shoots stupidly fast. It just looks like the developers added no margin of error for the AI. Its like fifa if all the sliders were at 100. 

The game can be fun and rewarding but its quiet annoying when the AI has pixle perfect slides and passes that will never ever miss. And of course the AI can gage the slide distance perfectly so be prepared to be tackled at the max distance you can be tackled from.

I hope the game does well and gets the updates it needs but in its current state, you'll be left shaking your head. That said, none of that will really make you lose. Shooting is fun and quick to learn so youll soon be scoring from 40 yards. But the fun times are really limited when you have to dance around the perfect AI all game. 

TLDR: Just make it so the AI can miss sometimes.

review:
Fun little arcade soccer game with great potential, perfect for a quick match or longer sessions in cups & leagues.

I hope they can improve online game (I haven't had any problems but some people report latency issues) and add more features such as:

Custom online leagues/cups
Team and player stats tracking
Team and player customization (names, faces, flags, team name...)
Better leaderboards/ranked online play.

Overall, great value especially if bought during a big sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111648545', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1472038687}
review:
Comprato a 3,59€ il gioco allo stato attuale non ne vale nemmeno la metà.
Eppure il concept di base sarebbe anche interessante: niente arbitro, niente falli, un gameplay molto manuale tra passaggi e conclusioni a rete, con boost vari che si attivano in base alle azioni svolte in campo come tiri, parate e scivolate.
La grafica risulta gradevole e molto fluida tranne alcuni rarissimi cali di frames poco spiegabili e di breve durata.
A guastare nettamente l'esperienza di gioco arriva la finalizzazione a rete che, a mio modo di vedere, è completamente rotta allo stato attuale del gioco (early access): tiri sul primo palo che entrano praticamente sempre, così come i calci d'angolo con palla verso il giocatore posizionato sul secondo palo.
Il multiplayer è scarsamente popolato se non dall'incessante e persistente lag.
Confido poco che tali e gravi errori possano essere risolti per l'uscita della release ufficiale prevista per settembre, perciò per me è una netta bocciatura.

4.5 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198138470175', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1570936945}
review: 由于这是娱乐足球游戏，有必杀技系统，所有不少评论会加将其与热血足球进行比较。作为热血足球的老玩家，这里也说下观点。和热血足球比起来，这款游戏是没任何优势的。bgm，技能丰富度，人物特色，场地特色，铲球，踢球，必杀技的音效等等统统比不上。而且传球时的手感也比较谜。游戏本身的好玩程度只能说一般。但它也有自己的优点。比如自定义一场球赛的时长，铲球时的距离以及速度也给人一种就是这么暴力的感觉。射门时的曲线辅助瞄准也能让你把球送到球门任意一个角落。此外，还有高达200多个的成就系统都可以延长游戏时间（前提是这游戏不会让你觉得枯燥的情况下）。后续更新希望能从打击感上下点儿功夫，毕竟这对游戏的体验是十分重要的，另外多丰富人物技能也是不错的选择。整体游戏评分7/10。打折时可用买下来体验一下。

review:
after update its working now

i can recommend the game now, although it still needs some work
did not have much time to test but it looks it will be fun

the network code needs some improvement though, even with low ping there is significant delay

it looks like client sends info, then hosts receives data, does code and then sends back data to player,, so player will see his display updated after hosts resends new data to client

it believe this is like an arcade game and it does need that display to be updated immidiately and then to check it with server if it's synchronized 

keep it up guys


--------------------------- @before update


sick netcode...
me and my friend bought this game for multiplayer, but it just doesnt work - characters keep teleporting like crazy

for now it's not worth it's price

maybe they will fix that somewhen

author: {'steamid': '76561198219222067', 'num_games_owned': 705, 'num_reviews': 445, 'playtime_forever': 1750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 530, 'last_played': 1689080293}
review:
Tutto cominciò da 2 fuoriclasse giapponesi (portiere e attaccante) e la loro squadra (mi sa dopata a loro insaputa perchè i controlli antidoping non esistevano) che correvano in un campo lungo diversi chilometri percorrendo 100 metri in 2 secondi (per poi chiedersi come mai Julian Ross fosse malato di cuore),e con quel povero arbitro che era costretto a muoversi in motorino per seguire l'azione.poi fu il periodo di FIFA e PES,giochi che hanno fatto la storia,fino ad arrivare a Kopanito All-Star Soccer.consiglio (vivamente) di prenderlo,chi fosse interessato,in offerta (come ho fatto io.perchè spendere 11,99 per un giochino ad accesso anticipato che occupa 500MB e che verrà completato in seguito mi sembra leggermente eccessivo).riguarda solo le nazionali,alcune già disponibili e alcune che si possono sbloccare finendo i vari tornei e in varie difficoltà.la cosa che mi piace troppo è la palla a rallentatore,in stile matrix.NO falli (puoi anche atterrare i tuoi compagni se ti va male),NO fuorigioco,NO giocatori reali.possibilità di usare degli "special",tipo:
1-Ghiaccio:per congelare momentaneamente gli aversari (e anche i tuoi compagni se si trovano nel raggio di azione),ma in un limitato raggio di azione
2-super tiro:il classico super tiro alla Holly & Benji
3-calamita:ruberai la palla agli avversari anche a grandi distanze
4-ventilatore:si,avete capito bene,una volta attivato,alle spalle del vostro portiere,apparirà un grande ventilatore che il 99% del casi eviterà il gol degli avversari
5-teletrasporto:in caso di necessità puoi teletrasportarti poco più in la,ma in un raggio di azione limitato (come lo special del ghiaccio)
il gioco in sè bellino e piuttosto divertente,modalità single player e multiplayer online,il multiplayer online direi NO COMMENT per la troppa attesa nel giocarci e per le pochissime persone disponibili.ultima cosa,desidero che i piani alti che sviluppano il gioco tenessero conto di cose che ora non ci sono e che si potrebbero mettere (si spera) in futuro,tipo:
1-personalizzare le maglie
2-personalizzare i giocatori:sia di faccia,sia di nome (per non vederli chiamati "player 1")
3-possibilità di aggiungere,se possibile,anche squadre di club e tornei tipo la champions league

author: {'steamid': '76561198185118923', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1852, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1625753687}
review:
Öncelikle oyun çok eğlenceli. İnsanı strese sokan, sinirlendiren şeyler yok tersine daha çok gülerek oynanacak bir oyun. Oyun şu an erken erişimde olmasına rağmen bolca turnuva ülke mevcut en son online oynayabilme de eklendi daha iyi oldu. Ancak oyunu oynayan kişi sayısı az olduğu için online modda maç yapabilmek zor. Bunlar zamanlar düzelecek şeylerdir. Oyun da turnuvaları kazanarak yeni takımlar, takımlarla birlikt stadlar hatta topları bile açabiliyorsunuz. 
+ Oyunun bolca turnuva seçeneğine sahip olması
+ Aynı bilgisayarda 5 kişiye kadar oynanabilir olması
+ Grafik anlamında çok iyimser olması (Çoğu bilgisayar rahatlıkla çalıştırabilir)
- Oyun şuan yeni olduğu için online kısmında ki oyuncu sayısı az

Genel Puan: 8.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198013882641', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 826, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 727, 'last_played': 1700309476}
review:
Parmis la ribambelle de jeux indés dont est truffé le magasin Steam, on peut pas dire que des alternatives aux jeux de foot "classiques" se bousculent au portillon.

Kopanito pour ça fait bien le taff sans prises de tête inutiles.
Si vous cherchez le fun, l'arcade, et les tacles à tout va vous êtes au bon endroit.

Le contenu solo est déjà bien riche et le multijoueur local fonctionnel comme on est en droit de s'y attendre.

Le multi en ligne lui se laisse désirer, prévu d'ici quelques mises à jour il devrait apporter une solution efficace pour ceux qui préfèrent rester chez eux.

Je regrette juste les power-ups un peu maladroits de temps en temps, mais rien de vraiment préjudiciable.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990630473', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 894, 'last_played': 1677096595}
review: Fantastic little game. Best Indie football game on Steam. The clever slow mo shooting system and easy curved shot controls means you're spend plenty of time watching your amazing goal replays. The slide tackles are particularly satisfying, especially as there are no fouls. Revenge is openly encouraged. Considering this is still in early access, there's a good amount of content to enjoy. It's just a fun to play football arcade game. A hidden gem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145777227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1101, 'last_played': 1468504070}
review:
游戏内容比较少，没有成长要素，技能就那么几种，球场不像热血足球那样有环境要素。不同的队伍除了形象外没有任何区别。不同的游戏模式也基本没什么差别，只是打不同的联赛，拿不同的奖杯，但是过程其实都一样的。
敌人的AI也比较简单粗暴。高级的敌人就是更加准确的铲人，传球。跟专业级别的打，基本都只能靠传中争顶进球，因为敌人和守门员都没有空中防御手段的。
总体不是很推荐，打折的时候拿来随便玩几下还行。

author: {'steamid': '76561198284853195', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 916, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 660, 'last_played': 1570141411}
review: I think this game is very fun and once you get used to manual passing the game is much more enjoyable. If you're used to FIFA's auto passing this may prove to be challenging at first, but eventually becomes manageable. Love the Super Moves and the fact that there are no red cards. Let the tackles begin! Fun, silly soccer game. I'm able to play it with my PS3 and Xbox One controllers with no problems.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014211456', 'num_games_owned': 317, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 905, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1527191374}
review:
NO soy un fanático del futbol y no por eso les digo, que es un muy buen juego, entretiene bastante, controles nada complicados, recordé la época del Nintendo Word Cup, ojo que no es su predecesor, pero a buenos ratos llenos de risas que me da; es una muy buena compra además de a un buen precio.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993628590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1498059200}
review:
Kopanito es un súper prometedor título de fútbol arcade. ya en estado jugable y disfrutable desde el primer minuto.

Como fan de los "Sensible Soccer", "Soccer Superstars" y demás arcades del estilo, creo que Kopanito, si consigue convencer a la gente suficiente con un buen desarrollo final, será un clásico total en sus futuros modos online. Mucho potencial, gran control y humor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036470535', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1469289822}
review:
Un jeu qui parait fun au premier abord mais qui se révèle vite injouable.
_ Sélection des personnages aléatoire sur le terrain, il arrive qu'on fasse une passe à un autre joueur et que l'on ne puisse pas contrôler le destinataire avant qu'il ait le ballon dans les pieds
_ Tacles qui exigent une trop grande précision, on en vient souvent à se dire "mais j'étais dessus"
_ Objets bonus carrément abusés qui permettent à une IA déjà surpuissante d'écraser le score
_ Difficulté mal calibrée avec un mode "Beginner" presque trop faible (mais qui ne permet pas de débloquer de nouvelles équipes ou terrains), un mode "Amateur" juste au-dessus qui lui devient subitement très difficile à jouer et on ne parle pas du niveau inhumain des suivants
_ Pas de musique pendant le match, juste le néant total
_ Peu de modes de jeux
_ En multijoueurs, on a accès qu'à peu d'options mais ça reste là que le jeu est le plus amusant

Parce que oui, le gros point fort de ce jeu pourrait être le mode multijoueur. Les graphismes sont marrants, les objets bonus auraient besoin d'un léger recalibrage dans leur puissance et distribution. Mais quand on voit que pour pouvoir choisir autre chose que des toutes petites équipes océaniennes, il faut se faire près d'une centaine de matchs contre une IA imbouffable, ça coupe vite l'appétit.

A ne réserver qu'aux vrais mordus de foot. Il est dommage que l'on ne puisse pas bénéficier des progrès de gameplay de gros titres comme FIFA en version 2D cartoon comme ce que l'on pouvait espérer ici.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134791701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2003, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1055, 'last_played': 1562611493}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198079940835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1436, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1339, 'last_played': 1482250892}
review:
Kopanito è un gioco di calcio diverso dal solito; le squadre a nostra disposizione sono tutte uguali dal punto di vista della forza e non come in altri giochi dove alcune sono più forti di altre.
Nel gioco, quindi, non conta la forza della squadra ma la bravura del giocatore o del gioco di squadra (se giocato con amici).
Dalle immagini o dai video, Kopanito può sembrare infantile e semplice ma in realtà è tutto il contrario; bisogna gestire correttamente i passaggi ai nostri compagni per arrivare nell’area di tiro avversaria.
Nel gioco, controlliamo un calciatore mentre il resto della squadra viene gestito dal computer. Una volta che passiamo la palla ad un calciatore (della nostra squadra) controllato dal computer, ne assumiamo poi il controllo diretto.
Infine c’è la possibilità, una volta che la nostra barra rossa si è caricata al massimo, di usare un potere speciale: il super-calcio, il ventilatore gigante dietro la porta, il teletrasporto e altri.
Per ora è possibile giocare in offline e multiplayer locale ma il multiplayer online sta per arrivare così come la fine dell’ EA.
All’inizio potrà sembrare difficile ma con un po’ di pratica vedrete che riuscirete a giocare meglio e a tenere testa ai vari livelli di difficoltà del computer.
In conclusione, se volete giocare con la voglia di divertirvi e in compagnia degli amici, Kopanito è una buon titolo da avere in libreria.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969239853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1579127248}
review:
[u]Game reviewed before online multiplayer is available.[/u]

Some people may think that because a football game isn't "serious", it can be sloppy. These people are wrong, IMO. Games like Rocket League or Mario Strikers on Wii are perfect examples of well-oiled games of this genre. Kopanito fits within this category too. It looks a lot like World Cup on the NES for those who are young enough to have played it but with a serious update.

PROS:
- Good controls/dynamics
- Lots of ways to approach this game. Many options to score goals
- Surprisingly fair
- Easy/fun to play but room for competitive games, I think (we'll see once the online multi is available)

CONS:
- It says "soccer" in the title. Guys: it's called football! (sarcasm) (or not!)
- Could be tedious on the long run vs. computer. Guess online multi will solve the issue.

Conclusion: funnier to play compared to "realistic" games like FIFA or PES. Worth the price tag but grab it while it's on sale a get 2-3 copies for your friends. Fun should ensue.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997693934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1472640781}
review:
Kopanito is the kind of game you didn't realize you needed until you play your first match.  

If you're itching to return to the FIFA games of the SNES era, Kopanito is a charming mix of nostalgic arcade-y action and modern features you'd expect in a newer title.  

Great fun in single-player.  Haven't tried multiplayer yet, but imagine it will feel like NBA Jam, or NFL blitz.  

Get it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198027876618', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 896, 'last_played': 1597376437}
review:
I bought the game after the update people are complaining about. They say this new feature of manual passes makes the game hard to play.

I have played for 2 days and I won South America's cup in pro and European in amateur. I score more than 2 goals average and I found manual passes a great opportunity of avoiding enemies. With manual passes you can make depth passes not viable with auto passes.

The game is fun. Enemies starts being nice but as soon as you make 2, 3 or more goals (depends on the team) they start playing harder and passing the ball a lot. That makes the gameplay funny and not so repetitive.

It would be great to have more options of gameplay. Not sure what, but I'm affraid to get bored of playing it. Taunts, fights, reactions or another feature other than tackling and shooting. I'm not the creative guy, sry. Maybe a precise pass just like precise shot will also be another fun feature. A referee to kick (?) and who knows what another bizarre gameplay feature could be added to make it even more funny :)

I think it needs some work on ambience and emotions. When you win, your team leaves the field just like they enter at the beggining of the match. 

To be honest, I bought the game because it's on sale. I think I wouldn't pay $12 in its current state.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178705519', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1468381386}
review:
I purchased this game in a whim, and it has turned out to be one of the best Soccer games I have played in a long time. I am enjoying it much better than the Fifa amd PES series games.

Pros:
-Fun and quirky, not super serious but also very competitive.
-Game runs well
-Great for short bursts of play time (for people who don't have a lot of free time for gaming)
-Online is coming soon
- AI is pretty good

Cons:
-Lack of customization options
-Would like a "create a characte" or "create a team" option

Overall, this game is a ton of fun, and definitely worth a try.

review:
A challenging, but rewarding and fun, arcade soccer game. 

The only complaints that I have are that you can't customize the teams and that you have to grind to get the good teams. You should be able to play as whoever you want from the start. It's absurd that you have to go through hoops to unlock the well-established teams, and for what? Just the name of the team?

author: {'steamid': '76561197998696364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1709927360}
review:
Great game - damn awful controls (360 controller).

Player switch works very poorly, not accurate switches with directional input as stated from menu, switching time laggy and non responsive at times. Passes from a goal kick go out for a corner, even when aiming up pitch. Ball glitches from goalkeeper save into goal, arieal shots do not work at all (following gameplay instructions). Can not switch player when AI shoots. AI with no margin of error. Tackles ineffective against AI (ball snatch). Quick shot controls non functional. 

I'd love to play more if it wasn't such a disaster. This is a fundemental basic of a game, yet I can't believe how non functional they are.

Edit: Original post from 2016

Needless to say the game is still a piece of shit. Not really much different from the original post. Don't buy this garbage. Brilliant concept, so fucking poorly executed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002189495', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1467681808}
review:
Wow, awesome game. :) I can confirm this game works with a Dual Action Logitech controller very nicely as well (mine might be an older model). 

The game is fun to play number one. The slide tackles, passing, shooting.. are all nice. The controls are nice as well on the keyboard, and are configurable. Some of the default keys are the arrow keys to move, and d and s for passing. I've been using the contoller mostly, but the keyboard is easy as well.

The league I tried is nice so far as well. I'm 2-4 so far, but won my last 2 games. It was hard to score at first as I didn't know the score button (button 3 on my controller). I'm looking forward to seeing this game develop, but a blast to play now as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107888561', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 1628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 976, 'last_played': 1664306384}
review:
Confesar que no tengo ningun interes por el futbol ni por estos juegos. Pero reconozco que cuando lo vi me pareció super gracioso. Lo encontré de rebajas por 4€ y decidí comprarlo para cuando viniesen los amigos a casa. Hice una gran compra. Me lo paso super bien jugando con ellos a este juegazo. 
Graficamente precioso, divertido, ameno, buena variedad de campos, de balones, de jugadores, de equipos, de ligas... sus niveles de dificultad, una buena IA... 
Cosas que extraño... tal vez una mejor ambientación de sonidos, poder editar tu propio equipo y jugadores... por lo demás me encanta.
A pesar de que aún está en fase de desarrollo y tiene algún que otro bug... he comprobado que en las dos actualizaciones que llevo de la versión mejoró mucho. No solo los errores, sino la jugabilidad también.
Para ser honestos espero mucho más porque sinceramente el juego merece la pena. Hicieron un gran trabajo.
Además está en español. 
En Gnu-Linux va muy bien. Tal vez los propios bugs que aún tiene el juego.
9/10 le doy.

review: Şirin mi şirin çok tatlı grafiklere sahip futbol oyunu.Oynaması oldukça zevkli zaman geçirmek için ideal.Ayrıca Türkçe dil seçeneğine de sahip.Herkese pata küte dalmak ve jeneriklik goller atmak isterseniz tam size göre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025480314', 'num_games_owned': 615, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1480381233}
review:
O MELHOR JOGO DE FUTEBOL NA STEAM.
Ignore comparações com outros jogos do gênero, Kopanito possui uma arte e um gameplay único, com muito humor mas não deixando de ser desafiador. 
Passes, cruzamentos, carrinhos exigem muita precisão, visto que todo o controle nele é manual. Há power ups tanto para ataque quanto defesa, podendo evitar gols óbvios recuperando a bola com imã, evitar ataques com um ventilador gigante atrás do gol, congelar adversários, teleportar através da zaga, chutar bola indefensável, etc. Tende a ser cada vez mais competitivo.

Um detalhe importante para citar é a forma que o chute funciona: Ao segurar o botão de chute a câmera fica lenta, aparece uma mira, e quanto mais o botão é segurado mais forte é o chute. Porém é difícil fazer um gol chutando reto para o gol, e como recurso há como dar curva na bola. No controle do X360 precisa segurar LB para a bola fazer curva para esquerda e RB para curva para direita, é um tanto estranho no começo porque isso é sempre relativo à posição do jogador em relação ao gol adversário, mas depois de algum tempo (e alguns bugs no cérebro) pega o jeito. Fez uma curva no canto ou enganou o goleiro e pronto.

A maioria das seleções (todas bem caracterizadas) estarão bloqueadas e para desbloquear há diversos campeonatos, ou seja, dá para gastar muito tempo brincando com ele. Recomendo demais.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201513191', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1688591300}
review: Kesinlikle güzel bir oyun. Yapımcısı çok uğraşmadan eğlenceli bir yapım sunmuş. Her yaştan oynanabilecek bir oyun diyebiliyorum rahatlıkla. Oyunu yaklaşık 9 Saat oynadım. Oyunun tabikide en çok patlayan kısmı arkadaşlarınızla oynayabilmeniz. Bu gerçekten güzel hissettiriyor. Ben sadece 2 kişi oynadım. Ve rahatlıkla diyebilirim ki oyunun CO-OP kısmında her hangi bir sorun yok. Oyunda İsmini duyduğunuz tüm ülkeler vur ve resmen hergün Update geliyor. Oyunu ilk aldığımda OPTIONS ekranında bile sorun vardı ama şuan hem grafikler hemde menü sorunları tamamiyle giderilmiş. Oyunun fiyatına gelecek olursak 20 TL fazla fakat Summer Sale veya Soccer Sale'dan 8-7-6 TL'ye alınabilecek güzel bir oyun diyebilirim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006478970', 'num_games_owned': 405, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1465766027}
review:
Вы меня конечно извините, но слишком ограниченный фунцкионал.
невозможно дать пас оибо ударить, либо навесить кроме как вертикально, горизонтально либо 45гр.
Супер удары либо супер фичи рандомные и редкие.
Вспоминаю серию игр Technos, там было всё гораздо забавнее, причём на 8 битах nes.
купил по большой акции, потому что напомнило именно Goal3, но игра оказалась обрезком, а не дополненым хитом.
Из плюсов только то, что есть на Линукс и есть мультиплеер, но потраченных нервов не стоит.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085611889', 'num_games_owned': 2286, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2677, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1561237378}
review:
Playing this Early-Access Sports-Game with the family is a great fun. It's really simple and the teamplays are so satisfying (just as much as the multiple tackles on a single player...)

Pros:
+ Good Teamplay possibilites (seriously high pass + volley shots are just so fun to do)
+ Aerial Shots are well executed and look great
+ Works well and efficient on the Controller
+ Shots can be curved and adjusted in hight/strength (in slowmotion too)
+ Super Moves give it a bit of strategy; a really fun addition
+ Lots of Leagues and Cups to play (tons of achievements)
+ Gameplay is mostly fluent and fast paced
+ Gif-generator and Recap for your favorite goal moments
+ Fun Character motions and Victory Moves (getting hit by Super Shot looks great)
+ Pretty much all the Nations to choose from (once you've unlocked them)
+ Lots of skins for the balls and stadiums
+ You can attack your own teammates (yap for us this is was a big pro)
+ Tackle, tackle, tackle...no penalty

Cons:
- Some Super Moves are so stronk ...
- Losing ball when not moving
- Goalkeeper can be tackled WITH the ball into the goal... (this could be pro too ...heh)
- Enemy players can stand in front of your goal and wait for a pass without penalty
- NPC Goalkeeper sometimes messes up a lot (runs away from the ball...)
- Sometimes Slow motion takes a bit to run out
- Tackle, tackle, tackle... no penalty

Waiting for:
- Online Mode
- More Super Moves
- Custom made Teams

Gotta say though - as the Developers are working and improving on the game, I think Kopanito might be a great game to play with (and against) friends, family, onliners and aliens... oh yeah - one day maybe alien teams please !

author: {'steamid': '76561198002060322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 3119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1546, 'last_played': 1612034702}
review:
Nintendo World Cup, Version 2.0

Bislang habe ich nur den Singleplayer gezockt. Fazit: Sehr sehr gut! Der Sprung vom ersten zum zweiten Schwierigkeitsgrad ist enorm... und 2 weitere sind ja noch darüber. Das Spiel ist schwer, insbesondere das Tackeln muss sehr genau ausgeführt sein. Auch das genaue Schießen muss erstmal gelernt sein. Aber sobald man es halbswegs beherrscht hat macht es richtig Laune. Superschuss und Spezialfertigkeiten sind auch vorhanden. Das man animierte GIFs von seinen Toren machen kann ist auch eine witzige Idee.

Der Online-Multiplayer soll ja mit dem nächsten Update kommen, ich sehe jetzt schon dreistellig Stunden ins Land gehen.

Wer World Cup mag wird dieses Spiel lieben! Unbedingt zuschlagen, im Summer Sale wird es sicher wieder einen guten Discount geben.

vorläufige Wertung: 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198082779889', 'num_games_owned': 366, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1533859778}
review:
My friend recommended this game to me. At first it appears really fun. But there're 3 problems really makes me sick:
1. If you got kicked out during a tournament, then the game is dead: mucis is playing, screen is frozen, no button pressing is working any more. I believe this is a bug.
2. The AI really makes me frustrated: I choose the beginner AI level( the easiest one I suppose), then during the game I saw AI players pass the ball from their penalty area to my penalty area without any dribble, literally without any dribble! And then AI scores and this happens all the time during my game experience. So you tell me this is the easiest AI?
3. The game control is really uncomprehensible to me. For example, in practice mode, I passed to my teammate. He caught the ball and then ran WITHOUT it. I got a really hard time trying to dribble.
In conclusion, either this game really have these problems or maybe I'm just really bad at this kind of game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012362002', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 400, 'last_played': 1577164359}
review:
[quote=Wasterbull] Reseña en español[/quote]

[i]¿Te gustaría jugar fútbol sin reglas y tener súper poder? Que interesante...[/i]

[h1] HISTORIA	- 10/10*[/h1]
¿En serio debería explicar de qué trata? bueno es fútbol, intentar que la pelota llegue dentro del arco y evitar que el rival te derrote...

[b]Nota del autor:[/b]
[i]La alta puntuación es cuando un juego cuenta con una idea básica y que tenga sentido a la hora de jugar.[/i]

[h1] GAMEPLAY - 9/10[/h1]
Al principio estarás confuso, no es como jugar en un FIFA/PES. Jugar en teclado es un poco incómodo pero todo bien. Hasta ahora no he notado algún fallo a pesar de ser un Game with Early Access, es bastante bueno el desarrollo aunque ya llevan desde el año pasado. Cuenta con la opción de configurar el teclado inclusive el mando de Xbox 360.

Además cuando anotas, tienes la opción de grabar el gol que hiciste, grabar me refiero que estará en formato GIF y poder compartir a tus amigos.

Tiene torneos y desafíos interesantes, por ahora no tiene Multijugador Online* cuando termine todo el desarrollo, probablemente ahí estará listo.

Debo admitir que al principio un amigo adquirió el juego, sentí muy poca esperanza hacia el juego hasta que estaba en oferta y lo compré, desde ese día lo probé, simplemente superó mis expectativas.

[i]Actualmente son 5 poderes:[/i]
[code][h1]Ventilador:[/h1] Es un recurso útil cuando estás solo y evitas el gol utilizando el Súper Ventilador, así no logran anotar.

[h1]Imán:[/h1] Un recurso muy importante en momentos claves, si el jugador rival va hacia al arco, utilizas el Imán para quitar el balón de lejos.

[h1]Súper Velocidad:[/h1] Es cuando quieres llegar más rápido hacia la cancha rival en un instante parecido a teletransportar.

[h1]Súper Tiro:[/h1] Es cuando realizas un tiro potente que nadie puede parar.

[h1] Congelador:[/h1] Congelas a los jugadores rivales incluso a tus compañeros por un buen rato.

Para conseguirlo, tendrás que realizar jugadas como entrada a un rival, quitar el balón y posesión total de balón y hacer goles. Hay una barra naranja que crece hasta llegar al máximo y cada poder se cambia cuando utilizas incluso si cometes mínimo error, pierdes y tendrás que recargar.[/code]

Tiene todo y es muy disfrutable.

[h1] GRÁFICA - 10/10[/h1]
Es un juego de bajo requisito, pide 1 GB de RAM y corre bien. Además su diseño visual es bastante bueno y propio, no te cansa los ojos mientras juegas.

[h1] MÚSICA - 9/10[/h1]
Es bastante ameno, si quieres escuchar música, entonces podrás desactivar el sonido del juego.

[h1] OPINIÓN SOBRE EL VIDEOJUEGO	[/h1]
Es un juego que debería estar en tu biblioteca si es que eres amante del fútbol además es una opción alternativa para aquellos que no poseen Rocket League y pasar horas jugando fútbol violento.

[h1] PRO +[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Muy desafiante e intentar conseguir los 224 logros es divertido.
    [*]Cromos (6)
    [*]Adictivo desde los primeros segundos.
    [*]Muchos torneos y selecciones por escoger.
[/list]

[h1]CONTRA -[/h1]
[list]
    [*] Nada que decir.
[/list]

[code] ¿Eres amante del fútbol? No te vas arrepentir.[/code]

[b]*Nota del autor:[/b]
[i]Cuando el juego esté 100% listo y tenga disponibilidad Multijugador Online, ahí nuevamente voy a re-analizar.[/i]
